i tried the banana nut bread soft baked cereal bar and it was so good if you like banana flavored anything you will love this this is perfect for breakfast on the go for people like me who end up eating on their commute or for an afternoon snack it is sweet enough to satisfy a sweet tooth it reminds me of a healthier version of toaster strudel the best part is that is contains protein b vitamins and fiber i cannot wait to try the cinnamon pecan

i bought these as a way to supplement my meals as well as get more fiber and protein first of all these bars are fairly nutritious they are made of natural ingredients and whole grains just like the cereal each bar contains of fiber and of protein considering most people in the united states do not get enough fiber that is a very decent amount previously i was eating the fiber one bars oats chocolate count boxes pack of while you get more fiber in those bars you only get of protein the kashi bars are made of better and more nutritious ingredients and they taste better as well each bar has only calories but they are very filling due to the fiber and protein although a bar made of brown rice and oats does not sound very tasty these are some of the best bars i have tried as the name implies they are not chewy but not too crunchy either below is the main nutritional info calories total fat sat fat sodium carbs fiber protein

after doing some of research both taste testing and strictly from a nutritional standpoint these kashi golean bars in chocolate caramel seemed to rise to the top of my list there were definitely some bars that offered more protein or fiber or even less calories or fat but overall this seemed to be the best all around for me it comes in with calories less than most of competitors grams of fat less than a lot of competitors grams of protein more on par with many of its competitors and grams of fiber more than a lot of competitors oh yeah and they taste pretty awesome as well

my husband worked for this oreintal family who gave him a oz package of noh hawaiian iced tea he raved on how good it was i did not believe him until i actually tried it ummmm great cool taste and refreshing ice tea i would definetely recommend
the aroma is just super the flavor is great also i am using it to make iced tea but i am sure it is good hot also loved by everyone who has tried it has a very mild lemon taste well balanced flavor
nice assortment one cheese got molded before opening about days after arrival i gourmet replaced it promptly nice grouping for a wine tasting party

do not be fooled buy the calorie count on this product most people consider low calorie products to be less filling i am surprised at this tasty and filling meal in a can i purchased this item on a whim and glad that i did will purchase again for sure
quite flavorful it jump starts my day certainly recommend it i like a stout cup of coffee and would definately reorder it again

these are one of the best tasting potato chips that i have tasted nice and crunchy a little thicker than other chips and just the right amount of salt while these are certainly not a health food the current packaging boasts that they have less fat than regular chips the package also boasts no artificial flavors no preservatives no message no trans fats made with all natural ptotatoes and seasonings one serving has fat of which only is saturated fat sodium sugar and protein for potato chips that is pretty good shop for price the printed price on a oz bag is and i can get these for less on sale at my local supermarket

went to italy this past summer and again in september so i became addicted to expresso and ordered about worth of pods when i got back and i really really enjoyed this one my father and grandfather also like it born and raised in italy will be ordering again
i just brewed my first cup and the aroma and flavor both speak of autumn and harvest i love the flavor i would highly recommend this herbal tea

i tasted wonderful cheese popcorn at the palmer house in chicago and thought this might be the same when sprinkled on hot buttered popcorn sorry i had to purchase six as i cannot even give them away absolutely no taste whatsoever even when you use a massive amount of it on popcorn do not waste your money

i bought this brand without having tried it beforehand because i could not find any mulling spices in bags in the local grocery stores last month and i was ready for some apple juice and mulling spices it tastes very good much the same as another brand a friend shared with me last year i have tried other instant brands but did not care for them these are perfect for me although the amount i had to buy here on amazon was really more than what i wanted
these are pretty good some of the individually wrapped pieces must have tiny holes as some of the cookies are no longer crisp and fresh but for the price they are pretty great most of them are good

these are very good crackers with a very italian cheesy taste all boxes had quite a few crushed at the bottom of the boxes bags bags inside the boxes i liked them much better than just the regular cheddar ones
this is a very good rice and i will be ordering more good flavor and it is always a surprise at a dinner party

i do not eat chips often but when i do these are some of my favorites they have all the flavor and texture of traditional tortilla chips but it is the subtle lime flavoring that makes them special the lime flavoring appears to be a seasoning that has been sprinkled on some chips seem to have minimal flavor and i find myself looking for those with the most still none of them have quite enough for my tastes i wish that these chips had more than just a hint of lime
crust is a little bland but the middle is great i wish it were in stock more often

these are the best quick boil udons i have ever had the noodles are just right and the soup is pretty good you can also skip the soup base and add your own stuff i like adding tofu and tempura fish balls with my udon if you are fortunate enough to have a ranch market or nijiya market nearby save yourself some money and buy the udon there since they are sold for only cents a pack
this is an awesome product dissapointed only by cans being dented they were usable though great buy compared to stores
best tasting green tea around a bit pricey i tried yogi green tea because it was cheaper it was good but not a smooth and rich tasting i will stick with traditional medicinal from now on
taste like fruit like the texture kind of like gummy bears love the calories great snack and easy to travel with had these before and this is order

i have wanted to find a stevia sweetened soda for a long time but i do not like typical colas or lemon lime soft drinks i had hoped this would taste a little more like that other well known dr drink but to be honest it just does not i guess my slight disappointment with that difference led me to knock off a star in my rating all in all however it is a good flavor bit of a cherry with a hint of citrus

this is one of zevia s more successful flavors it is more reminiscent of the flavor of dr pepper than a clone but it still tastes very good i do not notice any kind of aftertaste i have bought this on its own before and will again it is one of my favorite flavors

my only complaint is that on the bottom of the package the expiration date is i do not think that is correct i made several cups of tea before i noticed it and figured that since i had not had any adverse effects either it was incorrect or it did not matter it tastes refreshing and smells great the combination of coconut and green tea is awesome
these are very good not too sweet like most fig newton type bars and not gritty like some high fiber or high protein bars we eat them for afterschool snacks or breakfast on the run

these candies are small which i like since i do not want to scarf down a candy bar that has calories these candies are about calories each the flavor is a mix between coffee and cream which you already know but the sugar content is not so large as to make you feel the candies are nothing but sugar you can eat of these candies a day and have no guilt the hardness of the candies is great because they last awhile and unlike other candies they do not stick to your teeth and torture you for minutes geeh i am sounding old but i cannot buy the junk from a vending machine at work and enjoy it and most candies are huge in size and calories so these candies seem to be ideal
this is the only protein powder that i have used that tastes great even mixed with just cold water and a shaker
the product taste great for a meal replacement powder this works for me as i work and go to school fulltime and have less time cooking or preparing food it satisfy my appetite for hours
love this stuff try used shaker cup to mix would recommend using electric wand mixer to create milkshake effect and the chocolately taste is yummy
this is an ideal bar for someone that wants the taste of a nutty candybar but with of protein tastes like a payday high fat and sugar content are the downsides though

decided to try this out with no information on the product or past experience with the company because i am familiar with powdered soup mix in general and if this one specifically tasted weird i could probably do something myself to make it better the soup is good four stars because the garlic and onion flavors are a bit strong if you are on a low sodium diet you will want to steer clear because the sodium content is pretty high to be expected with a product like this but you never can tell over all i do not regret my purchase and may even buy again in the future

i love this stuff i brew several pitchers of iced tea from it every day and it has become my standard beverage now i have had plenty of white teas from the various folks who mass produce them like lipton but this is the first time i have bought it loose and brewed it up myself rather than pre brewed or in tea bag form so point is i am an amateur i do not have experience with other loose leaf white teas to compare but i find this stuff divine it is mild yet tasty and i do not ever get any caffeine effects that i notice now if you need something to wake up in the morning i could see that being a problem but as something i drink all day long i definitely do not want to have to worry about getting jittery or cutting myself off at a particular point in the evening i have never had a hard time going to sleep after drinking this tea and that is great in my book there is some debate as to whether white tea has lower caffeine content than other teas like black teas but i can only go by personal experience and personally i find that black teas like english breakfast when i brew them up give me a very noticeable caffeine kick this does not in any way this tea seems great i wish i had the expertise to know whether i am enjoying something that really is awesome or some shoddy imposter that y know simply makes me very happy to drink but has no real quality to it i suspect this is pretty decent quality and i hope once the two pounds run out to try some other brand at least in a limited quantity to see how they stack up to one another oh and a side note turns out throwing out your first brief steep will not make the rest caffeine free read more here if you are interested also one of my favorite aspects of this white tea and i assume it is true of most white teas is that there is almost no bitterness black tea is not exactly like tonic water but it does have a bit of a bitter taste and i found that i really enjoyed it once that bitterness was gone even though i did not know or think that black tea was unpleasantly bitter i now notice it quite a bit a case of one of those you do not know what you could have done without until it is gone sorts of things i guess happy brewing

i love honey and i often buy expensive gourmet types i decided to try this one because rain forest sounded unusual and also because it is labeled organic this honey met my best expectations it has very nice texture and aroma to it for this price i could not believe it it does taste like a gourmet honey i disagree with one of the previous comments this honey s taste is not overbearing at all good quality honey should have a distinct flavor that is what sets apart honeys coming from different areas and flower types and that easily recognizable flavor is what is valued in each type of honey
this is a good as it gets next to starbucks and since it is in your own home it is even better

while the coffee is very tasty with lots of flavor i cannot help being bothered by the high price everywhere on line or in store and the official site has it for box with capsules of which only is the coffee the rest is the milk well we need that too still
i love all the dolce gusto milky coffees but this is my favorite pricewise and tastewise this beats the expensive coffee shops any day

the coffee is great tasting but is expensive in my book if nestle had not sent me the machine for free i would not have bought it it leaks and is not a great machine for an office our office does not like it because you have to keep going to the bathroom to refill it with water because it only holds two cups worth of water it does make a hot cup of coffee in a very quick time though

for a great appetizer stuff these little guys with goat cheese or goat cheese mixed with cream cheese and a little fresh basil just put the cheese and basil in a plastic baggie sqish to mix add mild if too thick cut a corner from the bag and squeeze into the drained peppadews they will be the hit of the dinner party for style points serve in a long skinny olive dish

these are fantastic better than regular pretzels i was expecting them to be hard and grainy like everything else gf but they were not they are made with potato and corn starch instead of rice flour seriously these are really good

this cheddar cheese tastes great it is not truly a sharp tangy taste but it is cheddar the drawback is the shipping cost of nearly for eventhough it arrives virtually over night the nutrional label is as follows for a size cube calories total fat saturated fat grams trans fats cholesterol sodium total carbs less than g protein grams this cheese cannot be frozen as the label states it can be stored in the fridge up to one month but we consumed this in a week for a special party i included the nutritional content due to the marketplace did not state the facts when i bought this hopefully this helps other consumers

i love this stuff it is like the sencha shot but with a bit softer flavor profile still fills in like an energy drink but without the weirdly contrived and overly sweet flavors of those drinks this stuff is also actually good for you
product tastes really good just like regular pasta if you ask me however it does take twice as long to cook which is fine by me if it has lower carbs

realllllly good i saw this reviewed on seattle coffee gear s site and being me i thought oo i wonder if its on amazon sure enough they had the whole bean version which i wanted more but but no grinder yet so i bought drip and since i had not tried it before i was wondering if it was really good or if it was just meh this is awesome coffee the drip grind is really great too and strong i learned quick that you do not want to use too much now if your big on strong coffee go nuts i used a cone type filter and used tablespoons and i did not really level off much and it was sooo strong but not bitter it was super smooth and it was chocolaty really good love this coffee plan on buying more if you cannot find it on here just go to their website
this is a very tasty powdered instant decaf chai tea mix it blends easily and well and tastes delicious i like to take a few packets when i travel

as other reviewers have noted already this seems to be kellogg s attempt to replicate honey nut cheerios at least in appearance nutritionally the two are also very similar crunchy nut tastes sweeter and i found myself eating it as a snack i cannot say the taste is too similar to hnc so just because you like one does not mean you will necessarily like the other overall it is definitely to my liking and i can see myself buying both crunchy nut and hnc

we cannot believe how flavorful this kraft thick and spicy brown sugar barbecue sauce tastes i used this to cook some very meaty chicken breast and the flavors popped it is not too spicy for us and i assume it is because of the brown sugar you cannot go wrong with buying a product from kraft foods
i started drinking this tea about weeks ago and have seen my acne slowly fade away my co workers even mentioned how bright my complexion was looking
all the cures work and taste great i like hickory smoked flavored items so this was great for me great seasoning
absolutely the best nutella alternative i actually prefer it over nutella it tastes so rich and just plain phenomenal a bit more hazelnutty than nutella gah just great

great size to try out xylitol before making a larger commitment i like that it is birch and not corn and made in usa you should be aware that xylitol has a spearmint type sweetness to it it may alter the taste of some foods because of this trait i use it in my coffee as a substitute for regular sugar and i am completely satisfied you need to add slightly more to get the same level of sweetness but its close

these bars all of the roll types are hard to eat that is actually part of why i like them so much because they take some effort to bite into and chew they basically force you to eat slower as a result you feel more satisfied at the end of eating one than if you had scarfed down a candy bar in three bites i do not find them hard as rocks though just very chewy if you do not like chewy food then these are definitely not for you i also really like the texture contrast between the crunchy crispy outside and the chewy nougat inside of the bar there is a bit of a mess factor involved in eating these as noted by one reviewer the caramel is sticky and sometimes leaves traces on the wrapper and the outside crispy crunchy coating tends to crumble off a bit if you want to keep the inside of your car spotlessly clean you might not want to chow down on a go lean roll bar while driving nevertheless i still think these are some of the best bars out there they are not discernibly chalky nor do they have a strange chemical aftertaste the way that many protein or energy bars do they really are like fortified candy bars and they pack quite a high protein and fiber punch for only calories each while only having about mg of sugars about tablespoon per bar i was expecting more like mg when i tried my first one the chocolate turtle roll is my favorite flavor but honestly i have tried every single flavor of the go lean roll bars and they are really all quite good

i have been receiving this product via auto delivery for about a year now i try to eat one of these bars as my lunch at least days a week it tastes like a candy bar and provides enough fiber protein etc to replace a meal i think it is a great way to help me lose weight

my wife and i are senior citizens on a fixed income though not as fixed as it was six months ago if you are like us and looking for a reasonably priced and tasty source of protein in a well rounded package with other vital nutrients look no further this stuff is delicious do not be surprised when unsuspecting dinner guests ask for the recipe we just reply that it is a family secret the only con i can think of is having to choose between the beef the lamb and the turkey but why choose just buy all three
this dressing is awesome it is very tasty and not so full of chemical ingredients as other dressings we wish we would have discovered it earlier

i love to eat it as a snack while reading before i know it the jar is empty but i buy it from plum market online for

thought it tastes funny not like iced tea not like lemonade and no where in between there are much better flavors out there

this is some of the smoothest coffee i have ever tasted for people who do not really like the taste of coffee i would highly recommend this coffee it does not have any bitter aftertaste it really is incredibly smooth

i tried congo bongo in my friend s house and absolutely love it but since i prefer green tea i have ordered fiji it has great taste hope the quality of the tea also good love fiji and going to try some other flavor from serendipitea

i bought these in response to a just for you recommendation and was very pleased the product was fresh and gummy not stale at all i was surprised at how brightly colored these bears are i admire their tasty tasty glow just before i pop them into my mouth i was home when the box arrived and since it was a warm day i was glad i was the bears were crammed together at one end of the packaging and very warm so i popped the unopened bag into the fridge for a while when they had cooled i opened the bag it is not a resealable bag and divided the bears into ziplocs eating the ones that fell onto the counter for ummmm health and safety reasons hopefully this will keep them fresh a long while

this is the only food i have been feeding my dog since i took him off puppy chow he loves it his coat is soft and shiny and i have not had any health problems he is a year old mini dachshund so this small breed formula works well for him

i cannot believe how great this water is i got the apple pear flavored water and am really into it i put a couple into the freezer and get them super cold and then take them with me for the day i also really love the way the bottle fits into a back pocket let us me be hands free
i did not like the taste of this very much it was ok but it tasted a little odd i loved their white lightening chicken chili but do not recommended the chicken noodle soup

ultra light weight and real live fruit a great combination the fruit is freeze dried for those of you that remember space ice cream it is the same idea the fruit is sliced and placed in a machine that freezes the fruit and then a vacuum pulls off the water the process retains a lot of the original flavor and preserves the fruit for almost eternity well about two years expiration date on the pouches without using any chemicals the taste is really nice these are all crisp fruit pieces not the gummy fruit leather food banana strawberry is probably the tastiest and most fragile the strawberry flavor is strong and the bananas are subtle without picking up the strawberry flavor apples come in a nice second the pieces are thick and about two inches in diameter the pears are good maybe a touch tart and have the same texture as the apples the fruit is completely dry and absorbs water in your mouth very quickly if you eat it too fast the strawberries coat your teeth a little bit the others are very clean to eat i like these packages in my carryon bag for plane trips they make a great emergency snack take up little space and weigh nothing number two son packs these in his lunch almost every day now he likes the strawberry banana the best i really like all three flavors the pouches list that they are a product of china i list that as information so you can be aware of where this fruit comes from and make no value judgment for you the manufacturing process has been around for a very long time it is a very safe process and as long as the fruit going in is good the food should be good so far every pouch has been consistently good i like these a lot they make a great snack
the dried fruit are very tasty the individual pkgs are handy and convenient great for people on the go i recommend this product

whoa a really nice sweetness it is softer than the raw organic cane sugar i am presently using and it has no aftertaste i never could get used to stevia in my coffee but this is delicious just a very good product

this is a staple item at our house i use it in soups barbecue meatloaf and anything else that we want to spice up pure tasting w o any other spices overpowering the flavor you apply as much heat as you desire and still maintain the integrity of your recipe the small jars were timely and intact when delivered

i have tried many pancake batters and this one is up there as one of the best great flavor the texture is a little fluffy and stretchy but maybe because i added an extra egg the batter needs a lower cooking temperature though otherwise it burns rather easily easy to work with though and best of all no sugar only granulated honey

gloia jeans butter toffee coffee has a great taste the smell of the aroma as the coffee brews starts an enjoyable experience sit back relax and enjoy a cup
this is a very tasty tea i served it at a bridal shower and it was one of the favorites my husband loved it and took the remaining tea bags to work we will be ordering more

my grandson loves the strawberry kellogg s special k bars but the strawberry flavored are sometimes difficult to find in the grocery store i was thrilled to find them on amazon and be able to buy them by the case on a regular basis heaven forbid that nana be caught without a strawberry breakfast bar at all times
my first time eating kelp noodles they taste great now i just need to find them locally so that i will not have to place an order for food nevertheless recommend this company and their kelp

like eating soft plastic we pored them in a big pile in the back yard under the trees the squeals will not eat them

only calories and no trans or saturated fat i love these things but i cannot eat just one so watch out

well do you know how difficult it is to find white rice puffed rice only company that does it is quaker millet does not cut it sorry will not but it again have tried all the puffed rice products most do not tell you that these puffed rice products are brown rice puffed rice truth in advertising i think not brown rice puffed just does not have the taste of white rice puffed i can still find it at albertsons at around bucks a box

i ordered this for my diabetic daughter i found some not so great reviews from people so i only ordered one bottle my whole family loves this stuff i even like it and i am not a sno cone fan it has an excellent flavor the syrup is light and does not overtake the ice i will order all of my syrups from back to basics sugar free collection from now on i highly reccoment this product

i add this to my kids milk for added protein and calcium it clumps together so you have to mix it up in a blender but it tastes great and is worth the price to avoid hormones in non organic milk it is hard to find around here and i am glad amazon carries it they offer it cheaper than special ordering it from the health food store i add it to homemade icing and ice cream too

great seller a great customer service outstanding value good tasting italian coffee i will be back after i drink all of my coffee that i purchased to purchase another back from the seller i have advise you people to do the same

these are awesome our golden lab loves them and eats one daily they definitely make his breath smell better which is why we got them in the first place great product not smelly to humans do not make a mess when eating

i have never had mallomars before i live in wisconsin and do not know if they make it all the way over here the only time i ever remember hearing the name before is in the simpsons episode hurricane neddy when nice guy flanders finally snaps and cusses out the whole town upon getting to the portly police chief wiggum he says the only case you have gotten to the bottom of was a case of mallomars i assume by what i have read that they are a fall only type product like the mcrib i am also informed by the box that they are a new york kind of thing regardless i am glad vine gave me the chance to try them because they are so good the crunchy dark chocolate coating over a marshmallow lump and thin crunchy cookie gives a s mores like experience that truly satisfies an excellent snack buy a box today

i was told about this stuff at a party and as a lover of mayonnaise thought i would buy some i do not use it a lot but it is pretty good on fries i imagine it will make a great tunafish sandwich too if you have never had it before it tastes a lot like traditional mayo but considerably more vinegar y some people who do not like mayo have told me they like this

i enjoy bloodymary s but at times making a mix from scratch is too timely so i settle for something different i have tried several other bloody mixes with poor results the zing zang bloody mix is the closest i have come to homemade it is extremely tasty no more skipping an urge for a bloody when this mix is at hand highly recommend

this is a great chai tea it is very aromatic and flavorful but not overpowering strong like some can be
this sauce with lobster added was the hit of the night paired with pasta and garlic bread my family could not stop raving about it i managed to save one jar for myself

despite the poor review below this instant udon bowl is suprisingly delicious this instant udon bowl is so delicious most people cannot tell the difference between udon served at a restaurant and the udon from this bowl i love adding an egg to my meal with this udon i just plop it in there with bowling water and boom fresh udon with egg cannot be beat enjoy

i used to be able to buy this in the grocery stores but no longer i do not know why since it is the best pepper out there for cooking and flavoring it is easy to use grind is just right and more flavorful than bland black pepper i use it in salads and whenever i am adding pepper to a recipe

very little taste weak and no caffiene that i can tell i even emailed tao of tea about brewing suggestions and got no reply

great way for kids to get in their fruits and veggies i add to yogurt smoothies

my husband and i love to cook jarred sun dried tomatoes available in our area grocery stores have been a disappointment not these flavorful and easy to use in a variety of dishes the flavor is a burst of summer sweetness often these are eaten as chef s treats during cooking price is more than fair i will keep these on hand always
this tea is very flavorful the pyramidal tea bags seem to allow more flavor to infuse i would buy this again
i love this balsamic vinager it has a great flavor on par with some of the more expensive ones i have tried
not to sweet not too bitter the blueberry is not overbearing but yet you know it is there overall i like it

i like cashews any way so i am biased i really enjoyed these they do earn the name of salty though so this product is not for those that need to eat low sodium but for the rest of us they will be a tasty treat

i was pleasantly surprised by this product i like salt and pepper flavors in general but this one has a bit garlic and onion flavor to it that i liked a lot the pepper is not too hot but it gives it a nice kick the pepper flavor does not compare with freshly ground pepper naturally but it is pretty good for a commercially made product it is a tiny bit too salty for my taste but i know that tends to be personal preference that is different for everybody the nuts are well roasted and crunchy they are also a really nice size too often i see tiny nuts that do not have much flavor these nuts are tasty i would get these again these would be an interesting snack to serve to guests

i have been partial to emerald s products so my favorable reaction to this one comes as no surprise to me however i would warn that this may not be to everyone is taste at least at first the sea salt definitely has more kick than the usual salted nuts and the pepper gives it a decided bite for those whose taste in nuts tend more towards sweeter concoctions this may be a bit much but for those who like dark beer strong coffee and snacks with attitude this is a welcome treat

first of all i am a cashew lover so i figured i would like these nuts what i did not expect was how much i would like the sea salt pepper combo there is a slight twang after eating a handful of these and they are great with a cold beer or soda each nut is big and bold no little pieces in this jar the packaging is great good for taking along on trips the twist lid is easy on and off if you enjoy spice go for these the pepper does give a little extra kick

i ordered this from another website and my newly diagnosed to need to be gluten free year old son loved it when returning to the other site to no longer find it there i returned to my old friend amazon com i am impressed with all the gf products that i can get on here and even more excited that i can use the subscribe and save option to have a continuous supply of mac n cheese always in our house thanks

just tried my first cup and it is as good as the restaurant stuff i typically pay a premium for for with ice i am loving it update i tried the pantainorasingh brand which is not nearly as good as this brand sadly i may end up throwing away the other brand even though i hate to be wasteful the taste is very different

this tea is very tasty it does not have the unappealing fresh paint smell that some other thai tea mixes have i am very pleased with it i agree with the other reviewer that the price is high for shipping in my area i could not find it in the asian stores so i have to order it for three bags the shipping was just more than the shipping for one bag so i bought three to offset the shipping cost i also agree with one of the other reviewers that the tea should be brewed very strongly then add water or milk to it later i love the tea hot or cold with or without cream the lovely orange color shows up better when you use cream or milk and the color is part of the charm of the drink

i do not know if this product tastes exactly like the thai tea in the restaurants nor do i know if i am brewing the tea exactly the way they do but it tastes very good and i look forward to drinking it it is a personal treat it is best served with regular half and half not milk or fat free half and half i brew it using my coffee maker i put the filter paper just as if i were about to brew some coffee i use my judgement with the amount of tea to water ratio and i can now visualize the amount i need for a specific strength all in all it is a good product only had a problem with the shipping i live in nyc and will perhaps search for this product in china town next time but until then i have two bags to keep me busy

it is not worth the money it does have a terrible taste i bought one so far and stopped buying it and threw the unused coffee in garbage if you want a good tasting instant coffee try nescafe classic or nescafe gold available everywhere on earth but parts of the us
i have a puppy that absolutely loves them she considers them her personal reward for everything she does a good training aid
i am more concerned with sugar than fat and this is a great sugar free item best tasting creamer without sugar not too sweet just perfect

i have been searching for a good tasting protein drink since i had a gastric bypass years ago i saw this product on another weight loss surgery blog and decided to give it a try you can drink it warm unlike most other protein drinks or cold and it mixes quite easily if you use a container with a blender ball i thought it was a bit too thick when i mixed it according to the directions scoops in oz of water so the next time i used more water others might prefer the thicker version though i also added crushed ice after i mixed it which kept it cold longer and made it more like an iced coffee drink when i travel i take my empty blender ball container in my carryon bag stuffed with ziploc bags filled with protein shake powders but on my next trip will be taking these packets instead

i was just introduced to these olives on a united flight this week probably the best tasting green olives i have ever had i usually never eat green olives i was so happy with them i purchased two snack pack boxes with the olove packs on my return flight to share with my wife and kids i am thrilled i am able to purchase these on amazon and really suggest them to anyone looking for a great snack

i used this in cakes cup cakes and candies its great in drinks i found as well as long as your making mixed drinks i really enjoyed this produce and i urge people to try this and experiment with it be adventurous with your cooking and the flavors you use its truly worth it
tasted bland did not have the freshness and aroma of sping onions would not buy again
my dog loves them loves them loves them i find them a bit pungent they are fish after all but my opinion is not the one that counts

we picked some of these up this week they are very convenient and quite handy to have around just to grab when you are walking out the door the taste is about what you would expect from hershey s chocolate milk it is chocolate it is sweet and it is really good it is nice that they do not need to be refrigerated either at least until after they are opened on the one hand these are better for a child than cola but on the other hand there is still a lot of sugar in them and calories in only oz i am looking at the servings right now and for one container it has g of sugar i will grant you it is not empty calories because there is of the daily intake of calcium but still if you can train the kid to drink skim milk that is fewer calories for them when i was a kid my parents used to give me skim milk with not much chocolate powder in it my real treat was the chocolate milk at school but it was fairly rare to get it they would have chocolate milk maybe once a week these things probably are not all that bad by comparison to some of the junk food kids eat i just feel a little wary if feeding them lunch for lunch because the calories do add up i would never tell anybody how to raise their kids or what to drink themselves but i for one plan to have these as a treat every now and then instead of as a regular part of my diet anyway they are tasty and i would recommend

my wife does not like chocolate but she likes granola i love chocolate and i am fine with granola here is a granola snack we can agree on she tasted it and pronounced it pretty good i am a big fan of chocolate bars with add ins like bacon or fruit or chili so chocolate with berries is right up my alley i like it and i do not have to feel guilty when i eat it now if i can just get our year old to try some i can share the whole family s opinion

i am always looking for healthy snack alternatives but healthy snacks are not always very tasty this one was it has a good crunch factor and the chocolate and berry flavors stood out without being overpowering my two teen aged sons fought over the bag one enjoyed is as a cereal the other just as a snack i myself enjoyed it sprinkled over some fat free frozen yogurt the serving size cup is a little small it would be easy to eat the whole bag without even realizing it but it is perfect as a topping for yogurt or ice cream my boys have asked me to add this to my regular shopping list
i bought this product as a gift for my son who is away at college he liked the tea and enjoyed having a varity to pick from i will re order this again two thumbs up

this mix is exactly as advertised i decided to add chopped onion sesame seeds and a small amount of chile paste and the results were outstanding i also used lbs of ahi instead of the full lb and it worked fine i would buy this product again
without my miracle noodles i would go crazy my cravings pasta are under control with miracle noodles they are delicious with any sauce or olive oil

honestly i used to buy this frequently before they stopped caring it in my grocery store so i was actually quite excited to see its availibility online i am not exactly sure what is up with it but it has absolutely no taste whatsoever very big disappointment o

this is a chocolate donut flavored coffee it is not pre sweetened has a great aroma and flavor it is perfect for someone who likes it dark or likes to add cream and or sugar on his or her own i have tried other flavors like this and this one is by far the best
we love k cups and the ease of using them the donut house collection chocolate glazed donut is great tasting i would highly recommend these k cups

this coffee is excellent it is a lighter blend so those who prefer chewable coffee may not like it it has an amazing scent of a chocolate donut i am new to the k cup but so far this is one of my favorite flavors
i got a really good deal of this item in amazon amazon provides must cheaper price than local stores the noodle includes two separate soup powders that make the taste so amazing
fairly easy to cook a little nutty in taste for some

these flakes are smaller than i expected for something called large but they taste great straight out of the package throw them in your hot or cold cereal on top of ice cream or mix them into yogurt they are a sweet crunchy healthy treat

this was good honey in a nice package i used it as a compliment for the beer i made called honey britches i taped the sticks to the side of the bottles and it added a nice little sweetness to the beer that already used orange honey in the brew process honey ferments completely so there was very little residual sugar left which this item helped remedy
this is my favorite snack bar the price is about the same as the sale prices i find at the supermarket on a per unit basis

at cents a piece these are a good deal they contain all natural ingredients which sounds like something for a tree hugger which i am not it actually makes them good and not disgusting like some other granola type bars i am torn between the apple pie ones and these which are both the same price one of each makes a good cheap lunch
the cinnamon roll flavors are not quite as good as the other larabars there is just not enough cinnamon for my tastes however they are still very tasty

several people have written in to say that their larabars were old and crumbly i just received a box of chocolate coconut chew larabars and they are in date moist have a good consistency and are delicious this is a perfect mid morning or after workout snack i love that they are raw vegan kosher contain all natural ingredients and have no processed sugar these taste better are healthier and have a better texture than most lines of exercise oriented energy bars
best energy bar ever healthy tasty less than ingredients what could be better than that great taste too

i am a marathon runner and diabetic i have spent years tinkering with different energy meal bars and eventually settled with clifbar which is not bad though it has many sugary ingredients like rice syrup etc i was extremely excited to discover larabar it is delicious contains no added sugars and provides an excellent source of energy for training definitely the best bar on the market
this bar is good it tastes like eating a banana mixed in with some nuts i like that it does not have any sugar added and it just uses the natural sugars from the banana to flavor the bar
i was so hoping that starbucks would come out with a mild blend for k cups starbucks has exceeded my hopes this coffee is delicious thanks starbucks

great to have a sugar that tastes great cooks with everything and has not yet been cooped by the gmo crowd of producers we will order again and enjoyed the speedy delivery we wish this came in larger bags for truly bulk orders lbs bags would be great

not my favorite but for the price great product and it is handy stores well and works well in coffee and other foods i have added distilled water and used in my cereal straight is fine but i am calorie conscious so i prefer to add a little water organic valley is the best but for obvious reasons it cost more
my year old really likes them they are worth the price good packing and fresh to taste i highly recommend this product

i have never used gluten free pasta before i absolutely love this pasta i enjoy eating spaghetti once in a while and this satisfies that craving it is very important to make sure the water is boiling prior to putting in the pasta i say this because my daughter decided to make spaghetti for herself and added pasta in pan of water before it was boiling well what happened was a glob of gooey mess lesson learned
i made this purchase for a visiting relative and although i did not drink it she enjoyed the tea very much and ordered her own when she returned home

i received this product as part of the amazon vine program this lipton to go decard tea is good and is refreshing i wished it had less ingredients but overall is a better alternative to soda pop and less calories

i really liked the taste of this i mixed it with water bottles cold from the refrigerator i found it took quite a bit of shaking to mix the powder in and never did get it completely dissolved as there were still tiny bits that settled to the bottom i think if you drink some from the bottle before adding the drink mix it would allow more room for mixing in the bottle the strawberry taste was excellent not too sweet and no strange aftertaste i really like that it is low calorie without artificial sweetner it makes drinking my daily intake of water easier the packets are small enough to tuck in a pocket for use on the go the package has a notch to make opening easier i will definitely buy these i would have given five starsnif it was easier to dissolve

this product has great taste and not too sweet the tea mixes up in your water like coolaide and comes in individual packets so you can take it along with you however the packets do not tear by hand but you must use a knife or scissors to get them open that is the only thing that needs to be improved
this tastes like a tropical cocktail all it needs is the alcohol did not try adding that the mango flavor is pungent and if you like that flavor you will like this tea very enjoyable taste

when i try a powdered drink mix i am interested in three factors first i want the stuff to taste good second i want it to dissolve well third i would rather drink something without a lot of calories this drink satisfied all three conditions for me so i would be interested in buying more in the future the drink tastes good it is a little sweet for one packet mixed into a drinking glass but there are enough fruit flavors to make the sweetness a bit complex and worth tasting i did not taste the pineapple at all but the mango flavor was nice and pronounced not quite overwhelmed by the honey taste it does not taste like home brewed iced tea but it was closer than i expected from a powdered mix the box warns that the powder needs some extra mixing to fully dissolve but i had no problem at all stirring it in a glass for a couple of seconds there was no grainy layer at the bottom of the glass and my drink was smooth finally each packet is only ten calories so this still counts as a viable low calorie alternative to soft drinks there are lower calorie sweeteners out there but ten is close enough to zero that this mix is a viable beverage for those who prefer to drink water most of the time this is not a must drink experience but it is very good by powdered drink mix standards and i recommend it

this has lots of flavor and is great that it is decaf i do not like drinking caffeine throughout the day i would recommend this as it is easy to carry with you in your purse briefcase or tote bag and it adds a lot of flavor to your water it only adds calories though great stuff

normally i just do not like powdered drink mixes but these are really good the package says that half a packet is for ounces of water and has two servings per packet i used them in of water the first time however it was sweet enough that i cut back to a little more than half a packet for and it still had a nice sweetness it is a great product and i would purchase it without any reservation

i often buy products like this to use when traveling because it is cheaper to buy a case of water and use a drink mix than to buy sodas and drinks on the road this tasted like fresh brewed tea and disolved completely i was not stuck with a residue on the bottom just the right sweetness level and a tasty mix of strawberry flavor

i was surprised at how good this tasted it is sweet and you can really taste the pineapple it also has only calories per serving better than soda and it mixes well in water the tea also does not have that strong instant tea after taste i would definately buy this again

this has a great flavor if you are concerned about what you give your kids and do not like all the extras that are put into kids foods you will love this i have been looking for these for a while my kids love the flavor of these in their lunchbox and i do too they taste fine with no extra junk in them

the packaging makes this great on the go the applesauce is tasty i think it is green apples so it has a little green apple taste but not sour kids like it and like the squeezy action involved the amount is great for a quick snack it would be easy to use while walking runny biking as an alternative to the energy shot gel things that some people like to use
taste is much better than competing brands and has a good shelf life subscribe and save let us you be sure to always have the right amount on hand at the best price
we have been getting these crisps for some time now and we love them i also ordered some for my granddaughter they make a great healthy treat for her and she loves them too
it tastes great dissolves just fine and provides the jolt i need to start my day

when i was a kid post used to make a cereal called c w post it was a granola type cereal that was the absolute best it disappeared from the grocery shelves sometime in the s fast forward to today walking down the grocery isle i noticed the single row of just bunches high on the grocer s shelf over the years i had tried to find a granola cereal that could live up to the legend of the c w from my childhood sampling all that i could find i had no luck equaling that wonderful crunchy taste likely this new find just bunches would also disappoint but i figured i should give it a try to see if it came at least close to what i remembered it was from the post people perhaps they reached deep into their cereal recipe box and revived an old flavor from the past one could only hope it the parking lot of the grocery i cracked open the box to give it a taste instantly i was transported back to my childhood munching on cereal and watching saturday morning cartoons the road runner bugs bunny it all came back i had found the holy grail of cereals ok maybe that is taking it too far but man its really good so good i subscribed for auto ship every month

so far these have become my favorite granola bar from nature valley or anywhere else i just discovered them a few months ago and since my supply was getting low i went to wally world today and bought them out except for one box that was way in the back and beyond my reach sometimes i will have one in the morning and do not feel hungry for hours they are very crunchy and take awhile to chew since i do not want to do any damage to my teeth and also have high fructose corn syrup wish it was honey instead but i like them

very tasty it is hard to find something which has as much protein as sugars i just wish that the sugars were really sugar instead of corn syrup also it would taste even better in my opinion if it had as much sugar but still the best snack bar out there

i have a picky dog with tummy troubles who has to eat a prescription diet she loves the newman s treats but they are too hard for her since she is missing half her teeth still occasionally i hear a crunching sound and she is munching down a newman s i was hoping she would knaw on these treats and thought the center would be a little easier to eat here is how the trial went me opening the bag you want a treat dog tail wagging ears perked up and looking at me intently me i pull one treat from the bag and hand it to her dog she takes it carefully and sets it on the floor sniff sniff she looks back up at me sniff she walks away and lays down in her bed me i pick up the treat and sniff and do not smell anything this does not mean much since i am not a dog i pull on the outside wrapping it is pretty tough i push the middle up a little it is hard i was expecting a softer middle i taste the middle it is tasteless i tried again to tempt her with one of these treats by giving it to her in place of our nightly bite of cheese ritual once again she just sniffed of it and then ignored it the other treats i have tried with her beggin strips puperoni blue bison apple yogurt biscuits milk bone she will either attempt to eat or carry around in her mouth for several minutes looking for a safe place to hide it these treats do not even get the honor of being buried

i had a recipe for a pear pomegranate pie which required this ingredient i also used it in a blood orange pomegranate fennel shallot beet feta cheese and toasted almond salad i served both of these with a crown roast of pork with cumberland sauce for christmas dinner this molasses is sour and sweet simultaneously and imparts an interesting taste but could if used too lavishly overhwhelm a dish

this is my favourite tea at work i sometimes cannot get to it right away and it does not matter how long it sits it does not get that bitter bitter like your drinking a dandelion taste it is refreshing and i cannot start my day without it
i do not eat right at all i am very picky and i use these to supplement my diet great source of vitamins for on the go i actually drink one for breakfast and one before bed i buy at sams in bulk
the taste of the onions in this first jar is not up to the standards i have come to expect with my many jars that i have purchased through the years

having usually eating store baught peanuts i would have to say the taste was much to my supprise very fresh and tasty their about times bigger than regular peanuts i am glad i got them with the skins they were very tasty the salt just right
i cannot get this panda express in stores or restaurant locations anymore it is fantastic stir fry sauce i ordered it on amazon price was good and shipping was fast will be ordering again
these cheese balls are hard to find and these are so good they melt in your mouth and are very cheesy if you love cheese this is a must buy

everyone that tastes these chips love them they all ask where they can get them thank you for the email on when they were back in stock i will be ordering more my grandkids children raid the cupboards for them when they come by

i have bought a few of these along the years just from local stores and the flavor has been hit or miss but these are great hold flavor and gives the right amount of heat to your food i will buy this product again once i run out be sure to keep in fridge or freezer to keep oils fresh

i ate some raw and roasted most of them at low temp and put in the frig nuts can go rancid so have a plan to preserve and store in frig or freezer when buying this amount of nuts good buy tasted fresh

mi del old fashion swedish style lemon snaps are a crispy chewy lemony delight if you are always in search of healthy snacks that are not short on flavor these are the cookies for you these lemon snaps are made with organic unbleached wheat flour canola oil and natural lemon flavor there is no artificial lolly pop lemon taste here you can just imagine squeezing the lemon into the mix yourself five cookies have calories so it is not too much for a little something to get you through your day or after dinner as a light dessert without the guilt highly recommended yum

i had a variety of granola and this one ranks of my top most favorites it is a very crunch granola with a coconut main taste it is sweet but not overly so i eat at as a snack when i am craving something fills you up very fast and satisfies any sugar cravings

this chipotle sauce is very tasty and it can be used with many different things however i loved it the most with vegetarian meat i am a vegetarian living healthy and all grins and this sauce is amazing in a veggie sandwich or with cooked vegetarian meat however this sauce is very fattening hence why i took one star out it contains grams of fat in tbsp so one needs to be careful to have it in very small portions or make sure to have a good workout session after indulging in a good hearty meal containing this sauce overall i love this chipotle sauce very tasty

i have tried using this on chicken and hamburgers and really liked it it is a nice change from ketchup and bbq sauces the chipotle has a spicy tang but it is overwhelming it is probably even milder than the spicy sauces in an actual taco bell restaurant it actually has a slightly sweet taste it is a bit salty and creamy for those who are health conscious but i find that even a small bit provides a lot of flavor and can be spread quite far over your meal the bottle seems a bit smaller than you might expect but other than that i would recommend this
mexican spices are so good on many foods this chipolte sauce has a great flavor unlike other hot sauces not very hot quite mild but intense i have put it on everything not just tacos

i was pleasantly surprised by the taste of the chipotle sauce it is kind of like a spicy mayonnaise i used this sauce in tuna salad on sandwiches and as a salad dressing similar to mayo almost all of the calories come from fat i think it is tastier than mayo and has a nice amount of spice you can taste the pepper in the sauce but it does not leave your mouth burning it is a good balance of flavors

i cannot say i would have purchased this in the store but having received it to taste and test out at home was certainly worthwhile surprisingly flavorful with a slight kick at the end this sauce makes a great accompaniment to chicken sandwiches salads even chili yum yum

this sauce tastes pretty good it is creamy spicy but not overly so and has a nice flavor that pairs well with burritos and other mexican style foods that said i think it is a little bit overpriced for what it is the bottle is quite small fluid ounces is the two thirds the size of a soda can so the amount of sauce you get really is not very much at all they make the bottle wide and skinny so that it has the appearance of capacity the concave curves on the side further deceive the eye so in summary what we have here is a tasty sauce offered for a high price i would recommend perhaps looking for a single bottle at your local supermarket before committing to an entire six pack to see if the flavor is worth the cost for you
this is a great tasting product it can be used on more than just mexican food tried it on hot dogs and it was great not too spicy give it a try

this taco bell chipotle sauce is quite enjoyable and has the tangy yet not very spicy taste you would expect i have used it on burritos and as a dip there is no question that if you like the flavor of chipotle sauce you will enjoy this but it is high in calories which i expected and did not mind for you do not need a lot too enjoy the flavor yet two tablespoons of this sauce contains calories from fat and a total of calories per serving size the serving size is the aforementioned two tablespoons it taste great just be aware of its high fat content and calories when serving size is measured by the spoon full you know the calories are high and even so i would get this product again

taco bell s bold creamy chipotle sauce is perfectly described in its name this is a thick sauce with a strong smoky flavor and although it is quite spicy there is little heat i first used it to spice up black beans being served as a side dish for tacos the beans are so bland they always need something and this sauce was the perfect addition the sauce also worked beautifully with falafels again just the right amount of spice and it gave the pita bread sandwich stuffed with lettuce tomato cucumber and falafel balls a needed jolt finally i used the sauce on a veggie burger and it also worked beautifully there too i was pleased with the results each time i used it and found the sauce very versatile the only negative is it not low on calories two tablespoons have calories and of those are fat calories so i use it sparingly that said it is sufficiently spiced so that a little goes a long way

this is a wonderful product and i am not one who dines at taco bell i used to eat there when i was younger in college but have not in years so i was pleased to try this product and find that it was great first i like that the bottle is not so huge because the taste will stay fresh instead of getting stale from lack of use i have many dressings and toppings etc in my fridge so it is nice to have a smaller bottle second the taste is excellent i love the creamy texture and it has just a little heat from the chipolte flavoring to be interesting but not too hot i used this on a home made taco salad but i also used it as a sauce on a noodle dish i made that was like a south of the border spaghetti grandchildren like noodles so we made noodles and taco flavored meat and this sauce with a few veggies thrown in and had a mexican style noodle dinner that they loved so i highly recommend this product

this is a great sauce to use on sandwiches to give them a little extra kick love it with grilled chicken lettuce and tomato i would thin it a bit to use on a salad but it is just right with a sandwich could get creative with it meatloaf maybe

i ordered this product hoping it would really change my mind about using whey or soy i did not i have to mix it with my other protein just so i can drink it it taste like dirt and grass not s very good product

these noodles take just a couple of minutes to make and there is only one flavoring pack indomie noodles are absolutely fantastic and cheaper but take a little more effort to make i buy both brands and use as the mood strikes me the reason i am writing a review however is more about the price every asian store i have been to that sells this noodle pack charges around so it is definitely worth buying these at an asian store though not all asian stores sell sapporo i am hoping amazon will start selling the boxes of these for less than the asian stores sell single packets hint hint amazon just a note too indomie noodles are about half the price of these at least at the asian markets

easy to use because of the pre measured packets the smell and flavor are just like at the theater very good popcorn on the negative side there are two comments i only put half of the seasoning because it is way too salty too many unpopped kernels otherwise makes watching movies at home a lot of fun
everyone in our family liked these chips great taste and healthy compared to other chips if you like spicy food you will enjoy these

this brand has always amazed people with their coffee flavors and the vermont country blend is just one of them my husband and i tried it for the time and we loved it

i love this raw cacao this is a really good value this is so much more expensive in whole foods i make a banana ice cream pudding with it that tastes amazing frozen bananas pureed with teaspoons of raw cacao and a pinch of salt i place it in the freezer for a bit to set simple healthy and toddler approved
mat eacute is an awesome drink and rosamonte makes an affordable and good tasting product i would recommend this product to my friends and family

never just made the orange by its self miked it with the cream soda made by the same company people were begging me for the recipy i never follow the instructions i have tasted this brand of soda prepared very poorly not by me though tip pound of sugar per gallon no more no less that is the master rule

i actually liked the taste of this drink i would drink it without the energy factor the taste alone is the reason i give this product four stars there are two servings in one can i only drank one serving at a time i could not detect any extra energy or alertness i am a coffee drinker though it does have caffeine in it but not an excessive amount probably just the right amount so it does not give one the jitters i liked it

this tastes great i cannot say too much about the energy factor although i should point out that energy drinks do not usually do much for me it has a very nice mango flavor and does not taste like weird chemicals try it

this product has a very good taste not like many of the other energy drinks it tastes like berries and is smooth not tart at least to me i had four ounce glasses during the day i did not notice a huge spike in energy but i did not need an afternoon nap either it did not make me jittery etc and i slept well at night i wish it came in a diet drink no calories i would recommend this for the taste

i enjoyed the taste of no fear but i cannot say that it gave me any more energy than the other energy drinks on the market today since i do occasionally indulge in a few energy drinks from time to time i can say it delivered as much energy as other supplement brands the four stars were mainly for the taste

this brand of energy drink tastes good and really gives you a jolt of energy i did not have jitters afterwards and i noticed a difference in focus i have problems with some of them making me jittery but this one really worked with no side effects
we really enjoy de boles angel hair pasta it is not heavy and it is very tasty my kids are picky and this is the best product we have found to appease their request for quick and easy pasta
this is the best angel hair pasta as far as i am concerned the taste and texture are great

this couscous is absolutely wonderful the couscous is large pearl and is delicious served hot or cold cooks beautifully delicious plain with mushrooms mint or any one of a dozen other additions highly recommend it

i usually order this product from the actual gevalia site because this flavor is quite yummy i also order the cafe sperl which is also known as viennese coffee when you first open the bag the nose is tickled with the pungent smell of chocolate and a lighter aroma of raspberry the coffee tastes unique because of the raspberry flavoring but it is enjoyable either freshly brewed or chilled
i love this dressing it has such a good fruity flavor i have already recommended it to friends
i bought this for my hubby he loves dark rich coffee dark magic offers it great convenience of the kcup makes it that much nicer

i love ordering on line esp from amazon just as i am about to run out of coffee i get a email re special deals and i simply order and in a day the products are shipped this coffee is fantastic try it also donut shop is great
