first the nutrition facts serving size cup servings per container about calories fat sodium carbohydrates dietary fiber sugars other carbs protein this granola is really very tasty the chocolate chunks add a nice flavor and texture and the granola is very crunchy it comes in a plastic zip seal bag with so much chocolate and sugars this is by no means a health food but it is a great snack that at least has some nutrients unlike candy bars for instance and it tastes just as good if not better disclosure although i was not paid for this review i received one pouch of this product for free

i confess i do not eat this granola from a bowl with milk i keep it stored in an airtight container and use a shot glass to scoop out an ounce at a time for snacking very easy to toss back using the shot glass and my fingers stay clean it is very good and has no bad ingredients

this product is an alternative to eating granola bars the only downside is that portion control is easy with a granola bar whereas once you start eating this product out of the bag it is difficult not only to stop but also to gauge how much you have eaten unless you first scoop out what you want put it onto a plate and weigh it on a food scale which i doubt most people will do this is very tasty and is about the same calories as a granola bar for a similar portion while some of the pieces are chunks other pieces are single granola flakes or chips though this did not really bother me much as i like this since it is not superior in taste to the chocolate chip granola bars that i eat and since it is just too easy to eat a large portion for now i will stick with my granola bars but if portion control is not a concern then this is a great snack

i am by no means a granola connoisseur but this stuff is pretty darn tasty this product is made with all natural ingredients there honestly is not a lot of chocolate in it just the right amount it is dark chocolate but is not too bitter or too sweet overall it is just a very nice blend and tastes delicious maybe a little pricey but not a dealbreaker when considering it is made with real ingredients i would say for taste for value recommended

this granola is a mix of rolled oats and semi sweet chocolate chunks i could not find a description on the bag as to whether it is a snack or a cereal as a snack it is a bit dry for my taste and is not as sweet as the delicious quaker natural but i quite enjoyed it with milk its crunchy texture is just right and the chocolate is a treat if you like granola this is a good one a good source of fiber
i am typically a tea drinker after the first pot i made coffee every day until it was gone would definitely recommend

i am a cherry nut all the soda i drink has some sort of cherry flavour so i wanted to try this too great taste and how can i go wrong with vitamin c thrown in for good measure will be most popular with those that already drink heathy sodas such as airforce nutrisoda flex black cherry and apple ounce cans pack of

i tried another of these switch products and was less than pleased but maybe it was the flavor which i think was supposed to be watermelon the black cherry went down a lot easier although it is still a tad too acidic for me but it tastes good you know like black cherry brian w fairbanks

i tried samu on a whim thinking that it would taste like many of the other coconut water drinks out there perhaps healthy but not terribly tasty to my surprise samu is fantastic it tastes fresh has the right amount of sugar and brings a subtle pleasantness along with it the design is pretty cool and my purchase supported an independent label i highly recommend this product and am sure that i will continue to purchase it
this is a great quality olive oil with a slightly grassy overtone to the flavor it is obviously a bit more expensive than your average everyday supermarket olive oil but it is well worth the money

these are really good tasting lentils the first thing i notice was the lack of that shinny coating you see on store bought lentils when you open the big you can tell right away there is something different about these they cook easily and hold their shape and taste great
excellent snack that is healthy and nutricious my son loves it it is a tad pricier than other brands but it tastes better

this french roast is by far my favorite i like a strong tasting coffee i also like the new packaging but i am glad that i did not buy a keurig k cup holder the way this coffee is packaged you will have to put it in a covered container this type of k cup recycles better too
this product exceeded expectation makes you feel better after drinking will buy again thank you dr oz for talking about it on your show

coffee preference is just a matter of taste so my opinion regarding taste probably does not mean much you would have to try this coffee for yourself what i can tell you is that these soft bottom cups are certainly different from the usual all plastic k cups i was initially concerned about how well they would work in my keurig but after making about fifty or more brews they work perfectly no loose grinds left behind in the pod well my mug or anywhere else they cost a little less than k cups so that is a nice plus for me the minor drawback is that they come to you in plastic bags that once opened allow exposure of the pods to air simple fix i just put the remaining pods in a ziplock bag i like the taste of this french roast coffee and the fact that it is also cheaper than the competition hopefully when the patent on k cups expires this september we will see more vendors offering better prices this is probably why keurig recently came out with a new brewer the vue that uses different and patented cups

i received my package today fog chaser and was the first cup really good full body and full taste just like it came ground fresh and no i do not know or work for the company just thought you would like an honest review from someone that buys boxes of k cup coffee a month i noticed no sediment in my cup and yes they cut the corner by leaving off the pastic cup to avoid the copyright that says they would then owe kuerig a percentage which drives up the price of all coffe in k cups it is not a k cup but will fit a k cup maker and that is what they advertise i can live with putting the filter cups in a baggie i do not need to show off my coffee in a carousel so this is just great to get a subscription discount for this good of a coffee that will fit my k cup brewer

was buying the kona blend until it dried up and then the price went through the roof tried several different k cup coffees until i found the fog chaser now i have it on my subscribe and save list i have it sent to my office my home my son s home every month it are not kona but it is almost as bold the aroma fills the kitchen in the morning and that first sip is great every time and at the price of the kona it is the best bang for the buck i will never go back

as many other reviews have mentioned these are not the normal k cups but they work much the same i generally drink the stronger k cups emeril s jet fuel kona etc and i find that these fog chaser pods compare very favorably there is no bitter aftertaste just smooth flavor i have not had any sediment at the bottom of my cup i have had sediment from other k cups i think people are a bit thrown by the smell of the coffee bag when they get it as it is a much stronger smell than you will get from a box of k cups it does smell like when you open a fresh bag can of ground coffee which is sort of refreshing after using k cups for years we have just finished the first bag of days which we kept in a ziplock bag and the last cup tasted as good as the first i already placed a subscribe and save order for the french roast to try out i will be keeping my subscription for the fog chaser as it is quite good
this product makes a great cup of cofee bold but not bitter no bad after taste the smell starts the experience and the satisfied full flavor follows i will buy this product as long as it is available
pink edible pearls are a wonderful addition to cakes cookies they can instantly add sophistication to any piece

i just have to say that i agree with the first reviewer i really had a good experience with this product i was buying it for a friend it came very quickly the product is unique and it is something that everyone can use the customer service was outstanding
great tasting kids love them and i do not have to worry that there are any genetically engineered ingredients a little pricey if you do not care if they are organic
out of all their different kinds of cookies this is the one that rocks you would never know this was gluten free

i got this as a small gift for my girlfriend who was always forgetting to buy more cheap popcorn at the store i thought she would enjoy some unique and gourmet popcorn and i was right she really liked them especially the purple kind we cook it on the stove with oil and it worked perfectly however do not be an idiot like me and splash oil all over your face does not feel good popcorn has a great distinct flavor and i think we will be returning for more
this product is pretty delicious i love using stevia instead of other fake sugars because it is a natural product and seems less likely to because cancer i wish more things would use it instead

if you love the flavor of toasted pecans this coffee is for you great flavor good coffee taste it was very easy to brew the right strength what a pleasure to wake up to the smell of toasted pecans and freshly brewed coffee this is the second time i have purchased this coffee and i will definitely do it again

i received a small box of these ginger and honey crystals and i fell in love with them what a great way to bump up your cup of hot tea they are strong and i would recommend starting with a small portion i ordered two bags of thirty packs and now my daughter in law wants a pack love it

we can get these crackers locally but the price is a lot higher i absolutely love these crackers and they have a deep rich cheese flavor i will continue to purchase these crackers from amazon to complement any holiday

i am thrilled with this extract i ordered it on a tuesday night and had it by friday afternoon it came wrapped nicely in plenty of bubble wrap and tissue paper and was accompanied by a nice little note from the seller thanking me for my order it smells wonderful it smells just like cocoa powder and i use it in all my baked goods and even savory foods added to gravy it gives it that little something extra and it is phenomenal in whipped cream cookies brownies sweetbreads cakes even coffee and hot chocolate it is not a sweet extract so it gives some depth to foods without adding additiona sugar i will definitely be ordering this in the future and definitely ordering from this merchant again i am very impressed with the quality and the customer service provided

very flavorful and gives amazing taste to salads and food in general just a pinch make a huge difference in the way your food tastes like this is the only type of salt i am using since i discovered it i put it on meat fish veggies salads soups etc everything tastes better with this salt i wish they would offer it in bigger sizes i usually order at a time so they last for a while since the size is small you will not be sorry for ordering this salt
we love these little figs they are a great snack and a pop in your mouth size will definately buy them again

i got this for my kids easter basket just to have something different and they loved it it tastes great and even travels well this is a great treat to take in the car or stick in a purse for that time when you are craving ice cream but cannot have it
true the flavor does not last for a long time but it tastes great and lasts long enough

first let me say i am a huge fan of endangered species chocolate this is my first time however trying this particular mixture i love orange and chocolate as a combination but this one definitely falls short unfortunately from what i can gather and the type of bitterness it is i am guessing they add too much of the pith while creating the orange oil it has a smooth delightful start but the more you eat the more pronounced the bitter taste becomes i am disappointed by the purchase and will not order this type again
i use this treat as a reward for getting on the grooming table my three dogs line up when i pick up the grooming brush what a treat

very good tastes like original jack links only with a little more flavor very tender and not dry but a little on the salty side the bag is huge though and there is a tiny amount in the bag it is disappointing

after having been diagnosed with a thyroid nodule which later turned out to be cancer i thought i had better try to get more iodine in my and my family s diet after researching some i found that dulse is a great natural source of iodine i tried a package of this and found that it is pretty good the package came with a suggestion to stir fry it a few minutes in a hot skillet to make it like chips which i tried i and my family enjoyed it much better that way the quality of this dulse is great and the price seemed comparable with others i could find i ordered more of this and am using it as a regular supplement to our diet

this is a must have snack if you like lemonheads and almonds you cannot go wrong i found these in walgreens so i decided to give them a try i was hooked they are addicting i have been looking all over for the lemonhead almonds luckily amazon came to the rescue and i was able to purchase two bags you will not regret buying them yummy

my son loves this food combination and eats it without any complaints the ingredients are simple and the taste is straightforward no funky baby food smell like the normal food in jars often has i will buy again and again

the taste of this balsamic vingear is very good for the price vinegar comes in a spray bottle wonderful for salads cuts down on waste when you added to anything else vinegar comes in a six pack each bottle ounces price for six pack but some of the very best sells for over a ounce bottle i never tasted that quality but like i stated earlier delallo tastes deliteful its made in italy

being diabetic i always carry one of these little delicious no added sugar snacks in my purse in case i need a pick me up to prevent low blood sugar another thing in its favor is this snack is gluten free ordering from amazon is fast and they always seem to have the food products that i need

these cookies not only taste great but they are prepackaged so you can just throw them in a lunchbox when you have a child on a gluten free diet saving time on food prep is always appreciated they are definitely a favorite in my house we love them they are small in size but are the best tasting chocolate chip cookie so far that we have found gluten free

these chips make a wonderful snack they give you the crunch and saltiness that you need at times without a lot of calories they also contain protein to keep you from getting hungry again until meal time they came in a single serving size package which is nice when you are mindful of portion control i would order them again
these treats are great the dog is crazy about them they are small but he really likes them you can also use them to conceal small pills if you need to give your dog medicine

i ordered the hot mix by mistake because i did not read carefully enough it did not matter this mix is great and not burn your face off hot which i hate super easy and quick to make and very tasty highly recommended
these pistachios are a ton better than you can get at trader joe s high quality and great taste
these were the best and somehow fresher tasting that we have enjoyed yet a good buy
it tastes great i have only used it as a supplement and not in cooking also some people had given concerns over packaging but mine was completely fine
this curry paste has a geat taste we use it in soups stir fries vegetable dishes and anything you would like to add some extra zing to
if you like spicy then these are the snack crackers for you so hard to find anywhere else a really good price on here

amber our golden retriever ate this food right up she gave it stars and said it was delicious we noticed that the food is puffed up that is neither good or bad just an observation i suppose if you have limited storage space it would be an issue the food we normally give her is definitely more compact and less airy

i bought this vita coco pure coconut water for my husband he loves it he tryed all different kind of coconut drinks but there were with some preservatives and other junks there were not tasty at all this one taste great and is healthy

i love this stuff i could drink it all day long nice and smooth going down and extremely refreshing the amount you get for the price is just perfect i have caught flack because it is expensive but this is the best coconut water on the market
shipping was fast the taste is great and reminds me of drinking from a real chilled green coconut on the sidewalk in thailand

this is mostly dry croutons with very little flavor i need to try to find some way to salvage this mix as no one will eat it the way it is right now i was expecting something more like chex party mix but was greatly disappointed it should have much more flavor spice to be enjoyable as a snack mix as it is it has less flavor than a bag of salad croutons or plain pretzels
an other reviewer was right these are better then wheat thins and i bought those for a long time for the crunch i think it is the sea salt that makes them tastier
i have been trying to give up soda and i found that the sparkling ice spring water is a great substitute love the taste bob

kraft homestyle mayonnaise is rich and creamy a very good quality mayonnaise i will certainly buy more of same previously i have bought mayonnaise that sits in the fridge for ages maybe for generations this mayonnaise will go fast because it taste so good i have used on tuna hard boiled eggs and salad i highly recommend

i always have a case or two of maruchan ramen in the pantry their shrimp flavor is especially good i always drain the soup off the noodles before i serve them i especially like it with some spinach sauteed with an onion and a head of garlic seriously try it it is remarkably flavorful and costs next to nothing or just the noodles with some chopped green onion to dress them up or with a little curry powder i have tried top ramen in the past but prefer maruchan
this is a very good product and comes very close to fresh from the kitchen but breaking the clumps adding the water to get the right consistency is not as easy as one would think

this is a very nice green tea i had to try it since i love anything mango the flavor is perfect whether its hot or iced or with some creamer it smells amazing as well just like a real mango i would like it if the packing was more eco friendly like celestial seasonings but its still pretty nice the packets are individually sealed and there are no staples on on the bag so you do not get any weird taste added to the tea

my kids love hamburger helper so i figured this would be a great new product to try since anything with velveta is good it was easy to make and only took a few minutes to complete the kids absolutely loved it and i thought it tasted great too my only complaint was that visually it was unappetizing it did not look like the picture on the box it was kind of a grayish brown color and actually worried me a bit before i tried it luckily my kids and i do not really care how it looks so we all enjoyed it but kraft would benefit by working on presentation

having a busy schedule i can appreciate an easy boxed meal to cook every now and then i would have to say i prefer this brand to hamburger helper because of the taste and the quality of the product instructions were easy to follow the food was tasty and it is a nice back up to have in the pantry when you do not feel like making a meal from scratch
my husband loves velveeta shells and cheese so we had to try these very quick and easy do not need anything but the meat but you may want to add a salad or some veggies for a round dinner

this is pretty tasty if you eat this sort of thing and i will admit it is a rare guilty pleasure for me as compared to the brand that is no doubt its main competitor i thought this one tasted better probably because of the already mixed almost cheese sauce that is included which also replaces the milk that is usually added it is pretty much a toss up in terms of nutrition given that we are not looking at a nutritional champ to begin with here as prepared this one has calories per serving the other this has calories from fat the other this one has mg of sodium the other one has the kraft velveeta cheesy skillet comes out slightly ahead overall with protein of g compared to the other s g and dietary fiber of g compared to less than a gram for the competitor these differences are probably attributable to the cheese sauce the sauce also pushes this one over the edge for total fat with g for this one and for the other after the ground beef is added the difference is of the recommended daily amount vs virtually none of it good fat in either one it is significant that although both brands claim zero transfat both also list partially hydrogenated oil as one of their ingredients meaning they certainly do contain transfat just less than the half gram per serving that would require full disclosure if you eat the whole package about cups so realistically with a dinner and a leftover lunch or two you easily might you could get whacked with as much as g of transfat not to mention the saturated fat in the ground beef you add to both at grams of sodium you probably need to skip another meal that day to avoid going over the recommended daily value for sodium too you might consider fasting that day if you plan to eat more than one serving but as i said it is a guilty pleasure by definition that is not the most nutritionally sound choice that can be made in any case all other things price availability being equal i will probably choose this one if i choose it again
i was skeptical to buy this because i have bought cheap coffee before i am always disappointed with its taste this tastes great and the environmental factor is just a bonus for me

i ordered this delicious kadayif dessert for my sister s birthday with her present that i also bought it at amazon took them to my parents house to celebrate at their house everyone at the party enjoyed this delicious kadayif i served it with some turkish coffee it was the best dessert i ever tried everyone said where did i buy it from i said amazon of course they have anything and everything you want to get quality exceptional prices very low my son told everybody that i live in amazon website because i am there looking at it everyday to catch those bargains thank you amazon as allways bringing us the international flavors to our homes

this was a very pleasant surprise i was a bit hesitant when i read through the ingredients sure it sounded healthy but would it taste good in a word outstanding good crunch flavor and just the right amount of salt great to see that there is snack foods available that are a lot better for you than the usual chips and nachos the only problem is that everyone likes them so they disappear quickly

i love tortilla chips just good old fashioned corn chips with salt on them i was curious as to how these fancy tortilla chips would fare before even tasting these chips the bag shows that the company is serious about freshness it is tough and a little slippery i almost could not open it by hand the chips are little hexagons about in diameter with the various seeds clearly visible in the chips while the corn flavor is dominant the various other elements of these chips really blend well to give them a unique flavor they are not overly salty indeed if i had any quibble it is that a little more salt would be appreciated these chips would be an excellent choice for finger foods for a higher end dinner party a date or just an evening when you want to treat yourself

i liked the flavor and texture of the tortillas they are not spicy but the taste is not bland because of the olives the chips are small and the serving size in the bag is just enough for a quick satisfying snack

these chip crackers were very tasty however people who have allergies or problems digesting corn like me need to beware if you just read the front of the packet it seems as if they are made without wheat or corn not true the main ingredient is corn
these chips are great tasting you have to try them if you like sweet potatoes

i am munching on these chips as i type trying to keep the salt off my fingers and from going on the keys i like the way they taste the flavors are mainly of stone ground corn but you can tell there are other ingredients as well there is a nice nutty aftertaste i like texture too just the right amount of crunch these chips are not overly salty either another plus nutrition wise these chips rank among the more healthy versions there are only calories in a one ounce serving a lot less than the normal i see on similar products and the amount of fat and sodium is a lot lower too it is got of fiber of an average daily requirement there are no trans fats cholesterol preservatives etc it seems that the foodshouldtastegood company made a sincere effort to produce as healthy a product as was possible given the ingredients and requirement to make something that tastes good one reviewer said the chips were too hard and tasted stale my own experience was that the chips tasted fresh and were crunchy but by no means any harder or crunchier than a regular tortilla chip the expiration date on the bag is in november with no preservatives it seems odd that the bag the other reviewer tried had an expiration date more than a year away my only hesitation would be the price currently these chips are not in stock on amazon and there is no pricing given so i would say you would have to evaluate whether or not you wanted to pay that much for chips even though they seem better for your health than other brands and they taste good as well

i just got home from a long trip and was faced with making dinner luckily the velveeta cheesy skillet dinner was sitting in my pantry i browned a pound of chicken breast strips and followed the directions it was a quick and easy dinner for the family and everyone enjoyed it the ingredients come in different packets the pasta orzo i think seasonings dehyrated broccoli and velveeta cheese sauce after browning the chicken just add the seasoning and pasta along with about cups of water and cover in about or minutes add the dehydrated broccoli and cook another minutes then remove from heat and add the cheese sauce my kids loved it and there was plenty for everyone i found it to be better tasting than chicken helper and easier to prepare my only complaint was the miniscule amount of broccoli it was more like a sprinkling of dried parsley than broccoli florets of course you can always add your own fresh or frozen broccoli or other veggies to make it healthier and heartier overall a good choice for a hectic night when you do not have much time to cook and a lot of hungry little mouths to feed

wanted apricots to try making gluten free granola while i would have preferred unsulphered apricots they are so nasty looking i did not think my family would eat them everyone loves these very good price too

i mix this seasoning with hunts bbq sauce and the mix taste great on chicken the only problem this product has is that if the enviroment you live is a bit humid the seasoning absorbs the humidity of the ambient and hardens
i have made these for friends both gluten intolerant and not and everybody loves these they do not taste like they are gluten free excellent job by nuffins to mix convenience with quality and health

great tasting rich flavor perfect for making a nice hot cup of mocha i bought this to test it against hershey s syrup for my mocha and there is an incredible distinct taste difference that is noticeable this is much richer and tastes more like chocolate and less sugary then hershey s syrup

gerber s peach cobbler tastes amazing just like real peach cobbler but without the added sugars and butter my husband and i tried it to see why our daughter liked it so much and we quickly figured out that it was the best tasting baby food we have purchased and at a great price

this soup is quick and tasty microwaves in no time let it sit a few minutes so the tofu and seaweed can mature to full blossom i purchased thinking it was a miso soup but it is not at least related to the miso soups i get at my local oriental restaurants
will definitely buy again i sent this to a deployed soldier who shared it with the other boys and they all love it great flavour

while these are expensive for the calories they are one of few foods that can actually be eaten before strenuous exercises such as biking i also like these at when i am rolling out of my sleeping bag to summit a mountain very tasty indeed

this is really yummy instant coffee i like the fine powdery texture however i am not convinced it is organic coffee as the amazon description states the can does not say anything regarding organic ingredients maybe since it is produced outside the us it is not labeled as such but i will not be re ordering due to that
these taste fantastic and amazon sells them for a less expensive price than my local health food store thank you amazon
these grapes are very tasty the right mixture of sweet and tart very light and so good i ate the whole bag in day i will purchase it again

coffee flavor is so personal i love the taste of this coffee i gave one to a friend at work and he thought it was much to strong he freely admits that he has no problem drinking the company supplied coffee that sits in the big metal coffee urn all day my other friend drinks this kona blend black and he loves it i am not a huge coffee snob i drink maxwell house french roast at home i look forward to having a good tasting cup of coffee at work and this really fits the bill i put sweetener and cream in my coffee so it is important to get coffee that has flavor can stand up to the added ingredients even with cream and sugar the flavor is bold and smooth
the chocorooms are so good and tasty with no cholesterol the kids love them and they are a perfect size for them to think they are getting a lot of sweets

these were pretty tasty they do not stick in your teeth like other fruit snacks which is a huge plus but even better they are all natural and good for you i will buy them again for sure soon when this box runs out

you can smell the spinach it seems fresh and tastes wonderful i fed it to my son when we were on the go during his babyfood stage and gave it to my preschooler as a snack now both often reach for these as a snack and i am happy to offer them something other than cheerios or graham crackers when we are on the go

my son loves these pouches it is a quick and easy way to get fruits and veggies into a picky eater he loves the flavor and will grab these from me and eat the entire pouch i love that it is organic and healthy the fruits overpower the veggies which helps in making the flavor more acceptable to younger children it is easy to grab on the way out of the door as a quick snack or as a complement to eating out i highly recommend

they used to carry a large jar of this at a local store but i never saw it again after a few years ago and was deeply saddened it is delicious with brie on a cracker though i found out i am allergic to dairy so no more for me but it can also be used as a glaze eaten on french bread toast or in spoonfuls from the jar i love this stuff i only wish it came in a big tub that would last you the rest of your life

this was the first time we have had tings a friend told us about them and since since they ended up being per bag we gave them a shot my daughter has a severe milk intolerance and i have a wheat allergy and it is rare to find something delicious that we can both have my daughter is years old and can now enjoy cheetos just like her friends and they taste wonderful i am so thankful for products like these that taste good help us feel normal and are affordable if i could give stars i would
the chips had an odd texture tasting nothing like a corn chip the seasoning was more of a salsa flavor than a cheese it was even difficult to give these away to people

since i am vegetarian i do not use meat with this but rather a bunch of portobello mushrooms and a whole onion turns out fantastic and the leftovers are even better the next day could use a few more noodles in the box but i just buy egg noodles separately and add a few
i had these when in the phillippines and then when i came had to have some more even though this a large bag we go through these fast in about two weeks

much fresher than the usual sun maid i buy at store less sugar too so they taste at a much higher quality i will continue to buy these in bulk to save hopefully the seller is reading my interview and sends me a code for discount since i gave a generous review

it is somewhat hard to find a macadamia syrup but i happen to love this particular flavor my first order off amazon of a different brand broke and was then discontinued so i gave this one a try and i am happy i did it is quite tasty and comes with a pump which is a nice touch there are quite a few servings in each bottle and it is perfect for italian soda also from a practical standpoint they are using plastic bottles for the shipped product which makes it much less likely to break in transit
this is absolutely delicious my husband has had it on vanilla ice cream every night since it arrived just the right blend of chocolate and raspberry
i love blueberry coffee and this was very good but if you purchase do not get whole bean get it ground before they send it the oils in the flavoring make it tough on some grinders

i bought this product from vitacost i really enjoyed the fresh healthy flavor i decided to purchse from amazon because it is in bulk thereore cheaper it sso worht it i have tried a lot this mix really impressed me no chocolate to melt in the car
my husband and i love this ketchup to me the taste is better than the regular heinz ketchup the color and texture are exactly the same but the flavor is better you cannot beat organic

the spice and flavor go hand in hand so i usually add all of the flavor packet i make these slightly soupy and i often discard a little of the broth to reduce sodium levels spare my digestive tract from the ravages of my taste buds also great and more of a meal with egg stirred in near the end i could eat these every day but alas that would have dire consequences taking the nutritional drawbacks as a given these are for price flavor

if you like spicy noodles and do not really feel like taking time to make it this comes really close instant noodle at its best just boil some water toss the noodles in add some vegie kamaboko tofu whatever you like and have that will actually look like a fancy bowl of noodles when you are done in less than mins

they are not for the faint of heart i get so bored with most foods that claim to be spicy hot but shin ramyun delivers and it is not just hot it is got great taste i have been buying them by the pack for years and loving every bite

this ramen is so good i also bought the neoguri also a good choice if you like seafood i would highly recommend this it microwaves well i use pyrex i am deployed on a ship and it was sent out here pretty quick relatively speaking ok lol and none of the ramen was damaged during vertrep it is spicy definitely seriously spicy i cook it with minimal water so it stays that way i love it will buy again it is pretty much the highlight of my day
i enjoy these noodles over most other noodles it is spicy enough to make my nose run which i like and the noodles have a nice texture to them
this is a knockout bold coffee it is great cup at the setting with tons of flavor have not tried it yet at the setting but assume it will still pack a flavor punch great deal in the pack
if you like bold taste then add it to your cart because you will love this coffee this is one of my variety that i choose on a morning i need a jump start or a lecture from my mom ha

just when i got my shipment i tried it out on my pit but he only ate portion of it and he never ate it after that so i also tried it on my rottweiler and she does not like it also the only way they would eat it is if i add some caned meat with it then they would but that should not be the case so i do not recommend

rarely can i say that a gf product tastes better than the gluten version thse cookies do though melt in your mouth delicious and just the right amount of lemon i am confident tht if you gave these to gluten eaters they would not be able to tell the difference
these little cookies taste fantastic not too sweet just right chocolate melts easily so we will be ordering these in the cooler months only

this product is very tasty but if you are also lactose intolerant better forgo the pleasure milk is not listed on the allergy advisory may contain traces of but the ingredients section lists whole milk powder as a component of the chocolate coating otherwise it is a great product
this was beyond my expectations the variety was a great blend of different soups and so easy to fix even my husband liked them i quickly ordered another set because it was so good tasty and easy
i love regular merengue cookies and i normally do not have a problem with sugar free but these cookies had a terrible taste and worse texture stick to the non sugar free
this tea has the real flavor of pumpkin it is nicely spiced and perfect for an autumn afternoon it is quite highly caffeinated so i do not drink it late at night but overall a lovely tea
this fondant was very smooth and easy to work with along with having a good taste you do not always get good taste in fondant
definitely a very good jerky not dry or chewy at all very tasty did not need any extra flavoring we went thru the packs pretty fast even though they were supposed to last a while
we use this popcorn in an air popper on the weekends it is delicious and tastes much better than anything we have been able to find in the stores

i was looking for a hulless popcorn due to my diverticulitis boy do i miss popcorn and tried this based on the reviews i was disappointed that this has way to many hulls for me the hulls do not disappear or get so small but the flavor of the popcorn is amazing very very tasty my family loves it so i will buy it again we air popped it sprayed it with a little cooking oil and sprinkled some popcorn flavored seasoning butter hardly any calories but lots of taste they are tiny when they pop so you really should not flood it with anything heavy or it will turn to mush

i bought this from my local health food store it has a wonderful coconut taste i use it in everything from my morning oatmeal to yogurt i put some in my dogs food and their coats have been so shiny and soft i also suffer from a dry flakey scalp so i massage a small amount into my hair and let it sit for minutes before i shampoo it out it leaves my hair so soft and shiny it is a great waterproof mascara remover too i will be buying this item in bulk i love all the benefits coconut oil has to offer

these almonds are the best i love the tasted but was not quite as zippy or strong as i had hoped i do eat lots of hot items so perhaps my taste buds are expecting more having said that the flavor and freshness is tops
this was my first time ordering from this company they are fast and a great product will def be ordering more flavorings in the future
this is a great olive oil great price i love colavita products in general delivery was fast shipping was a bit pricey
this is a really great product not sweet at all the name describes it perfectly however i am not sure why it is a case i would buy it in the store much cheaper

this has a strong granny smith apple taste i eat apples all the time so if anyone says otherwise they are mistaken same texture just a different and better taste now i am purchasing three packs a week because it taste so good tasty enough to substitute an unhealthy dessert for this tasty treat
very good flavor and not filled with a bunch of chemicals although there are still questions about some of the ingredients it is a great alternative to what is on the shelf in the grocery store

a must for anyone who loves to cook this sauce along with the raspberry chipotle are so tasty and add a nice twist to spice up otherwise boring chicken and steak also makes a nice and cost effective gift

at first i thought i would not like these i like fig newtons but i do not love them however i could not be more pleased first of all my first bite tasted like an oatmeal cookie i immediately checked the ingredients and yep there is oats in there absolutely delicious there are bits and pieces of fig scattered throughout the cookie or thin but it is not like a spread now i am not sure if it is supposed to be spread between thins but its like spots of fig here and there and the fig is kind of hard and chewy but fortunately or unfortunatley there is very little fig so it is not that big of a deal i could not taste the honey but that is ok i absolutely love oatmeal cookies and it tasted like that they are a nice size and crisp i dunked them in my tea and they were delicious my hubby hates fig and i slipped these in his lunch and he loved them too he did not even taste the fig these are very good however if you really really want to taste fig get the regular fig newtons
these are good but i think i was spoiled by the blueberry flavor they are my favorite i like the whole line because they use better quality ingredients these are delicious but i would like more figs

i am a very satisfied customer in which will purchase again i could not receive them fast enough thank you

i am a jasmine tea lover might leaf organic spring jasmine is so reasonably priced it has the taste of of a tea that make you believe it is a very expensive exotic chinese tea a cup in the afternoon is so special the foil bag keeps the tea fresh

first of all i was very surprised to get this so fast i just ordered it yesterday and it was at my doorstep before am which never happens anyway i opened it and had a serving and was shocked that it tasted pretty good now for those who have tried vegan drinks you know that they are not always the best tasting thing but this is definitely one of the better drinks i have had i will be reordering this and i will now try the other flavors and hope they are as good as this one
if this is as healthy as it is tasty then a great product a little pricey for only servings but that organic red dutch cocoa is delectable

we do not grill steaks if we are out of this product it really is that good in fact we have turned so many friends onto this after having them over for perfectly grilled meat if you love charred outside and medium rare to medium well done fantastic we have tried several other flavors they have and while they are good this is our favorite by far
i am trying to get away from drinking diet soda so i decided to try sparking water with lemon i love the taste of this brand and amazon has a great price

this is a tasty flavor but not one i could drink everyday the honey flavor makes it a little sweet for my palette but for a dessert coffee it works wonderfully i will not but this for everyday repeated use but it is a good special treat flavor
this is our favorite chicken seasoning sauce add orange juice in a bag along with this sauce chicken pieces and toss easy and the chicken tastes better than el polo loco s

i really like this coffee for both the taste and the size of the cup i can brew one cup and get a full size cup unlike so many of the other selections that only give a small cup of coffee in the mornings i want a full cup of coffee to go i do not want to full around with a small sample besides that the taste suits me we have tried lots of the others but i have since settled on this one for my taste try it i think you will agree with me
this tonic water is the best it does not contain high fructose corn syrup so it tastes better buy it you will not regret it

wow we have never had so much macaroni and cheese in a long time and annie s is really really good this does not need additional milk or butter and the sauce is an easy to squeeze out paste in a foil package it tastes great and makes a great receptacle for some creativity of your own too tips to enjoy it just boil in plenty of water the six cup requirement is a minimum drain quickly put the pasta back in the hot pot the remaining heat is just right to melt the thick cheesy sauce into the macaroni do not rinse the pasta in cold water it will make it hard for the sauce to combine well all the deluxe versions are animal rennet free annie s faq is very specific about which ones use vegetable rennet not all do but amazon is not picking up the information i tag the really vegetarian ones animal rennet free whenever i can try blending sundried tomatoes a fresh tomato olive oil garlic pizza peppers salt freshly ground pepper and a touch of balsamic vinegar into a paste this really complements the mac and cheese and gives it a new gourmet taste that still does not take away from the mac and cheesiness of it tabasco chipotle sauce makes a great addition for the adventurous the smoky taste is tempered by the creaminess

placed my order and shipping was fast the product arrived in great condition and they tasted wonderful i recommend them to other family members who also purchased them after i finish my review i am going to buy more great taste and great value
the price great the only thing that could be better is an assortment

i love these meal replacement bars i warm one up in the microwave almost every day for breakfast they are nutritious and delicious and keep me full all the way until lunch i decided to go with the subscribe and save feature and get these for a great price
i have trouble finding anything like these in the stores so i was happy to find them here they taste great and are a very good bargain

tastes great good price i eat them after lunch when i am craving something sweet donuts and pastries mess up your diet but these are great to get the sugar you crave in a low calorie treat i get them through subscribe and save best way to go

these have got to be the best tasting gluten free cookies i have ever tasted i was just blown away by the taste and texture my husband could not believe it was gluten free i will not buy another brand pamelas products extreme chocolate simple bites gluten free

these taste great very sweet and flavorful without the aftertaste of conventional candies lbs requires a bit of a financial investment but it is a great value if you are a natural candy lover this comes shipped in a plastic bag so i recommend getting a plastic tub or a using an old popcorn tin for storage gallon size or thereabouts

i hope i do not offend but i am not a regular visitor to starbucks it is not because i do not like them but it is because i usually have my coffee at home their product is actually pretty good from the few times i have been to one of their stores this product ranks high on my list of prepackaged coffees light as i like it but very flavorful it is a nice way to start the day do not shy away from it because it has a chain restaurant brand it is actually pretty good

loved the depth of flavor in the vanilla flavored starbucks coffee i really loved that the rich coffee could still be tasted through the flavoring the vanilla complimenting rather than overpowering tastes like a true vanilla bean not just sugary syrup i only wish that starbucks and everyone else who has flavored coffee would include nutrition facts on the side not sure why coffee does not see to have to but i wish they would

i have had many different types of starbucks coffee and there are very few i do not like i do not really care for the more mild blends but this has a nice taste to it i usually prefer a dark bold brew like french but this milder tasting coffee did not disappoint it has a smooth subtle vanilla flavor and is a nice alternative for a change the smell of vanilla fills the kitchen as it brews it is made with latin american beans and has natural ingredients bring the empty bag to starbucks when you are done and you will get a free coffee overall the taste quality i will give stars
this is a product i have tried before and always have come back to great aroma flavor and value wikll buy again and again
it arrived in a timely manor and in great shape by ordering on line i saved close to and could not be more happy
the gaint slim jims taste so much better if you keep them in the refrig for some reason make great snacks on the run
i enjoy slimjim tabasco for the spicy taste and a quick fix for something simple and on the go with any kind of cheese brings out more spice zion
it contains too much fat and when you bite it than you can feel the fat in your mouth it is disgusting
my husband love monster slim jims alot cheaper to buy it by packs then pieces he ate packs in a month he is something but anyways i do recommend this to everyone great price for great products
it is a flavorful snack that provides enough flavor but is not too salty nor that boring of a snack it is a pretty good alternative to potato chips or any other snack product

organic green tea with absolutely fantastic aroma is hard to find this is a great example of a great tea the leaves are very large when they open up which is how the tea is supposed to be aroma is not overwhelming great will buy again and again
have been using this bean to make the morning mocha s for about months its a good quality bean makes a nice dark flavorful espresso with good crema highly recommended

i do not have time for much shopping and finding any sassafras drink is nearly impossible for me ordering this from amazon saves me time and and gas money it tastes good too i mix it into a mr beer bottle then carbonate it with the fizz giz soda maker in this manor i am controlling what the sweetener is and how much i use the sweetener that you use will make a big difference taste

i tried a pack randomly today at starbucks i wanted something different from the banana bread or chocolate covered graham crackers that i would otherwise buy this is some solid trail mix i highly recommend as a matter of fact i am on amazon now to buy more of it so i can let friends try

thought i would give these a try because i was looking for an afternoon slightly sweet snack bar that is high in protein low fat and great tasting well these are high in protein which i like are low in fat which i like but i think in their processing to make it low fat they compromised on the flavor i was expecting a more natural peanut butter taste but was disappointed with the texture and taste artificial i will not buy these again i am stuck now with the whole box my hunt continues for that great snack bar

real food organic corn thins are great tasting they go perfect with let us do lunch s healthy eating program their are so many ways to eat them i like them plain or with honey spread on them for a snack melt low fat cheese on them then add a slice of fresh tomato and basil i put them in the food processor or ninja and make flour out of them the flour makes great pancakes there is endless ways to use them real foods organic corn thins original flavor ounce bag pack of

this healthy request version of chunky chicken noodle is delicious it tastes the same as the regular version which is not true of all of the varities of healthy request soup before i start to warm the soup i add a package of ramen noodles without the flavoring packet the ramen noodles absorb the chicken flavor of the liquid for a great taste and makes for an inexpensive and filling complete meal that is quick and easy to prepare with much less salt than the regular version

no gluten free diets here but i buy it and make it fat free by substituting apple sauce for butter sweetener for sugar skim milk for buttermilk and extra egg whites for eggs i know sounds dreadful but it tastes suprisingly good the best mix i have tried for the fat free adaptation
i love this i have made it for cornbread and also to use as breadcrumbs for cornbread dressing it is great to have cornbread again since being diagnosed with celiac

those who label this as weak and tasteless must be used to drinking straight espresso because this is very good tasting coffee and not weak at all although sometimes i question amazon reviews generally this is a delicious cup of coffee not to strong not too weak i tend to lean towards strong coffee personally i do have complaint though it did not seem to brew a larger cup than that of my other t discs i really doubt if that is ounces that being said i prefer this to my starbucks blend t discs starbucks is a slight bitter in comparison this is richer and a perfect middle ground between dark and light brew with terrific flavor

if these are as nutritious as they are tasty it is a fabulous alternative to real apples these are not the fully dried apples you may have had they are partially dehydrated with a nice chewy texture they are a little tart but i am not sure if that is the apples or the sulfur dioxide it is a pleasant tart in any event hope sulfur dioxide is not a dangerous ingredient as it is all there is except apples quality of the source fruit is excellent no core seeds skin or other bad bites i should also mention that this is a rather large serving i snack on these in my office and one bag serves as about four calorie snacks for me so it is a much better buy than it might appear

this company has the best quality tasting baby food so i buy them all even though the packaging is kind of messy to scoop out of this flavor is my little ones favorite and it is made of healthy quality ingredients i have tasted all of their foods and understand why my little one gobbles this right down and spits out other baby food

i live in a major metrpolitan area and have a vacation home in florida the florida home is in a city that does not have a craft coffee shop i do not count starbucks as a craft coffee shop i puchased an espresso machine for florida and i am using the lavazza pods to make espresso and coffee drinks using espresso the results are outstanding the espresso is bold smooth and flavorful best of all little to no cleanup just toss the used pod in the garbage and you are done i buy the box of and the cost is about cents per pod
my entire family of love this popcorn we are all big popcorn lovers and are very picky we have converted to this brand my only complaint is that now we go through popcorn twice as fast

my mom loved iced coffee living in sacramento hot coffee just is not appealing when its outside but you want your coffee fix so she brewed up a whole pot of coffee using the version of the coffee maker the percolator coffee maker the coffee was not that good but you could make a lot of it and then refrigerate it pour it over ice and sweeten and cream it to taste yumm starbucks makes it easier you just purchase the frappuccino mocha pop it into the refrigerator let it cool down pour it over ice and you have delicious iced coffee sweetened and creamed just how i like it what is not to like it is expensive but i suppose when you add in the cost of the half n half the coffee the sugar and the time to make it it is not that bad it is really more of an indulgence than a necessity i like to have a couple of bottles in the fridge during the summer for those times when i want something cold to drink but do not want to have a soft drink iced coffee sometimes is just what you want moderately highly recommended five stars for taste five stars for the convenience three stars for the price over all a winner

i am an experienced cook but new to indian so this spice box was the best way for me to jump in and test the waters this was out of stock at the time i wanted it so i contacted the ajanta site directly and spoke to the owner and author of the accompanying cookbook who signed my book at their west coast ca restaurant and it was shipped promptly the next day and i rec d it two days later mind you i am on the east coast in ny i could not have been more pleased with the speedy delivery i was impressed with the spice box too everything was in its place and the top of the lid is mapped out in alphabetical order just like a box of chocolates so you can quickly find the specific spice you want a veritable file cabinet of spices someone else mentioned that theirs arrived all jumbled up so i have to assume that it got that way in shipping mine was pristine and thoroughly organized with a gold sticker sealing it down lovely enough to gift having all spices in front of you to see touch and smell is easier to learn about too better than just seeing illustrations in a book all in all as a beginner of indian cooking this was an economical and practical way to try almost of the necessary spices needed for any cookbook of indian cuisine i highly recommend it

i was looking for a light cookie biscuit to have with tea in the afternoons that was low in calorie and sugar i naturally went to sprouts formerly henry s looking for this first since they have all the natural items i picked these up to try thinking that i liked the taste of honey gram plus they were percent natural and pieces has just calories all criteria s were met later that night when i had them with tea i also loved the flavor i will be a regular buyer now
