first you can either soak or spray this product if you are lazy like i am you can put it in a spray bottle spray your produce in a colander in the sink and rinse a bit later i have never had it affect the taste or appearance of food in any way with the exception of when it starts to clean the wax from apples the wax turns whiter starts to chip off when i have used the soak method i have seen the dirty water after so i do feel like this does a nice cleaning job i love this stuff and many grocery chains do not carry it reliably so it is great that amazon has it
these taste great and exactly like their ingredients also they do not have too much sugar the only thing that i would watch out for is the fat content since each little bar have of fat

i want to begin by saying that i am no cacao expert this is the first time i have tried it i wanted to try it for three reasons honestly a trusted friend suggested it i am always looking for healthy snacks to fill my day i am on the go constantly cacao s supposed health benefits i am not saying it does or does not have them just alluding to the fact that i am no health nutritional expert so here is what i think these are going to be an acquired taste like beer actually they very much remind me of a red wine a burgundy maybe the bag even smells like wine when you open it up they are very tiny pieces they are very crunchy if you have teeth that are very sensitive i would think twice about getting these upon tasting them on the front of the palate it tasted very much like a red wine then slightly bitter and moving to the back of the palate it tasted very earthy and you got the flavor of cocoa powder then swallow you are going to want something to rinse it down it is a little grainy at that point i like the texture and i like the taste but then again i like wine i have mixed it into yogurt and i find it rather good you get less of the wine bitter flavors and more of the earthy and traditional cocoa powder flavors i use honey flavored greek yogurt i also eat them plain as little nibbles they do not bother me that way either a little wake me up if the flavor really offends you but you want the health benefits you can order organic sugar cacao nibs do an internet search they are tossed with organic cane syrup i will try those for a treat soon that is all i got cheers
saw this on dr oz so of course i had to try it bitter bitter bitter only way you could eat it was mixed with yogurt and did it help increase my metabolism like dr oz said it would very doubtful
this and most of the malt o meal brand cereals taste just as good as the major name brands but not the with the high price great if your on any kind of a budget
all the fancy feast appetizers are top quality and cats love them they are a little pricey but because my cats enjoy them so much i purchase them on a regular basis

this is one of my all time favorite candies lays used to have a slogan bet you cannot eat just one and there is no doubt for me that is the case with these my biggest problem with these is i cannot leave them alone and my waistline is suggesting i should

i first tried violet mints several years ago and loved them i recently found them again offered here at amazon and i had to buy them the flavor is unlike any other mint or candy you may buy it truly is a floral smell and taste that is quite delicious whenever i eat them i usually get comments from others as to how good or fresh my breath smells i would highly recommend violet mints once you try them you will know why o

i am never a big fan of any kind of cold cereal i bought this cereal only because i need some quick easy food that is also healthy wow i was so surprised this is the most tasty cereal that i have ever had it definitely does not taste as boring as the usual healthy products and it is indeed healthy eating cereal is fun now i am so glad that i gave it a try will definitely buy more

my whole family loves this stuff tastes great and has a great texture also the granola has a puffed texture so it is not as hard as some other granolas the pumpkin seeds give it a great flavor and it is good both with cold milk or warmed as a hot cereal
the wife had me buy it for her it actually tastes good with nothing more than a little on it not real hard like some of the cereals that make your mouth hurt from chewing it up

our family loves all of the worthington loma linda products but i was concerned about meatless hot dogs since i think most of them remind me of play doh fortunately the veja links are very tasty and they are nice and firm like real hot dogs buying these cases from amazon grocery is a nice deal too i hope they continue to carry them
i did not care for the taste or texture i was able to get rid of these by sharing them at parties
these were very good bought three count boxes and only two pieces were a little bit hard on the top layer of the petite four would not hesitate to buy again very very good

great quality great price i am using this after my workouts instead of sugary gatorade or similar you can even mix in some whey powder after resistance training for an added protein boost tastes great organic too this is the best deal i have found on coconut water so far
these are one of my favorite rice cake flavors they are just a little sweet and a great healthy snack between meals will order again
the blueberry flavor is amazing works well w sparkling water or adding a dash of flavor to lemonade the product arrived fast and the price was great
these were delicious i would definitely recommend this for a snack or a wedding this was a great purchase for my husband and me

in my constant search for gluten free products i was happy to find this snack bar generally this type product leaves much to be desired taste wise i am very pleased with the taste of this bar and will continue to use it i will probably end up trying all the flavors i have been happy to find amazon carries such a good variety of gluten free foods
this is good if you like hay for breakfast also it gets soggy quickly if you add mueslix it greatly improves it

this macaroni and cheese is the only kind that both the adults and the kids in our family enjoy it has a slightly sharp cheddar flavor that makes it taste so much better than the processed cheese food types our whole family swears by annie s homegrown deluxe shells real aged wisconsin cheddar and it is much cheaper buying them here than one at a time at the grocery store
it is hard to find whole bean decaf coffee in the first place but finding one that actually tastes great is even better
like everything about these except for the grams of fat i would like to see it about half that amount or less
some coconut oil has no taste or a bad after taste efagold oil tastes like coconut love it we use it for every thing

i am trying to get more whole grains in my diet and try as i might i detest whole grain bread these crackers are a wonderful substitute crisp and pretty tasty as well i love them with cheese the only reason i knocked off a star is once you unwrap the package you really need to put the whole thing in a ziplock bag there is no way to reseal so they stay fresh
i love these noodle bowls they taste very good and you can easily add to them if you want such as chix or more veggies i have referred many friends to using them
this power really gets me ready to workout without making me jittery i do find that i can workout a little harder longer without feeling exhausted love the taste too
my wife is now addicted to this she uses it to make her own style of salad dressing and of course it is great for making garlic bread this is too good we need to buy another one real soon
i like this produce because it added up favor in my smoothies good for health and easy to use but the price is a little too high
had this fabulous oil at my daughters wedding at frankies in brooklyn ny just had to order some extremely fast delivery and they even included a personal note highly recommend

my husband loves this tea out of all of the slimming teas he has tried this is my favorite a good minty and refreshing taste other slimming teas are very licoricey or bitter this one is nice i am not sure how much it slims or suppresses appetite as he usually drinks it after he eats i have told him a million times it is supposed to be the other way around however we like drinking it nonetheless best price we have found is the bulk pack on amazon
it is very hard finding this item in the stores i use it on meats dips and even gravy it has a great blend of garlic and herbs i even gave my daughter some of the boxes now she is hooked
this chocolate is very smooth rich and full bodied in flavor it makes great truffles cookies or whatever it is used for melts evenly and can be used for hot chocolate drinks too
this brand is the best tasting ever no bitter flavor at all filtering the tea after brewing assures a clear beverage
what a convenient and tasty product love these cups tuck in your purse stroller car or to work very affordable love the packs

first great value for this sport drink and second the tropical fruit flavor is good even better cold i used it to train for a marathon and i will continue to use it i always feel great and keeps me hydrated on those long runs seems to give me the energy and hydration i need also i switched it from frs which is also good but the citros powder on the frs seemed to stay longer on your mouth not this one mixes very well too fast with no lumps
the taste is great tropical punch you have to dilute from the measurements they gave you or its way to strong only knock is that if its not drunk immediately it collects at the bottom
i use about and scoops in my oz bottle and it tastes great it allows me to drink more than i would plain water which is the best way to stay hydrated so far no complaints

i have been drinking the original cheribundi for a bit now but it was a tad expensive so i checked out amazon and they had it for a bit less i discovered they have additional flavors like the ginger cherry cherries help calm inflammation which is why i picked it up the first time i have a bottle about every other day and use it to flavor my homemade kombucha great item

i do not eat chips often but when i do these are some of my favorites they have all the flavor and texture of traditional tortilla chips but it is the subtle lime flavoring that makes them special the lime flavoring appears to be a seasoning that has been sprinkled on some chips have minimal flavor and i find myself looking for those with the most still none of them have quite enough for my tastes i wish that these chips had more than just a hint of lime
i bought this for a trial run with my new meat grinder and it was excellent it took a total of two days for shipping and the price was great too
this is a great tasting healthy drink but for some reason mine did not come with straws
this has too high of a sugar content i did not know they add sugar to coconut water its supposed to be natural i am trying to avoid processed sugar this is my last order

i bought this as an impulse buy today i am really trying to cut out soda from my diet i am a pepsi junkie i will admit it and i have the waistline to prove it so i brought my water bottle and honestly i hate water so i shot three squirts of this into a oz bottle and it is good tastes good mixes well it is a tad pricey but it is either that or go back to my pepsi i like it recommended

buying a latte from a coffee shop or fast food place can be expensive and contain many calories i was surprised to see that hill bros has brought out an instant mix called skinny latte with has grams of fat and only calories it takes tbsp for every fl oz of boiling water and it taste great

i had high hopes for this product it was reviewed on the local morning news and i got the impression that it was a good low calorie substitute for ice cream in my opinion it is not a good substitute at all it does not taste like peanut butter at all and barely tastes like chocolate my daughter tasted it and thought it tasted gross i would not go that far but i will never buy it again especially since it costs so much more than ice cream i will probably take the suggestions of other reviewers and use it as a base for a shake i have only tried the chocolate peanut butter flavor so i cannot vouch for the other flavors
excellent fine ground coffee that easily bests more well known brands it is aromatic and tasty without bitterness for the price currently about for can on an amazon subscription you cannot beat it

i have been buying the fireworks popcorn from amazon and have been very happy with it i bought this to try something different first of all i was disappointed by the rather small container for the price but then i was very disappointed by the taste i use canola oil in an electric popper this popcorn had a slight taste of insecticide i tasted it in every batch from the jar it was a very distinctive and unpleasant taste

it is a great product i got some while i was in england and brought some home to share with my family my children ate the entire box at no time very tasty crunchy too bad it is so expensive to buy it here in the you s

since visiting hawaii i have fallen in love with passion fruit juice this flavor is hard to find even in california often other tropical flavors are mixed in this tastes exactly like i expected it too it is very concentrated i am happy with about an ounce in a ounce bottle i add water ice and splenda to taste the directions say to mix the ounce bottle with more bottles of water makes over a gallon as far as i can tell it is unsweetened it does contain some preservatives including cirtic acid sodium bezoate and metabisulphite this comes from brazil great product i use it for juice to flavor greek yogurt and to add to a white or yellow cake for a tropical flavor you can also make a great pie follow your favorite lemon chiffon recipe and use this instead of the lemon juice i will be buying more i bought bottles same shipping cost as one bottle
this true bar is very tasty and feeling and a great pick me up between meals the flavors are great and and it does not leave you dry in the mouth like some bars do
the simply bars are the best tasting gluten free dairy soy free bars that i have tried to date you will not be disappointed

i had purchased some extract beans from another company and was looking forward to trying the higher grade beans when i opened the package which arrived promptly i was not blown away by a heavenly aroma of vanilla and at first was dissapointed the beans however were are moist and plump and when i made a custard with them the flavor was rich and heavenly i put the beans into a couple zip lock bags and put them away and a couple days i started smelling this amazing smell like really nice pipe tobacco it of course was the beans i bought a nice airtight container for them these are fantastic and far far better than anything i have ever gotten from the grocery store i will be buying these again and again

these are better than regular pretzels they are light and crunchy with a buttery taste i am so glad to have found these they restored hope that i can have good food without the aftermath that typically comes with eating my mother who has no problem with gluten tried them and liked them she even packed up some to take with her after tasting them she was surprised because she thought they were going to be salty like normal pretzels

i was shocked after tasting these to find that i like these better than other pretzels that are not gf which is great due to having to switch to gf diet this makes a wonderful snack and the price is not that bad even in the store meijer s by me and whole foods both carry

an excellent product that holds up well not soggy and very tasty these rice noodles are especially wonderful in soup on the box there is a terrific recipe i immediately tried my husband and i loved it

the banana flavor lean body has a great taste it does not have the watered down nutri sweet taste to it either i have been very satisfied with the lean body ready to go shakes so far although i have not yet tried all the flavors my husband usually drinks the pure protien ready to go shakes and he recently got a hold of mine and now he wants me to buy the lean body ones for him because they taste so much better i told him he cannot because they are more expensive then his but i do not think he is going to let me get away with it

i bought blue sky organic black cherry pop at a local health store along with their orange while i found the orange to taste a bit flat and un orange the black cherry was outstanding just the right amount of sweet not over powering at all i do not like my drinks to taste like they are full of high fructose corn syrup the cane juice gives it the taste it needs and a healthful reprieve from hfc the cherry flavor was decently bold and very refreshing i love that amazon has this pop for sale and as an option for repete orders because i cannot afford to buy it from the health store too often

i am not a coffee drinker but tea is what wakes me up in the morning this is a great black tea with a wonderful flavor i french press it to bring out the flavor this loose leaf tea is perfect for this i have never enjoyed a cup of tea more than this one

all of the mrs dash marinates are wonderful they are quick and delicious we initially tried them for their health benefits but the flavor is why we continue to buy them i highly recommend every flavor
these were excellent for the price the gummies were soft and fresh and tasted great i am looking forward to purchasing them again in the near future

i have purchased two of these products and the only reason my review is stars instead of is because on my second shipment the cap was loose on one of the bottles and it ended up pouring all over the other bottles in the carton i was wondering why all my bottles were sticky until i hit the one that was almost completely empty otherwise great drink
everyone in my house loves these cookies even my sister who is not into healthy foods

my wife and i love to cook this product is excellent we have used it as directed and the results were great pulled pork we also have added our own spin by adding other spices and herbs or a little wine mccormick s bbq pulled pork has never let us down whether used as directed or adding a few of our favorite flavors we have always had mouth watering exceptional pulled pork if you have not tried this product please do yourself a favor and give it a try i believe you will be extremely satisfied with the results our most difficult problem is waiting for the slow cooker to finish blending the flavors but it is worth every minute we wait just thinking how darn good dinner is going to be al schweiger
the basis of my diet is using the zesty italian with little or no oil and i still get that great taste
exactly how i expected but more gel than paste actually no paste at all just gel like vanilla bean extract but without the alcohol bit great

knowing that i like ramen my sister suggested that i give these a try i am on my second order as i really enjoy the flavor and texture the noddle s in this yakisoba have a different flavor and texture then what i am use to in the ramen packets that i normally eat but are very tasty as with most of these type products it is easy to prepare and the flavor can be adjusted to your taste by the amount of seasoning used i reason for only stars has to do with the container that is used after it is cooked in the microwave and the lid is peeled off there is a sticky adhesive left around lip not a problem if you are going pour the contents into a bowl but kind of gets in the way when eating directly from the container

i already loved raisin bran but this is even better i love the almonds and there are crunch bits that stay that way through the whole bowl the flavor is the same raisin bran that i love with a little cinnamon flavor boost and extra crunch i think it is awesome

i like the original raisin bran and it was a staple in our home growing up but i think i really like this much better when eating the original raisin bran i actually added a little extra sugar not sure why exactly but i always felt that it needed it no extra sugar needed with this new cinnamon almond raisin bran it has the right amount of sweetness crunch almonds and cinnamon i was afraid the cinnamon would be overpowering but it is a perfect balance not sure if the flakes turn soggy like the orginal flakes because i keep eating it too fast to find out my six year old was eating it straight from the box last night and he said it was delicious i would definitely purchase this cereal again

i like this a lot as a topping on my popcorn instead of butter it is very good and has kept well in the refrigerator after several months i will order more update i bought a second batch i did not have room in my fridge so i have been leaving it in the pantry i have had it a few months now and it still tastes great
great substitute for soda and taste great dissolves completely with no added residue i will try other flavors from this manufactures
this is a great tasting coffee it gets my day started off on the right foot

i am a real coffee lover and am hooked on senseo coffee my regular coffee pot is gathering dust in the corner of my kitchen i recently tried sumatra and just fell in love with it if you like the real taste of coffee you will love it as much as i do highly recommend this
the coffee maker works fine i am not impressed with the taste of the coffee it tastes too much like instant

not as good quality as the regular flavors of senseo coffees and we have had our machines for over years medium and dark roast kona and breakfast blend are by far the best sumatra is good also if you like dark rich coffee love the ease of the pod system but will probably go to the k cups just not available enough anymore

the packaging is not too sophisticated and as another review mentioned it is more liquid than other kinds of tahini but it really tastes great this how i have used it a goya package of dry chickpeas dipped in water for hours then boiled for hours about ounce tahini half a cup water lemon juice salt garlic blend everything until smooth

this stuff tastes great i was not expecting much when i mixed it with my orange juice but i was wrong i cannot claim any miracles in the health department but i have not had any recent cholesterol checks either it makes a delicious smoothie and i will continue to use it because i read and believe the studies on acai

this was the first product from amy s that i tried and i like it it does not taste like regular chili but i think that it has a good taste to it the sodium content is quite high though so check that out if your watching your sodium intake i think that it is a little too expensive but i will probably buy it again if it goes on sale

this coffee has a wonderful flavor and provides the convenience of a one cup brew instead of a pot you may also purchases flavors and it is as good as the cup you get at one of the coffee chains the automatic refill program offered is an excellent and convenient way to make sure you never run out
almost the best home brewed coffee i have ever had and the price is great much less expensive than the grocery store i highly reccomend it if your into coffee
got this for my sister and had a bite as some one who normally eats gummies i got to say i thought it tasted better then the normal sized bears also i do not recommend eating it in one sitting
love these they taste so good and are good for you i love giving my son something that is not full of un natural sugars

i have been drinking powdered cocoa for nearly years i consider myself pretty familiar with the powdered add water type cocoas and most of them taste like sand they are gritty and are either too sweet or far too bitter or have no real flavor at all and stay in a thick lump at the bottom of the mug no matter how much you stir with a spoon in nearly years i have only found two brands of cocoa that did not taste like gritty sludge e g swiss miss carnation nestle s one powdered cocoa is from the lds church and it is almost impossible to get in kentucky the distribution center is in indianapolis and none of the wards here seem to have anyone who holds the calling of preparation specialist therefore no one goes to indy very often the second great cocoa was made by cold stone creamery it was sold through walmart and was as smooth as the church cocoa unfortunately walmart no longer stocks it i am not sure it is even manufactured any more yesterday i ran across stevens cocoa it was on the shelf for that is right a measly buck so i decided to try it i knew that if i did not like it i could take it to work and give it away i am in love this stuff is equally as good as the cocoa from the lds church and cold stone creamery one sip and i was hooked it dissolves well it is not overly sweet it has a nice mild flavor and it is just downright good i top it with redi whip for fun but it does not need it it is good without any help i am headed back to stock up on more cans if it disappears from the shelves in a couple of weeks it is nice to know i can get it from amazon i never thought i would fall in love with a product enough to buy it from amazon when the supply dried up on the shelves but i am making an exception for this cocoa it is worth it
like the chocolate hard to find the other flavor do not know why but no one carries it

needless to say these cookies did not last long once they were opened they reminded my wife of the tagalongs the girl scouts used to sell very smooth fudge coating and that oh so lovely oreo crunch i could eat these all day viva la oreo

i love oreos especially these new fudge ones they are now my favorite i have tried both the mint and the peanut butter versions now and while the peanut butter are good the mint is still my favorite that being said these are not bad at all i still very much enjoyed them my two kids year old boy and year old girl both loved them as well whenever they could they were begging for these cookies in my mind that is a good sign if you have got a kid begging for these you have got a pretty good product my one disappointment is that it is not the full cookie it is just half of it maybe they have done that to cut costs but as i recall there was a similar oreo product at one time that offered the full cookie either way still worth it and definitely a cookie i would recommend

those familiar with regular oreos and really who is not will not find anything too terribly unfamiliar with these peanut butter oreo fudge cremes they consist of a single wafer which is topped with a layer of peanut butter creme then enrobed in a fudge coating the wafer is thin and nicely crispy the creme is purportedly peanut butter flavored but to be honest i was unable to pick up any of that it was still tasty just not as peanut butter y as i would hoped the fudge coating was not too thin not too thick just nicely adding a hint of creamy chocolate goodness what else can really be said about an oreo although i might wish that the peanut butter flavor was more intense i was still quite happy to nibble on them i certainly would not mind doing so again

these pickles are amazing once you have tried this unremarkable flavor you will not go back to those retail manufactured brand of pickles nothing comes close to these pickles definitely will be a repeat customer
medium light roast you can really smell and enjoy the aroma of high quality arabica if you are a fan of medium light roast you will enjoy this coffee smooth no burning flavor
small just right for a little something sweet ginger flavor is good it comes on gradually until it is almost intense a bargain
the mushrooms i received had absolutely no flavor it was like soaking up cream sauce with pieces of rubber really disappointing

these colors are so true to life and vibrant the drip drop out of the bottle makes it so easy to duplicate the exact same color again the food color does not change the taste or texture of any food i had no problems with shipping and it was super fast
i ordered three bags of these with a past order all i can say is yum i did not compare prices too much but this product tasted better and fresher than any i have found in local markets

i have nasty food allergies to wheat dairy eggs corn peanuts and about dozen other foods so when i find something i can actually eat i have a tendency to buy a case simply put these are great they have a wonderful soft texture with a mildly sweet but not too sweet flavor for anyone with allergies or intolerances like myself they are a real lifesaver they are satisfying nicely packaged and very fresh tasting i will be buying more
these are the best gummi bears available i got hooked on them when i was in germany i was so happy to see i could get them through amazon
we searched everywhere to find this jerky it is the best on the market and they ship very quickly we had it in less than days we have already reordered it

when i first bought this product i thought instant cornmeal it csnnot be that tasty wow i cud not believe it it tasted like the real thing very easy to travel around with and a small flask of hot water very filling
very tasty and delicious i like this tea very much it has a very good flavour and my whole family likes when i serve them a cup of tea

i had used these smaller jars of honey while on a trip in france a few years ago they were in the hotels with the breakfasts i do not use honey very often and the larger jars i purchase at the grocery store end up going to waste these little jars are perfect for me the flavor is not too intense and the size is perfect for my use plus they bring back memories of a wonderful trip i took to a country where i grew up

these are very good i cannot say which is my favorite flavor but i am leaning towards the key lime when i read the review and description i figured they would be crispy but they are normal shortbread with little chips or snaps you might say of flavor i love the packaging of the four flavors as well i will be reordering

emerald cove organic toasted nori sheets ever since i found the emerald toasted nori i put it everywhere i make sushi with brown rice decorate fish dishes with shredded nori and even fish burritos it has a pleasant fishy taste that i like each sheet has only calories and each bag contain a packet of moisture absorbing powder to protect the nori from dampness also on the back of the bag there is a pledge of organic purity all ingredients certified organic no ingredients have been irradiated i am glad about that because that was my very first concern there is a nice and simple sushi recipe on the back as well and emerald cove nori has no sodium even my cat likes it product of china certified kosher i like that thank you
these things are better than steak filet mignon it was well worth the purchase of this package it saves you a couple bucks versus buying them in the store go ahead splurge yourself and get some
i love it going to be on my shopping list from now on great as a snack do not need milk but great that way too
ribs were very tasty and tender and i will definitely buy them again just had to put them in aluminum foil with a little water and heat so easy to fix
this product is the best raw honey growing up my dad had bee hives in south louisiana and this is exactly how i remember the taste of raw honey i highly recommend this product

i did not know i was a fan of soy milk it taste great and i have one in the morning instead of cow s milk it is also gluten free for all the celiac s out there no casein or lactose as well i have already recommended this to friends
we have artifical sweetners for years i tried this sweetner now we only use this the other sweetner do not taste as good

hard to beat the flavor of this stuff its fresh and clean still not going to blow your head off maybe melinda needs to come out with a xxxxxxxxxxxtra hot version of this stuff but you will still have a hard time finding any other habanero sauce that tastes better on fish pork or chicken still not as universal as tabasco habanero but a great complement to veggies and other light dishes and when you go to firehouse for a sub you can try this on your smoked turkey and you will be pleasantly amazed at the effect great stuff a staple for any decent collection by the way if you like the flavor of this stuff and still crave more heat check out iguana radioactive atomic sauce its got the same basic ingredients as melinda s the same consistency but is about up the heat scale from this relatively weak xxxx sauce scovies
unusual and very tasty as you might expect they taste like okra i wish they were a little less expensive but i do not know of any alternative

this product sells for at trader joes for only one bag here you get bags for and since amazon ships it the shipping is so fast all you need to add is cinnamon and brown sugar and you are good to go i have eaten this for everymeal and promise you it is great also it is very very filling i have missed oatmeal since being diagnosed with celiac s and am so grateful i found this prodcut thank you amazon for making this much more affordable i will continue ordering it from you

lately i have been trying about or more sauces to find just the right one that balances flavor and burn but to put this into perspective i really go for the insanely hot so this may need to be measured by that this sauce is not really that hot but the taste is awesome it definately has heat but does not really have much burn in short if you want something that shames commercial pizza place hot wings in both heat and taste this is a great choice in fact i am browsing the internet to see about ordering a case for those days when i do not want my food to have the last highly pronounced word if you follow my meaning

when i got my miniature labradoodle puppy the breeder recommended getting one of these i am so glad i did this will entertain your dog for hours the inserts are a little expensive but well worth the price for the amount of time your dog will enjoy this product so far she has not been able to damage the ball itself after months for me that means it should last about two years or more before i have to replace it for a puppy dog toy that is everlasting i love it and highly recommend it just a note my dog is small and the medium size ball seems perfect

stevia is a safe natural sugar substitute that has been used for thousands of years i have used it safely myself for years now is my favorite brand because there is no bitter aftertaste use it in coffee tea yogurt milk cereal puddings fruit dips etc it is truly an amazing produce that keeps my life sweet and not fat
if you are looking for a fantastic glass of iced tea without the fuss this product is for you just add water your favorite sweetner and enjoy
i am completely hooked on lipton s glass size cold brew tea bags the small tea bags can stay in your glass of tea all day and never leak leaves like the big tea bags thank you lipton

we like to make smoothies in our home throw a little yogurt some milk some ice and lots of fruit into a blender and yummmmm but sometimes we are out of yogurt or milk or even fruit or sometimes we want a fruit that is not in season that is where this smoothie mix comes in you put this smoothie mix into a blender with some ice and you have a smoothie w e have tried the peach flavor and the wild berry flavor out of the two we prefer this peach it has a great flavor and mixes up well in addition to using this for smoothies we also use this when we make ice cream this is a great product that will save you time on those mornings when you are rushed and just need something fast for breakfast or a snack enjoy
i love mrs may s these are not my favorites of what they make but they are tasty and handy to have around the cashews or the black sesame seeds are the five star snacks

i am disappointed in this product first there is a distinct aftertaste secondly it is not as sweet as they promise and does not work at all in cold drinks if you need a sugar substitute i suggest somersweet not perfect either but better than this sorry i was taken in by the promises

my year old cat was not eating had to have a tooth pulled and was generally miserable he is always been thin and a picky eater after the tooth was pulled he was interested in food but would not eat i had to squirt it in his mouth a few times before he got the idea i was not going to give up once he started drinking it he loved it and began asking for it his coat is thicker and does not fall out as much he is put on weight and even if he is having a sick day from hair balls he can drink this without throwing up the rest of the day he is so much happier and plays more now even if there is a day when he is not interested in food i do not worry as much because he is so much healthier now thank you
easy to make without a bread maker and very tasty it is good with everything but we especially like it for breakfast toasted with butter and honey very good value

i loved this bread very tasty with a good texture and taste i tried making something similar from scratch and it did not turn out anything like this bread slices great warm or cold i bake for my boss and her family and they all voted a resounding yes we like this when i brought her in a loaf freezes well and toasts up great either plain or with butter or cream cheese my boss ate hers with spaghetti after lightly toasting she said it was outstanding and wanted more am i surprised no would highly recommend if you want a good italian style bread i made mine in my horizonetal wolfgang puck breadmaker and used a crisp or dark crust setting i tried all other settings light and medium and the bread came out great with a little different texture but still great nonetheless
i make bread all the time always look for variety this bread is tasty delicious i have a two loaf bread machine and my husband kids favorite is this one

i love this chili i have seen amy s products in the supermarket and have been really tempted to purchase any of their products i have had other meatless products that were awful but this was entirely different experience i ts spicy but still holds it flavor and you would never know it is meatless i will definitely order this again

i like these because they are not too sweet but of course that also means you can just keep eating and eating them without realizing how many you have plowed your way through so be careful a three cookie serving contains calories and grams of fat lots of fruit and the citrus flavor really comes through and as they are thin and crisp they are the perfect accompaniment to a cup of tea because they do not immediately go soggy i am not usually a big cookie person but i will probably be getting these again

this have been a huge hit with the whole family they remind me of a tea cracker more than a cookie or anything newton they are not overly sweet and have a subtle orange and cranberry flavor the cranberries can be a bit chewy but add to the overall texture of the cookies they also travel well and are great cookies for lunch boxes and toddlers
these are a pretty healthy tasty snack they are more like a cracker with a bit of dried fruit baked into the product my kids loved them

what i liked about this product was first the way it was packaged inside there are several rows of thin cookies in a plastic tray you can grab to your heart s content when eaten the cookie and the bits of fruit blend and make a great taste the only qualm is the package wire on the top it is not really easy to close and that may need to be redesigned but the product itself is tasty and i cannot get enough of the bits of fruit what a good idea

i requested two types of chips ahoy s newest cookies these were tasty and the others were not so do not interpret this review as relevant to similar cookies just these alone the cookies tasty chocolatey and do not have an overpowering processed aftertaste one finds with many foods of this type they are very sweet but you can tell you are eating a chocolate cookie in moderation i had two at most at a time it is decent and easy snack they are very chewy almost a dough consistency but the cookie does not fall apart easily i think the frosting center helps the cookie s structure very good with a cup of black coffee
we all enjoyed these very chocolatey cookies they have a nice chewy texture and gooey center which complement each other well they may not be homemade but they were still great with a glass of milk
this product is sweetened with splenda and tastes very artificial maybe if you like diet soda you will like this but the people that sampled it did not

the seeds are really good but this new flavor is a big time miss the taste is just terrible i bought a whole case i do not know if i will eat them i have to put a bunch in my mouth then put in some water rinse the flavors off in my mouth and spit all the liquid out just to eat the seeds i do not know what they were thinking on this flavor it is rather indescribable they should have made a spicy bbq or cajun instead
the mtr bisi bela bath is authentic and tasty i highly recommend it you can have this with pappad or some yoghurt on the side and it makes a complete meal

i honestly think it makes my regular recipes taste better then when i make them with table salt about half as salty as table salt so the lb bag was a must for me reasonable price great way to lead a little bit healthier lifestyle you are going to eat salt anyway so why not get the extra minerals and a great taste
good flavor you can use less than the directions suggest and get the same flavor without the thickness of syrup good stuff though

i have been using this liquid sucralose for about months on a daily basis and i could not be happier if you are on a low carb diet remember you are adding carbs to your coffee with every packet you open from the anti caking agents but you do not have to be on a special eating regimen to appreciate this because it is so cost effective one bottle lasts me about months for dollars it is easy to over sweeten if you are not careful especially when the bottle is full but you get used to that
best big train flavor out there and price is way cheaper than finding these packets locally at a coffee shop
loved the flavor of strawberry and rhubarb texture perfect for me definitely would order again a treat for me
this is a great dish i thoroughly enjoy it every time i eat it so easy to prepare

i made these brownies for a function i was attending and did not mention they were gluten free i made two batches and they all went i am not too crazy over most gf items but this is one of the best the price on amazon is much less then the price in supermarkets

this is the best popcorn ever i wish all stores sold it but so far i have found it only on amazon and some wal mart stores i would rather buy it from amazon of course it tastes great and is also just the right amount to watch a movie at home or to share with a partner

i recently got a keurig coffeemaker and tried out different brands of decaf to come up with a favorite newman s own is definitely not among them taste very much like a cheap restaurant coffee watered down with hardly any coffee taste i happen to like robust coffee taste and this one does not even qualify as medium if you like good coffee taste in your decaf coffees i would highly recommend the green mountain robust magic and for a little lighter touch the donut house decaf or tully s also of all the different brands i tried the newman s own was the only decaf that gave me an acid stomach reaction not recommended

ok so some people like it some people do not i am one of those who was excited about the prospect of getting iced tea from my keurig but was sorely disappointed by the taste from this tea it had a very artificial flavor much like instant tea and was no comparison to actual brewed iced tea i can only recommend getting the smallest box you can to see if it suits you like the other reviewer i cannot bring myself to use what is left and will probably end up throwing it out at some point my husband agreed and he is a big iced tea drinker and not all that picky about the taste he will not drink it i will not drink it and the cat will not drink it so out it goes i do want to add that i use the hot teas and have liked them very much especially the green tea there is just something about the iced flavors that do not work
but as far as it helping me produce more milk not sure it helped much tastes good though
my husband loves this tea which is not always available at the local grocer the fact that the amazon subscribe save program brings it to our door at regular intervals just makes life easy
i bought this tea to try something new i was tired of ordinary bergamote teas and now i have ordered it again great taste nice can
good healthy snack good plain and also i tried mixing with plain yogurt and honey which is a great snack and adds a bit of protein to the meal

right i know what you are going to say it is granola how exciting can granola be this stuff is delicious normally i need granola to be with something milk or yogurt or fruit cobbler or something like that this stuff i was eating out of the bag like snack chips it has just the right cinnamon taste and the oats taste fresh you know how some granolas seem sort of cardboardy and tasteless this does not the clusters are crisp and flavorful not just cinammon and sweet but hearty and oaty it is like the best part of a healthy cereal minus the milk and the not so tasty part if this came in snackpacks i would buy a ton to tuck in my bag for lunches heck that is what i did with half this bag

i received one pack of vanilla blueberry clusters with flax seeds through amazon vine and it made a great breakfast for me very tasty and the flax seeds gave it some texture as well my only regret is that i did not get more it was so delicious that i ate it all in one serving i will probably be ordered some more soon

this whole grain is very tasty the clusters are small enough you can toss it into yogurt or eat as a cereal but they are also large enough you can eat them as a snack lightly sweet full of texture and cholesterol free these blueberry vanilla clusters are very healthy with a high source of fiber of omega fatty acids and of whole grain you can feel good about eating this it is very economical and convenient i look forward to trying other flavors

my wife and i both love these looking to possibly make a bulk purchase now one caution since you are paying a premium for organic raw sprouted foods made in a family business they go quickly eat them slowly and savor the taste i also recommend goraw s other products as well i like their pumpkin seed based product a lot

my cat was extremely ill and i had to give him pills a day he is a big kitty about lbs and was really fighting me or taking the pill and then spitting it out i came across these while searching for something else and decided to try them wow what a difference as soon as he heard me open the bag he came running to get his treat this has got to be one of the best ideas i have ever seen i highly recommend these

this spagetti sauce is really good the spinach is amazing taste to it you will love this and enjoy it time and time again also for those like me whom are alergic to onions there are none in it enjoy

i run an animal hospital and the dogs loves this dog food my dog loves it too i give a little canned on top of the dry food and the dogs love it the chunks are a good size and it keeps the dogs stool regular

these are really tasty organic and perfect for a quick on the go snack i would always prefer the actual fruit but if i do not have time for it and just need a snack this is good calories fat sodium total carbos sugar

i got the sour apple version of the clif kid twisted fruit and even though i am not a kid exactly i still take these to work for lunch they do taste good the first two ingredients are apple puree and apple juice and the rest of the ingredients are added vitamins minerals plus pectin and wax to give the juice and puree structure yes i know these are full of sugar apple juice concentrate is another way of saying sugar apple flavored but as far as a sugary treat goes this one at least has some vitamins and even a smidge of fiber hidden inside it is tasty and i get my candy craving out of the way it is mostly organic so i do not have to worry about my treat putting pesticides into the environment maybe a real apple is better for you but this will do in a pinch

ordered these for my daughter and ended up sharing them with my autistic niece who is on a gluten free dairy free dye free diet no dairy no gluten and no food coloring in these only natural fruit a tiny bit sour but great tasting for entire family

i am giving this stars because it is rice paper and it does taste good there is a learning curve however to using these without tearing them my first batch was there were wraps in the package and i thought i would bake some spring rolls i think i had splits in about half of them my batch went a little better with only about with tears i know i can perfect this with time and patience and these are a really good price so i will not feel bad about playing with my food

some similar kinds of flavored coffees have a subtle mint flavor this is powerful stuff in a good way of course it had a very powerful taste of chocolate mint very fulfilling much better tasting than similar products i highly recommend this
the maxwell house peppermint mocha is delicious and easy to prepare my husband and i were both big fans of this drink a cross between hot chocolate and coffee

i am a huge peppermint lover i am also a bit of a picky person when it comes to drink mixes for me many end up being powdery and not as creamy and tasty as i would like that was not the case with maxwell house international coffee peppermint mocha latte mix once you find just the right mixture of powder and hot water you are good to go the container states tsp to oz of boiling water well i always have a big mug when i drink which is about double this not a problem i usually use tsp for my oz mug and it turns out great the peppermint flavor is amazingly refreshing and so delicious it is not overpowering yet is strong enough that the drinker knows it is peppermint flavored for me this is one of the perfect ways to treat myself after a crazy or hectic day curling up with a mug of this peppermint mocha latte and a great book makes a blissful evening i highly recommend this mix to anyone who enjoys peppermint and chocolate

when i started eating these i did not even realized that they were sugarless and low carb they are so delicious the only ones i have tried are peanut butter i like both crunchy and smooth do not really seem too different i was baffled to see some star reviews but when i read them i saw that everyone was saying that they love these bars but got a terrible quality shipment from amazon so i should add that i only buy these in local stores have never purchased from amazon

dandy blend has such a great taste to me that it is not necessary to buy any coffee when away from home the packets work great i use a spoonful of sugar and a little non dairy creamer that i also carry with me in my handbag i find i have the dandy blend mixture in the afternoon and it satisfies me i will continue to buy dandy blend

as other reviews have said this tastes pretty good it is the best dried garlic i have tried mine came in the three pack and i hope i use up the other two before they go stale my only complaint is that you cannot unscrew the top you have got to use the built in grinder or break off the top completely

this is a really good and easy recipe you do not only get the spices but you also get instructions on how to make this complex dish i made it first with chicken and then i substituted it with tofu both times rocked for the price it is a really good buy

this is an edit of my first review where i said the price was a little high but at that point i had not noticed that both my local walmart and target carry it for less than so do not buy it here though it is a great coffee i use this coffee as a drip grind coffee not french press or expresso where so many people love it it is still stars this coffee is excellent it is called a dark roast but it tastes more like a medium or medium dark roast and does not have much bitter burnt taste so common in such roasts it is woody with a hint of a citrusy taste it is a little creamy and earthy there is a considerable complexity of tastes which reminds me of eight of the clock s bocar blend but bocar is not as bold but it is around the price eight of the clock s columbian my most brewed in the am coffee is as bold with a little less complexity and a more woody taste again at the price it most closely reminds me of starbuck s caffe verona which is a little more chocolately in taste and is usually around for one about same sized bag at amazon

i have always made fresh coconut cake filtering the coconut milk grating the meat myself these cupcakes are as close as you can come to ones made from a fresh coconut as with most baked goods if you let them sit a while say at least hours the flavor is even more intense of course they have lots of butter in them so how can they not be good

this is a poor excuse for coffee even for instant coffee i was looking forward to trying it after hearing good things on the web unfortunately i was disappointed i tried this coffee using the specified instructions and also tried using less water the best i can say of it is that it is weak garbage it is almost like drinking hot water but with a foul taste that will leave you longing for a real cup of coffee if you want fast coffee allow me to suggest a keurig special edition gourmet single cup home brewing system instead
it is hard to believe the instant coffee can have the same taste as brewed one

we are not gluten free but my mil is i bought this to have on hand when she came out for a visit and then never got around to making it we just made it recently to use it up and get it out of here expecting mediocrity at best but it was surprisingly tasty it had a bouncy springy texture we ate the entire loaf at one meal with bean soup which i keep wishing my kids would like but they will not so they ate a lot of bread so i cannot attest to its keeping qualities but fresh from the oven it was great it smelled awful raw so i was skeptical but smelled good baking and tasted great i think i will keep a bag or two around now just as a way to have easy fresh baked bread for dinner and maybe one of these days my kids will learn to like bean soup my husband did the actual mixing as far as i know he followed the directions exactly i may try some of the tweaks suggested next time it does call for an odd amount of eggs that would be the only complaint
this product is easy to make and has a great taste i just wish it was gluten free a simple change in the soy sauce used would make it that way just like the general tsao s chicken by the same company

i got this tea thinking it would be a nice tea reminiscent of the kind of hot cider drink you might get from a coffee shop what i got was a rather unpleasant experience when i first opened the box at work my co workers said this tea smelled like the cinnamon chewing gum big red when i got to the first sip i encountered the sweet flavor of the apples before i was quickly overwhelmed by the very bitter taste of cinnamon it felt like two siblings who were not on good terms with each other face scrunching ensued i will not be finishing this box
love this cheese i use of these containers per year refrigerate once opened and it will last till the expiration date

i purchased their matcha green tea powder cafe grade a while back and i fell in love with it their powder comes in this little cute reusable tin the taste of the tea is smooth and not bitter i make green tea milkshakes and it is the best that i have purchased i highly recommend it i wish they offer their cafe grade powder in a bigger can i use to work in a cafe where we had green tea powder in foil bags and they did not seal well and when we opened the bag we would be covered in green powder and it was such a waste plus i really like the tin and want it in a bigger size
this is a great tasting pod we drink it alone or make a double cup by brewing it with donut shop or vanilla to create a new flavor
very tender meats sole is awesome good value i order a lot of omaha steak products and have loved them all
fantastic juicy and tender everything was great is great there is only the of us but next time i may even order with the desserts included
i do not usually like rice cakes but these have a nice taste and are very filling the only downside is that this pack comes with so many of them and it takes up a lot of space

these sunflower seeds are larger than the standard sunflower seeds you can usually find in your local supermarket usually the david s brand in my area so there is more inner seed to eat there is also a lighter coating of salt from the brine wash on them so while there is enough salt to make things tasty your lips are not going to go numb from all the salt quite as quickly as with the other brand the shells are easy to crack with your teeth and they break cleanly also the bags are filled with full shelled seeds there are very few broken ones i devoured the first batch i ordered and i am now ordering a second batch if you like snacking on sunflower seeds i think you will like these
not much you can say about water i love sparkling water and the addition of some natural lime flavor is great love this and go through about cases a month

okay so it does not taste exactly like pumpkin it does sort of have a pumpkin essence however maybe it just sort of smells pumpkin y either way the tea is delicious my co workers tease me about how many cups a day of it that i drink personally i like it with a packet of truvia natura s calorie free sweetener ounce packages pack of or nunaturals nustevia nocarbs blend packets as far as the comment another reviewer made about the black tea tasting like lipton s maybe that makes it more authentic it is said that chai tea was first created in india to make undrinkable tea bearable

the taste is very good oat bran is much more creamy than one minute quick oat it just does not tastes like oat a perfect food for somebody on diet just one single tablespoon of oat bran would make you feel very full

newman s own special blend extra bold is a great tasting coffee for any time of day it is flavor stands out even with cream i like strong bold coffee and this is my favorite every day general use coffee

i had this cake for my birthday it was delicious it was nice and moist and fluffy and tasted like pumpkin pie without the crust i like the filling for pumpkin pie no bad aftertaste or anything at all we put a dollop of cool whip on top instead of frosting we have had other sweet n low cakes in the past and they have unfortunately tasted lousy this was a pleasant surprise
i add this to the sugarfree cappuccino just to give it a flavor it tastes great and does taste like york peppermint pattie flavor

my kids love this white cheddar snack but it is not always easy to find in our shopping area this was not cheap but we are happy that we can order pirate booty through amazon the oz bags are the perfect size for their school lunches the taste is cheesy and light love them

pirate s booty aged white cheddar tastes very similar to cheetos white cheddar snacks without all of the calories and fat even my teenage son who hates anything healthy loves them they are great when you crave a salty snack and do not want a b zillion calories
i was hugely disappointed with this product the walden farms line of calorie salad dressings are great this alfredo sauce is not do not waste your money on it

i fell in love with these delightful candies when a friend brought them back from a trip to germany a perfect combination of hazelnut chocolate cream and crispy wafer they are adorably cute as they resemble little hippos i am not a big fan of chocolate but this is a wonderful flavor combination and a tasty little treat
add to aniything soup salad meat brings up the flavor nicely packed easy to use arrived on time clean and fresh
when i read some of the reviews that mentioned eating these tiny morsels by the spoonful i was skeptical but guess what i am doing lol i love them

i really enjoy eating these bars they have a very natural and clean taste to them the only thing i would like to suggest is a less sweet version of these bars are offered they are a little too sweet for my taste but that does not take away from my enjoyment of eating them

i have a gluten allergy so i am always looking for an alternative to cookies muffins granola bars and other sweet snacks that i can no longer eat the kind bars are great i have not found any that i absolutely do not like but some i like better than others the fruit and nuts in yogurt is definitely my favorite i like the combination of nuts raisins and yogurt it does not seem as overpoweringly sweet as some of the others i originally discovered kind bars at starbucks but they were very expensive to buy on a regular basis that was when i checked out amazon s subscribe and save program signed up for the kind bars and cut my purchase cost by more than half with no shipping cost what a cool program especially for those of us with allergies who need regular access to products that are usually expensive and or hard to find
the product was delicious and arrived in a timely fashion however i did see them cheaper at one of those wholesale stores
good product right amount of sodium a little high on calories though kind fruit nut fruit nut delight all natural gluten free bars pack of

these bars taste quite good although i agree with other reviewers that there is a strong coconut taste fine with me as i like coconut i have ordered three times and the bars have been fresh each time i find them sticky which makes them a bit messy if eaten while hiking or on a road trip everyone i share them with polishes them off quickly personally when i look at the ingredients in kind bars i do not have many fantasies that they are particularly healthy honey is sugar fruit and nuts are concentrated calories healthy fresh fruit vegetables and dairy will do a much better job of ensuring that i get the vitamins minerals and antioxidants that i need gluten free might help some folks i do not doubt that if you eat little pieces of the bars spaced out over several hours they do not encourage glycemic spiking when compared to a snickers or some other candy otherwise i simply regard them as a tasty snack that should not be expected to be anything more than that
these by far are the best tasting gluten free bars ever and at a very reasonable price low in calorie and a great after work out snack
i love the kind bars they taste great and are much healthier than other bars also they satisfy your taste for something sweet so are healthier than eating candy
thought i would just try this and i am glad i did great taste and the delivery was very fast we bbq all the time and i now have a new favorite well worth a try
this organic protein bar tastes great my cousins told me about the organic dark almond chocolate bar this one is good too
it is a spreadable jelly sweet but not too sweet with a flavor of lime it tastes very good for a jelly and i would consider buying it again in the case i wanted to buy jelly
i love these nuts i particularly like the cashews and almonds a bit overpriced though and once you start popping there is no stopping until the pack is done
i bought this hazelnut paste nocciola spread at a local shop in palm cost florida the taste is excellent and healthier than nutella
recently enjoyed these teas at a high end restaurant after returning home we ordered some more online they arrived promptly and were just as delicious

the black walnuts come in large pieces not whole or halved they are fresh taste good and i will buy them again in the future by the way i read in breakthrough eight steps to wellness that black walnuts have some unique health benefits

i love this cereal i have never been a fan of cocoa crispies but i am a fan of erewhon rice cereals so i decided to give this a shot it is so tasty and addictive without being disgusting sugary like the regular brands that i find myself eating it for breakfast and sometimes dessert
this almond butter tastes very good and it has a pleasing creamy texture i will buy more even though it is expensive it is worth it on my restricted diet because of the convenience and the good taste

this water enhancer was really tasty and you do not have to use a lot of it to flavor even a large glass of water the flavor was good without being overpowering and it is fun using the little bottle my only complaint is the price at per bottle kraft s listed price on their site not amazon s you are paying more for the bottle and the wow factor than the actual flavoring itself while this is a really good product i do not imagine i will be spending four bucks on less than two ounces of flavoring and a futuristic bottle

i just squeezed some into some water and drank the liquid mixed with the water with little agitation you can use as much or as little as you like i did a second shot my drink was light refreshing and not overly sweet it did not taste like snapple for example but i enjoyed it i plan on getting more

this offers a quick way for a tasty drink fill up a glass of water and squirt as little or as much as the liquid in the glass and viola peach tea yeah not really peach tea but still tastes pretty darn good they say uses but i probably got only or so since i either wanted my drink a little sweeter or used too big of glasses the current price on amazon suggests more than five dollars a bottle i think that is pretty steep but i would probably purchase some more individual bottles to try other flavors

mio liquid peach tea has a great taste the bottles are small so you can toss one in a backpack or purse and take it with you to add to your bottled water it is easy to add too much to your water so start slow and taste first before adding more i would really recommend this

o n e coconut water is by far the best tasting coconut water i have had and i have had just about every brand out there the great taste let us me hydrate my body better than regular water because if o n e was not available i would not be able to palate drinking coconut water

o n e has a good taste for packed coconut water if you are used to drink coconut water it is important to know that it will never taste like a fresh green coconut i also make ice cubes with coconut water to use in cocktails and whisky it tastes great

this coconut water takes great i have tried many other brands and this is one of my favorites and i am not sure why everyone is so worried about the expiration dates i just ordered two boxes from amazon and the expiration date is dec so months from now

i first tasted this product at the grocery store i bought the container and loved it unfortunately the taset of the one coconut water from amazon was horrible it had a strange taste as if it had been left out in the heat it was a rancid flavor i will not be ordering this again i will purchase it from the grocery store where i can take it back easily and quickly

this is the only drink that has effectively replaced the urge to drink diet soda for me low in calories and super refreshing at lunch its like i am on a tropical beach looking at the ocean at work now that is nice
i really enjoy this coconut water tastes fresh and has good nutrition with no added ingredients i usually put it in our morning smoothies along with some strawberries bananas and flaxmeal

being originally from a latin american country coconut water is one of those essential summer week end drinks that we not only enjoyed as refreshments but loved for all the no nonsense nutritional information our parents would throw at us about it and though it is been a while since i have had a real hard shelled coconut spliced open to insert a straw and enjoy this little pack did its job of refreshing me with that wonderful taste and make me feel proud of the nutrition i was getting out of it packaged in a handy little container it keeps the product fresh and with all its flavorful attributes delicious refreshing nutritious it is definitely worth a try and you long for the real thing but are far from a tropical beach this might be your best substitute

it is light and refreshing i have tasted fresh coconut water right out from the coconut the western coconuts like the ones from the caribbean are a bit on the salty side but the sweet ones are from the tropical areas in the far east like indonesia so comparing this to the western coconut water it is way better and much more refreshing comparing this to the indonesian coconut water it is below par all in all it is still pretty good
what a great thing to wake up to i feel these k cups are of medium strength with just enough of kahula

i will definitely order this again it melts in your mouth the texture is light when i brought it to work the whole bag disappeared in minutes

i have been gluten free for about three months and as someone with a sweet tooth i have been a bit bummed lately at the lack of easy and quick treats i can find or keep on hand i went to the health food store and bought one of these individually to give it a try i opened it in the car and almost went back in for more right then only the rain and a need to get on with my day held me back i will most definitely be buying more if you like macaroons these are fairly similar crunchy but chewy soft sweet and tasty

pops up great in the microwave a handful of kernels in a brown paper lunch bag folded up and taped shut for minutes with almost no leftover kernels i am a popcorn seasoning junkie but this popcorn is so fresh and flavorful that a little butter and salt does the job it is also been my experience so far that snappy is a little less prone to getting scorched than grocery store popcorn higher moisture content maybe either way it is nice to have fewer unpleasant burnt surprises

great tasting snack like viewer said taste like sugar smacks my husband and i enjoy eating the puffed cakes calories fat awesome puffed cakes and a glass of fat free milk is good eating thank you amazon jesus bless us all

i bought this salt on a lark because i did not want to drive miles to the nearest store that carried natural sea salt but i will buy it again the flavor is wonderful i am not a big salt eater never have been just do not like the taste of commercial salt but this sea salt is wonderful i real winner that enhances the flavor of food instead of covering it up as regular salt does
good quality rice cooks well and has a good overall flavor no need to rinse first as with most asian rice

i have been looking for gluten free plain crackers for ages being pregnant all i wanted in my first trimester was some plain crackers but i thought i had no options being celiac there is some nice rice crackers out there but they all are flavored with onion garlic bbq etc not things you want during pregnancy i found these recently in a local high end grocery store and was so happy to see plain i tried them and i had to laugh at myself for getting so excited over plain crackers they are super good with by themselves or with butter cream cheese etc they are great for soup as they are full of flavor and have a crispy taste they are also not high in salt like most other crackers great buy too i highly recommend if you like me just want some nice crackers without the salty flavor added to them
surprisingly tasty and a great texture i was excited to find these in my local grocery store in the passover section my expectations were low but these delicious crackers made me a believer

i bougth yahuda matzo style last month i wanted to try it before passover i love the taste and texture the biggest problem is that about a third of the box i opened arrived in crumbles i did not check the other boxes because i need them unopened for passover i hope the boxes arrived in better condition i will try and make matzah balls with the crumbs and use them as a coating or toppng at these prices i am not going to waste any of it i am going to buy another pack of so that i will have enough to serve during the holiday for myself and family members who can not eat wheat i hope you keep this item in stock as long as possible as we eat matzah all year long

this would have gotten stars but i decided due to the fact it is pricey and i feel it could be more reasonably priced than it is otherwise i was hoping it would be my answer to a saltine cracker that i miss so much due to being gluten intolerant i was very pleasantly surprised the cracker was very tasty and had a nice crunch it is perfect to crumble in tomato soup or to eat plain or with anything on it i really love this product it makes a great snack when i just have to have something to crunch on

the coffee beans are great fresh and shipped fast great prices will continue to order these coffee beans as long as they stay fresh and reasonably priced
my girlfriend uses this product in her coffee to disguise the coffee taste instead of using sugar she adds half a package and some milk she loves it it tastes great on its own too

we were eating a meal in hawaii with some aloha shoyu on the table we did not think anything of it until we tried some and found that this tastes really good different from kikkoman and the like if you like soy sauce be sure to try some of this

i love how fast you can fix this thai peanut in the take out type of box just add hot water ster then eat it tastes great and is fast to fix this is not the same thi peanut that comes in a regal type of box that is cooked in a pan on the stove top i like the taste of this one better and it is easier to fix

i searched long and hard for this product and i was thrilled to learn that they had the exact ice bars that i was searching for the customer service was the best and shipping was extremely fast thank you for making a hard to find product in the you s accessible and the costs were reasonable i will definitely order again from this seller
