the kids in our son s party were super excited that they had flavors to choose from before i made their cotton candy and what colorful flavors too cherry grape were the favorites the cherry and blue raspberry were the most colorful

this was a good purchase tastes good pretty colors seems to go a long way i used at a family reunion with a bunch of kids and they raved about it i hope what was not used holds up for next year i put it away so as not to be tempted very happy

these sugars are so good they make great light fluffy cotton candy they work extremely well compared to using hard candy they all taste great i would highly recommend these for anyone making homemade cotton candy they taste as great as boardwalk cotton candy

healthy choice fresh mixers are a tasty option when you need a quick microwave meal on the go with their compact nonperishable packaging these things are perfect for carrying to the office in your purse so the office cadger will not steal them the pasta turns out just right and the sauce is pretty good too the rotini with zesty marinara sauce has a nice garlicy zing to it the portion size is just right for an entree it is a little small if it is comprising your entire meal but if you are eating at your desk chances are you did not have time for a full meal anyway the plastic handles on the bowl stay cool enough to make it easy to transport this to your desk no more trying to find the tepid spot on a flaming hot piece of microwaved cardboard so you can goose walk it down the hall before your fingers burn a couple of things lowered my rating by one star for one there is a bit more sodium than i am entirely comfortable with in a product aimed at the health conscious two there is quite a bit of plastic packaging with this meal it is nicely layered into a small package that can easily fit into a purse or briefcase but when you take the layers apart you cannot help but think of landfills or the great oceanic garbage patch all in all this is still a decent option for days when you know you are going to be too busy to either go to the deli or make a sack lunch with bean curds to turn off any would be fridge thieves
my favorite cereal period i enjoy this every morning with some unsweetened almond milk taste so much better than the similar cheerios but has nearly twice the fiber you cannot go wrong with this
i love eating soba noodles and this is the best sauce i have found so far i just add some scallions and it is awesome
this price is amazing we are a whole foods family and we use this for our baking and on our waffles and we love it way cheaper then the grocery store

i can tell you from experience that it is not hard to make healthy low calorie low sodium soup that tastes good calories for this soup are ok and it has a few carrot pieces in it for a little extra nutrition however the taste was totally bland it is commendable that they used less salt however they could have added a little rosemary and or garlic for example and produced an enjoyable taste without one bit of extra calories or sodium i also found the chicken to be overcooked and rubbery as were the pasta curls that they think are noodles yesterday i had a can of progresso classics vegatable that was the same calories more nutricious and full of flavor even the old fashioned small can of campbell s chicken noodle is a better bowl of soup than this no more healthy choice in our pantry
smells more like blueberry than it tastes however it make a great iced tea and sweetens nicely with agave syrup i enjoy it

i have opened hundereds ifnot thousands of cans of peeled italian tomotoes and for the money these are as good as i have ever had as good or better than campania pomidori pelati very red rich and sweet
these are great tasting it is like a mix of raisin bran and honey bunches of oats i did the subscribe and save and it really does save you money

over years of gluten free baking this mix is the best chocolate cake mix that i have tried i usually find other gluten free cake mixes to be pretty dry this one made very moist cupcakes with great chocolate flavor i do not think i would be able to tell the difference between this and a cake made with wheat flour and they were easy to frost no stray crumbs sticking to the frosting spatula i will definitely buy this one again

i was very pleased when this arrived at the door opened it immediately dug in was not till later when my wife got home told me it was for the dog not me just kidding our dog does like this beneful we get many compliments on her smooth coat she is fit full of fun energy very healthy dry dog food has added advantage if you have to curb your pet dogs do like variety too beneful has several different flavors you may want to change it up every other bag or so this lb bag lasts about a month for our lb lab sounds funny for a dog to be eating corn tomatoes other veggies the reality is these ingredients are fillers to keep the cost down other brands may be healthier but are going to be more expensive we selected this brand because that is what the rescue center fed her and our vet said this was fine
tastes great no bad smell as others mentioned came in days with prime and no problems have not experienced any gas yet i am trying to build my tolerance slowly

i really enjoy this peanut butter it is sweet and a treat it is not entirely smooth it has a slight granule texture maybe because of the honey mixed in otherwise it is one less jar to grab if you like honey and peanut butter

i just started taking benecol smart chews so i do not know yet if they will lower my cholesterol i am writing this review so other people will try them and not be afraid that they taste bad they really are good they taste just like a carmel candy
these chewables are delicious do not know about the results of lowering cholesterol i will have to wait until the next dr exam yum
i take a day and will update when my bloodwork is done again i am hoping for the best the taste is better than i thought it would be
product arrived quick and taste great not sure yet how effective it is yet but it is easy to take
i love the taste of the benecol smart chews i am hooked on these and my mom is also taking them it is great to have something taste good and help your cholesterol thank you

this product was recommended to a group of us ladies by a cardiologist who spoke at one of our meetings she said her patients were getting fantastic results taking this to help them lower their cholesterol ldl levels my ldl needs to be lowered by points and i do not want to take medication so i decided to give this a try i have taken it for two months but it will be a few more months before i have my cholesterol level checked at that time i will know if this works in addition to taking this i have been eating steel cut oatmeal for breakfast and have cut way back on beef

we have been enjoying this seasoning on our steaks for some time but this packaging is an great improvement we first started buying it at a wholesale club where it was sold in a plastic grinder the grinder was a pain in the wrist to use i am so glad that weber now sells it pre ground in a shake on container plus the grill lid shaped cap is a cute touch i definitely recommend this seasoning as it is just the right combination of flavors for a charcoal grilled steak i would even use it on chicken or pork as well

i love taco bell so i knew i would love this sauce i have used it on chicken veggies baked potatoes and most recently i put it on my mashed potatoes you can use this in many ways salads meats etc the taste is creamy rich and spicy but not too spicy it has a little kick to it and if you like jalapenos then you will like this i am not a big fan of alot of spices and when i cook i really cook plain but i do like this product it is not too much and not too little if you want to add a little zest to your every day meals this is a good way to go this is an update weeks later ok for me this sauce is not too spicy however i served it times to company one time i used it as a dipping sauce for veggies and another time i used it for a topping on taco night in my house both times my friends and family said it was too spicy for them i personally like a kick but they all found it too spicy but they loved loved the taste it was just too spicy one of my friends actually started coughing and asked for a glass of water so if you like spice but not heat this is a great sauce there are many many ways to use this and it really can stretch your budget by adding zest to boring ole chicken and fish however it may be too spicy for those of you not used to it but it tastes great

moist delicious with a delectable rum flavor it was a bit on the very sweet side but overall a memorable dessert experience

recently i was over watching the celtics game at my friend s apartment as the game grew more and more intense i consequently grew more and more parched hey brian i said you got anything to drink yeah he replied i have got some lavender soda in the fridge lavender soda i asked skeptical where does a person even get lavender soda it was sitting on a table next to a couch in the furniture section of marshall s so i bought it brian replied i walked to the kitchen my interest piqued drinking lavender soda sounded like a wonderfully unique experience as i typically enjoy the scent of lavender soaps however i would soon learn that drinking a flower flavored soda would not be the exciting experience i had hoped it would be when i took my first sip i thought to myself what have i gotten myself into this time the initial flavor tasted like club soda that had been poured into a glass that contained soap residue from a previous cleaning interesting i thought perhaps the flavor is just subtle at first however as my drinking experience continued i came to realize that this would not be the case after i swallowed the soda i was faced with an aftertaste that rather than tasting like soap residue tasted simply like soap like a bar of soap was in my mouth this brought back horrible memories of my childhood you see when i was but a young boy my mother would always threaten to wash my mouth out with soap if i either said a bad word or said something disrespectful to her or my father being one to always question my mother s conviction i often found myself with a bar of soap in my mouth this had a tremendous lasting psychological effect as even twenty years later i can still taste the flavor of soap in my mouth when i consider saying a bad word consequently when i took my first taste of lavender soda i was hit with a flood of emotions i felt as though i had said a bad word or broken a rule i felt as though i was being punished for something but could not recall what i had done my vision began to become cloudy i began to lose control of my small motor functions i was soon reduced to a bluthering mess on the floor after being bombarded with such deeply buried memories i vowed never again to sip of such a soda as long as i shall live lest i suffer another episode such as the one described above in summary this soda tastes more like lavender scented soap than it does soda it might be better suited for a more delicate palate than my own but i personally do not prefer it
not sure if it works but taste is good like a caramel first got it in china town desided to buy again

i used to live in baton rouge louisiana and learned from my relatives to brew and enjoy community coffee preparing it in my little white porcelain beggin just like my grandmother and aunts i make my own blend of coffee beans and was so pleased to see that amazon was now selling community coffee it is as good as i remember if being particularly since i like a very strong rich flavor i am now using their sumatran french roast expresso and columbian to make my blends and am very happy with the results so are my relatives and friends who ask to use my blends themselves great coffee from the land of strong coffee lovers i am moving on to chicory laced coffee now as community carries it personally i like this brand much better than other louisiana coffees

this cake was super easy to make it tasted great and had an absolutly awesome texture the mouth feel of the cake is nothing like most microwaved treats even people who regularly eat wheat would be very surprised this is a wheat free and microwave product give the taste and texture the texture is very soft and light and not at all grainy the cake tastes like a cinnamon donut in terms of degree of sweetness and the cinnnamon flavor is very authentic and high quality tasting the cake delivers a completely authentic cake experience but you should know it is not supper pretty to look at and does not come with any topping as might be suggested by the label art if you are giving it as a special treat to someone as a birthday cake for instance you might want to spread some gluten free icing or whipped cream cheese on it to improve the aesthetic effect this would be a great purchase to keep in the pantry as an emergency treat or to keep at work as a courtesy maybe if you are doing a birthday and it turns out someone is on a gluten free diet really what this kit is perfect for is when you are at a motel with a microwave to send with a child going on a sleepover at someone else s house or to leave with grandparents as an easy treat to give gluten free grandchildren

as my box arrived earlier today i cannot attest to it is health benefits i am not sure if i would be able to anyway but i can absolutely confirm that there is no taste

i was not expecting much from this a disposable package of self boiling pasta with a bag of meat sauce there should be no way it can work but it does you fill cover the slightly oily pasta with water leave on the drainer top microwave it for minutes drain it heat the sauce and mix it all up and amazingly it tasted good normally i cannot stand this zero effort lazy style of cooking microwaved meals but this was actually really tasty i would not make this a part of my regular routine because of the price but i can imagine people who would i have to take issue with the packaging though i am giving this four stars because each serving is individually packaged and none of it is recycleable the bulk of what you are buying is packaging and it all gets thrown away

i am a fan of healthy choice products and this one is good too i have generally used their frozen food options but liked the idea of a shelf storable healthy option for lunch this pack contains everything needed for a quick and healthy pasta lunch the directions are clear and easy to follow the straining device that drains excess water after microwaving the pasta works well and the pasta sauce packet contains a sufficient amount of sauce for the pasta this mixer takes a little more time and effort that a frozen option due to having the microwave the pasta drain it and add the sauce however the trade off of more time for preparation is outweighed by having an option that can be stored on a shelf or in a desk drawer a nice option for work or on the go
my family loves maple syrup on pancakes and by far this is one of the best we have tasted we love it

i have had martinis with fresh bleu cheese stuffed olives in the past and these are tasteless in comparison i could not distinguish the taste of bleu cheese take the time and stuff your pitted olives with fresh bleu cheese or find another already prepared brand

if you like graham crackers and you like oats and honey then you will love this product just the right amount of each makes this a real treat to eat i only wish it had less sodium mg apart from that the lack of trans fat and saturated fat makes this a healthy choice for graham cracker lovers i would buy this whole grain product again

i ate the graham crackers and they were delicious i shared the graham crackers with lana and she said also that the graham crackers were delicious both lana and i agreed on the strong oats taste and a lingering graham cracker taste less subtle than other graham crackers i asked lana if this was a cracker she would use for the crust of a banana cream or key lime pie with no hesitation she said yes this is a wonderful alternative snack to cookies and chips lana is with me in highly recommending back to nature golden honey oat grahams

these are some very tasty and sweet crackers they are a bit hard not overly processed like some of the big brand crackers you find in the grocery store they are very tasty and and make a great snack i have not had a chance to make smoores with them but i suspect they will be great for that too they are well formed and do not crumble apart easily so they are very versatile

these are very good premium graham crackers delicious what else can i say it is as good as a graham cracker can get which is to say good but not that great they are a bit pricey about more than a regular graham cracker is it worth it who knows how much do you love graham crackers if you love graham crackers or have lots of money to burn sure go for it

these graham crackers are everything you would want and expect of an all natural graham cracker they taste great with and fit right in with our family who go through a box a graham crackers on any given week these were not quite as tough as our usual brand of grahams with a few more broken crackers and they definitely do not stay fresh up as on the counter if you forget to seal up the zip lock i think both of these are a result of the lack of random binders and preservatives from other brands and i do not think they really detract from the product at all they are great crackers and worth the space in the pantry

i liked these a lot they had just a touch of sweetness not too much and are a great afternoon or late night snack i was pleasantly surprised that something that is supposed to be good for you tastes this good the only reason i gave them four stars instead of five was because the packaging left something to be desired it was hard to open the inside package without throwing crackers everywhere and they do not seal back up for freshness i put mine in a ziplock bag though and they stayed fresh that way try them you will like them
these crackers are delicious and healthy my month old daughter eats them equally as well as the popular graham cracker brand i will definitely buy these again

for being a natural and relatively healthy food item i am impressed by how good these crackers actually taste they are not as sweet as a standard graham cracker but again very good for what they are i top them with natural peanut butter and eat them with a glass of milk yum

i purchased this when it was about for the pack found the deal on great deal do not think it is worth over however pretty expensive at it is normal price this was my first time trying this brand probably one of the best instant soup products i have tasted this is not loaded with salts like most others and it taste healthy my only gripe is the amount of plastic and waste caused by this product here is the ingredients nutritional info if anyone is wondering ingredients noodles wheat flour water tapioca starch vegan lactic acid salt soup soybean paste water soybean rice salt sugar rice wine sea vegetable yeast extract onion shiitake mushroom toppings dehydrated tofu dehydrated green onion dehydrated spinach allergy note labeled as being processed on equipment that may contain traces of peanuts nutritional information serving size bowl calories carbohydrates fat sodium sugars fiber lt protein vitamin a vitamin c calcium iron

we tend to eat these straight and or with hummus as a chip substitute i have noticed some variation between packages in the texture of the crisps i prefer them when they are a bit firmer but they are still nice even when they are softer than i would like

i love these tasty snacks they have a great crunch and just the right amount of salt i am not sure i would call these a health food because of the fat content but they are really good tasting and i will be ordering again
these are great i am not a huge fan of vegetables but i will snack on these
this is an awesome tasting snack the cheapest place near us is trader joe s and they sell it for amazon is even cheaper you cannot just eat one we finish the whole bag each time we open it
great love these and happy that can be found on line would love if you carry the snak size bags because i open a bag i tend to eat all and the snak bags are better for portion control

i really like virginia diner unsalted peanuts so i decided to give this flavor a try the name old bay refers to the seasoning of the same name normally associated with seafood so if you are familiar with that seasoning you have an idea what to expect it is nothing like a bay leaf if you have ever had nabisco s doo dads snack mix then these peanuts will be familiar to you they taste almost just like the peanuts in the mix and if you wanted to make your own chex party mix these nuts would be perfect like all virginia diner products the nuts come with a foil seal which is tightly depressed because the contents are vacuum packed when you break the seal you will hear the air rush in this type of packaging helps insure the nuts are fresh and crunchy and they were the nuts are small and mostly in halves there are a few fragments but not many

i have always loved mochi but cannot find it in little rock and did not want to go through the trouble of making my own this arrived quickly and in good condition it tastes fresh and soft not stale at all if you like mochi you will not be dissapointed
very delicious taste was stars ingredients why i dropped one star added sugar but still i would recommend this product

i debated a while before ordering these because they are kind of fragile but my shipment had no problems ha maybe i would trust amazon and ups more than the people they have got working down at the grocery store another reason i debated ordering was of course the salt and of course being saltines there is a bunch of it i have not compared a lot of other snacks but strangely enough these have less salt that other alternatives i guess because there is no other tastes that they have to mask the little bit of salt the do have comes right on through i do not normally worry about such things as health and nutrition but boxes is a lot and i tend to chow down on a lot of them because they are so good plenty of time left on the expiration date months from now so that is not a worry prices as with everything fluctuate but i got a good deal

i love this cereal i first had it at my sisters and now i am hooked i love the fact that it has good grains and that it is organic so this seems a good cereal as cereals go i love the taste a little sweet and crunch and the price at a box is really good

this is a pleasantly vanilla tinged breakfast cereal organic and gluten free at about per box it may not be for everyone but for those who need to worry about gluten this cereal is definitely not a trade off on taste i like the texture too with a satisfying crunchiness that is filling i definitely recommend giving this a try

i tried nature s path crunchy vanilla sunrise courtesy of amazon vine and really enjoyed it there is lot of variety in the cereal with all sorts of granola and cereal type pieces i am not skilled enough at forensic cerealogy to identify all of them but i do know enough to say that they all tasted great this is a great breakfast treat and it even works as a snack if you are so inclined

i had problems with the order but i am writing this review just about the coffee we buy this coffee so that every friday at work i can make a special pot of flavor my co workers really seem to enjoy the fun flavors of this brand especially the chocolate ones we will continue to purchase this brand in the future
my teenagers who are very hard to please simply love this stuff will order again and again

awsome taste love the bold flavor and individual packging already drank them all will order them again and again rich taste wife loves the coffee

if you like sugar and tropical fruit these snacks are for you they are small chunks with lots of flavor and they taste great my kids love them and i have purchased them many times also good on cereal sugar gets a bad rap i recomend it for good health

i recieved this in timely manner was packed good the taste is very good if you taste it at all no smoking if gets a little too hot i liked the smaller bottles so does nt get old before using all of it thanks
welches has the best flavor it spreads very easy onto bread because its jam not jelly my daughter eats it everyday it is very good

i found this stuff at a big box retailer not too long ago and gave it a try i was happy to find it here at a better price than the individual serving at the store it is a great drink to grab as i am running to catch my carpool in the morning it tides me over until i eat breakfast at work i love chocolate coconut water and this is great because of the caffeine kick of the coffee

all the wylers singles to go are great they taste good and mix easily in bottled water most places are overcharging for this item walgreen s sells a package of for or less it was a package of over memorial day most of my boxes had printing on the box indicating per box i see some places charging over per box at that rate you can buy a ounce can of soda even big brands when they are on special and you get the can and the water included so why spend that much just for the powder

as will all of bob s red mill products these are excellent the cost in buying in bulk from amazon is much lower than the cost at our local coop and i like this produce better does not really require any soaking before cooking

description lightly roasted and lightly salted with no added oil size bags evaluation excellent and flavorful however some are under roasted and not crunchy a few nuts taste stale blue diamond brand almonds moderately roasted with canola safflower or sunflower oil and lightly salted are more flavorful although not oily the roasting oil does effect the flavor whether that is a good thing or not is a matter of individual tastes the longer or more intense roasting makes the nuts crunchier price comparison at the time of this writing both back to nature and blue diamond almonds are about cents oz blue diamond almonds roasted salted ounce tins pack of the blue diamond almonds come in more convenient oz cans but may be less environmental freindly

you will either like this double salted licorice and indeed other salted licorice available on amazon or you will detest it the reviews on this and other licorice products attest to this polarity among reviewers it is an acquired taste that once acquired proves to be somewhat addictive i have only recently become acquainted with salted licorice i actually prefer the normal salted variety although the salty kick from ammonium salts rather that sodium chloride is very strong and strangely satisfying in these double salt rounds i would advise anybody who is thinking of trying salted licorice to seek out a small pack of the stuff first of all if you like it go ahead and order one of the regular salted kraepelien holm farm salt licorice pound bags pack of available on amazon making sure to take advantage of the subscription offer otherwise you risk wasting your money on something you may consider inedible

the sticky rice is perfect just microwave it in the container it comes in for min the paper thin wraps are very small and it is a bit difficult to roll the result is a bit of a mess but tastes great i put a small amount of crab meat next to the rice each pack comes with wraps a container of rice and one soy sauce pack the calorie count is but with it is a reasonable and is enough for a lunch i bought it when it was a gold box item for it is worth that but i will not purchase again for a higher price overall it is easy to make tastes great and is a great option to have around since it does not require any refrigeration

i am really thrilled with this product i wanted to be able to make oatmeal in my slow cooker so that it was warm and ready in the morning with no hassles i have done so in the past with old fashioned rolled oats and the outcome was always less than satisfactory no matter what adjustments i made to the water oats ratio this attempt turned out perfectly the very first time which most likely has to do with the cut of the grain the ratio is cup oats to cups water on low for hours and cup of dried fruit i added about cup of quinoa and a total of cups dried fruit craisins tart cherries and goji berries and good sized diced braeburn apple no sugars i did not use the spray pam product it tells you to put in the crock but coated it with organic coconut oil which is solid at room temperature it was amazing no sweetening needed to enhance the flavors my husband eats oatmeal every day and he really liked it too

i always taste the food i am about to introduce to my kid this one has a fresh berry taste a bit too runny though liquid smoothie baby loves it too especially when it shoots up as a fountain when he squeezes it problem is that its price increased drastically lately i am having a hard time justifying buying it instead of other no less tasty products

in the past i just did not use tomato paste very often that is because most brands are just nasty we would always have a can of hunt s or contadina around but i would always be disappointed whenever i used them it is really annoying to say make homemade enchilada sauce have it taste mediocre and then add insult to injury by having to throw away half a can of leftover tomato paste amore by contrast actually keeps the bright tomato flavor since it is in tubes there is none of the tinny taste so common to canned foods and it is so easy to squeeze out a small amount that i use it all the time there are all sorts of soups and sauces that can benefit from a little tomato flavor but which do not justify opening a whole can of paste not to mention the fact that most canned pastes would make the food taste worse not better there are only two mysteries about this product for me first a tablespoon serving has grams of fat no other tomato pastes i looked at contain fat since the ingredients are only tomato paste and salt i have to wonder where this fat comes from the second mystery is that they label the box as double concentrated as far as i can tell it is no more concentrated than any other tomato paste i still have to use exactly the same amount in a recipe it just tastes better than the other brands but i will forgive amore the mysterious fat and exaggerated labeling this has become a cooking essential in my kitchen

previous reviews have been negative on the taste of this water but to me it has less taste than some common brands dasani aquafina of water in that sense i like it more i cannot stand the slightly bitter metallic taste of those waters this one tastes more like water on the other hand this is advertised for having the correct ph level and as being electrolyte infused but i have noticed nothing special about it in terms of how it impacts my workouts it is wet just like any other water so in this facet i rate it as being less than advertised

has a smooth taste like it claims without any unpleasant metallic flavor hydrates well although i think it is rather expensive and i personally did not notice it hydrating any better than arrowhead water which is what i normally drink if however you have already discovered that high ph water helps you more than other types this water tastes good and would be a good choice

a certainly refreshing bottle of water and a very large one at that the taste is very pleasing without the plastic from the bottle taste to taint it it seems a bit pricey though giving you extra benefits might just be worth the purchase
this water taste great we love the bottle perfect water for everyone i love that it is liters because i am trying to drink more water you will love this water

i am very picky about my water i moved to florida at the age of and i quickly realized that i could not drink the tap water i can actually taste the difference at restaurants when they serve tap water versus purified or bottled water essentia ph drinking water is the best water i have ever tasted it tastes completely clear and delicious i only received a liter bottle so i did not notice any of the medical benefits of the water i do have gerd but did not notice a difference with drinking the liters of water over days the price is a little steep on this water but i would consider buying more for the taste and to see if it really helps my gerd

i admit i have a hard time identifying differences in most bottled water unless they have some funky aftertaste but this water is different it tastes exceptionally clean and crisp no chemical tastes no salty taste just very refreshing water i like the large size of the bottles as carrying one of these as i go out would guarantee i meet my water quota for the day i poured some for my five year old granddaughter and she said you have good water at your house granny so i guess there is a difference when it is good it is good

i am not smart enough to know enough about bottled water i am in the camp who believes that naturally filtered well water is the best most bottled water strips the natural minerals out however there is somethign to be said about water being too acidic a higher ph would be the opposite so in that regard this should make this water much better honestly i cannot tell the difference but i can say ther was no odor there was no bad aftertaste but i cannot say if this is worth the price

this is one of the best tasting waters that i have tried it is just purified water and not spring water but it has such a pure tasting taste to it it is enhanced with minerals and honestly i can taste the mineral taste which i like funny that a good tasting water is different from most drinks that we consume water is one that we want without any taste or flavor just pure fresh wet and clean essentia is one without any noticeable flavors but the mineral taste i really liked it and gave it to my family too they were surprised with a yum which is not really a reaction that i normally get from water it has ph factor and infused with electrolytes cannot really tell those things from drinking it but good to know recommending completely on taste it is excellent tasting water
the first thing i look for in a water is the aftertaste some of them have a metallic nasty taste that i can not stand but this one is very refreshing cool clear and fresh definately would buy again

i think the essentia drinking water tastes very good there are a couple popular brands of bottled water that i think taste funny the essentia is very good and crisp i cannot say much about the actual ph level because i did not test it however i did not seem to have as many issues with my acid relux on the days when i drank the essentia it is awkward carrying the liter bottle around but i did actually find it helpful i take it to work in the morning and make myself drink it until it is gone before i allow myself to have something good meaning bad for me therefore i do get a much larger water intake during the day at the office than i normally would so i love the taste and the size of the bottle but it can get expensive i will probably keep some on hand especially when my acid reflux is really acting up and the prilosec is not helping but i am not sure if i could really afford to buy it to have every single day
tastes like good odorless fresh clean water i like the fact the water is electrolyte infused the bottle is a very generous size but easy to grip and hold
what else can i say other than this drinking water tastes great the bottle is quite large at liter it is almost the size of a liter bottle of soda

i am on auto and i love my water just wish it was a little bit cheaper or if they give discounts or free pack with orders it would make thing a bit easier i will continue to get my essentia as long as i am able to the water does have a lot of wonderful advantages i have fluid build up in my legs and sometimes my lungs because of my heart i had kidney failure this water has helped me to be well hydrated and to keep my kidneys in working order the water goes directly where it is needed

for me some bottle water is better than others this bottled water was very good it had a good clean taste which is always important especially for those who do not enjoy drinking water the bottle was also thick enough to withstand being dropped but not so thick that you are really just paying for the bottle overall i would buy this bottled water again

have never been a big meat eater but cut back even more a few months ago i began supplementing my diet with more beans legumes but was not feeling nutritionally satisfied and realized i was not getting enough protein did a little research and discovered that hemp was ideal for meeting protein requirements and according several articles i read it has many other nutritional and health benefits as well i purchased the nutiva hemp protein powder in conjunction with the better than milk rice to avoid over use of soy according to directions for both products i mix tablespoons hemp protein and tablespoons of btm in water it mixes easily in a regular plastic shaker and i do not even have to use the de clumping attachment that fits inside the shaker it is just shake n go this combination has been the perfect way to start my day i was concerned about the taste as some reviews i have read rated the taste of hemp very low i cannot speak for other brands but the finely ground nutiva hemp powder has a mild nutty flavor and i love it from what i have read hemp does not contain oligosaccharides which commonly causes gastric distress with soy proteins and i have not experienced any bloating with the hemp and rice milk combo i am happy to start my day with something both nutritious and delicious and thank goodness i do not have to use the electric blender one less thing to wash also the amazon price on the nutiva hemp protein and the better than milk rice cannot be beat and both qualify for free shipping fantastic

great taste for years i bought another lemon product cannot remember the name that i was very happy with then happened to come across this product and wow it was even better so buying it regularly for last couple of years use mostly in iced tea
this candy jar is great my daughter loves hello kitty and she was so excited to see this candy jar very durable and easy to fill
really yummy i ate them all within days they taste better than fruit by the foot which i also like i would definitely like to buy some more in the future

wow how do they pack all that sweetness and flavor into just a few drops i just tried it in my coffee and i was very surprised this is great stuff and such a blessing for the diabetics out there like myself

i bought this with my hestitation however it tastes good it has a very butterly taste and sweet as well only pieces not so many

these cookies are not sweet at all which is ok but they also have no flavor at all they name is vanilla creme cookies where is vanilla the texture is kind of strange too cookie is crumbly but around the creme it is crunchy overall will not be buying this product ever again
very cherry tasting reminds me of cherry popsicles with the addition of vitamins it is a great alternative to juices and sodas it is very dark red so be careful of stains

we bought these to make out xmas eve stuffed vinegar peppers everyone prefers red peppers but the usual jarred vinegar cherry tomatoes are mostly green i saw these and though expensive decided to buy them just for the holiday they are very tender and tasty our only complaints are that they are much smaller therefore a little difficult to stuff and pricey for taste i would give them stars
these lollipops have the best flavor ever i have tried many but these are definitely the very best they come in many flavors something for everone
easy mix great taste works well with my bread machine and makes large loaves
tasted this at a tea came home and ordered the loose and the sachets i have shared some with a friend harney makes wonderful tea
i have been trying to find a gluten free product that tastes good this taste so good that my family did not guess that it was gluten free unbelievable but true
taste great i use this to make vanilla latte and vanilla coke yum and it doens t contain any corn syrup

i have ordered these types of chocolates before weinbrand bohnen brandy chocolates and these were fantastic they had great flavor were very fresh sometimes they dry up if they are older and were the perfect size some larger ones are too big and the liquid can run if not all in your mouth the chocolate as well as the brandy were of high quality and very tasty also the price was great for as many that were in the package i ordered these very close to the holiday and they arrived earlier than expected

i love my tassimo coffee machine and i love the gevalia signature blend coffee it is great any time of day never bitter or over bearing always smooth and mild i have been using it for over years now and the coffee is brewed the same for every cup i highly recommend tassimo machine and gevalia signature blend coffee

this coffee has a rich flavor without any bitterness i usually do not like coffee made with dark beans because they are too strong for my taste but this coffee is great tasting i signed up for amazon s subscribe and save service and ordered just one oz bag to try it the discount and free shipping with the subscribe service makes it a great bargain too

bold and tangy the taco bell spicy ranchero sauce is excellent we have used it with tacos and with flautas and now there is none left in our sample bottle everyone liked it even those who normally do not care for spicy foods off to the grocery for more

this sauce is pretty good it is calories per tablespoon i tried this sauce with chicken and really liked it it is not too spicy at all i do not usually eat spicy food and am very sensitive to even small amounts of heat in my food this sauce hardly had any heat at all

the taste of this sauce is not anything earth shattering but it is good had it on my lunch turkey wraps for a few weeks and four dabs went a long way for flavor not spicy at all creamy and just the right zip to spice up something a tad without the hotness or watery consistency of salsa
this sauce has a unique and interesting flavor it makes a great salad dressing as well overall i recommend and like the fact there are are few ingredients enjoy
even though sugar free these candies taste as good as the sugared variety good mix of flavors in small packages

i bought sumac to make the fattouch salad i was making for authentic would not have been the same without it gives it a nice sweet flavor especially the dressing now i am looking for other ways to use it

mycodex plus environmental control aerosol household spray is amazing the basement was full of fleas this year one can sprayed onto the basement floor took care of the problem other products have been tried as well as flea bombs having been set off nothing else seemed to work this stuff is a plus would definitely use again if ever there was a need
there is a lot of popcorn in this bag we have had this without butter and it tastes great i have never had popcorn that tastes this good great product

this popcorn has pretty fair flavor plain i always add buttery oil and salt to it because i am a fat fat i purchased this bag of popcorn months ago and i still have about pounds left next time i think i will get the pound bag and i will not have to worry about buying popcorn for the rest of my life you will save a ton of money by purchasing bulk bags of seeds and a popcorn popper i highly recommend this product along with the presto poplite hot air popper white for all popcorn lovers
this popcorn is very good its cheap but it does not taste like it very fluffy this is the perfect popcorn for people who do not want to spend bucks on bags of popcorn

some of my friends who i have offered these to say they taste like soap and even i have to admit they have a very unusual taste but that is what i love about them and they leave your breath smelling wonderful for a really long time afterwards i first purchased these at world market but here i got them at less than half of what they sell them for each there live on the edge try violet candy today i wish they also made them in lavendar flavor too
this is another in a series of good kashi cereals i have yet to have a bad one
we made this and it was light easy to make and great with chips and vegetables i purchased for neighbors and friends for the hollidays

item was perfect they have a very good sweet cinnamon taste and they were not too hot i do not like spicy food for me i received them quickly and would re order again these are my favorite candies and it is very hard to locate in stores now

i purchased this on a whim after eating a butternut squash pasta dish at a very nice restaurant i am very leery of canned jarred pasta sauce and almost always prefer to just make my own from scratch however this sauce is just divine it has a very robust taste and is pleasantly sweet i paired it with cheese ravioli and it was just perfect i think that it would be great with just about any pasta it is a pleasant change from a tomato based sauce and is very satisfying i highly recommend
i have tried many types of chocolate drinks since i do not drink milk this one along with trader joe s chocolate soymilk are my favorites would give stars except that it is pretty expensive
a friend of mine has suggested leilalove french macaron to me it is realllllly awesome if you are a cookie lover it worth testing plus beautiful package and on time delivery

i first purchased this product at bj s wholesale club this is the best flavored carbonated water i have ever had like other reviewers bj s discontinued in favor of another product what a mistake i wrote to talking rain and their new president requesting this product have an online outlet and it seems they delivered yes it is more expensive but with super saver shipping and subscription service savings i am in for a few cases each month try it you will love it

i purchased this on a whim based on a co worker s comment about how much they like this brand it is not the best value at each on subscribe save but i was interested enough to give it a shot i am glad i did all three flavors were great and each time i picked one up i was saying this is definitely my favorite flavor but then i would say the same on the next one and let us just call it a vicious circle i did want to point out and why i deducted star the picture of the product listed shows pomegranate berry orange mango and black raspberry however the package that was received had lemon lime in place of pomegranate berry while it was a great flavor i was looking forward to trying the pomegranate berry i am hoping maybe my next shipment is what is shown on the picture

i liked the taste of these cookies and they reminded me of my childhood however these are packaged different they are sealed in a plastic wrapper not the wax type paper from a long time ago i am guessing that this keeps the graham crackers fresh tasting for a long time they were crispy and had a decent taste my only complaint was that several of the packages were damaged and the crackers were crumbs

these graham crackers are a lot better tasting than the organic graham crackers that i have tried and compared to other brands generic i much prefer the crunchy sweetness of honey maid the graham crackers taste so fresh and are the best for dunking in milk or tea i love these as an alternative to cookies fortunately the packaging ensures that the last graham cracker is as good and crispy as the first one the portable and palatable treats are great for kids or anyone on the go and for making perfectly shaped s mores

as far as cookies go this is not going to ruin your diet much and it is pretty tasty too three cookies and they are not tiny cookies either are calories there are of both fiber protein they are not too sweet which is great for me these are called cookies but they seem more like crackers they are kind of dry which i do not mind but the blueberries make them a little chewy the ingredients do not list sulfur dioxide a color preservative for many dried fruits yay sulfur gives me hives anyway as of right now these are per package for packages of servings each i am hoping these become subscribe save items these are good i will probably get them again

newtons fruit thins are quite delicious as soon as you bite into one of these crispy cookies you can taste the real blueberries right down to a few seeds but i did not specifically notice the brown sugar flavor they are just the right thickness to be crispy not hard the package contains a plastic tray with rows of cookies cookies in each row very enjoyable

these cookies were unexpectedly tasty and crispy given the fact that there was no hydrogenated fat in them i always look at the list of ingredients for the word hydrogenated even when the label says no trans fat they are not too sweet with a slight taste of blueberry and brown sugar i agree with other reviewers that they have an addictive quality to them and with only calories for three cookies about calories per cookie one could get into trouble by overindulging my husband and i really liked these however these would be perfect for dunking in milk or crumbling over ice cream enjoy

these cookies are not like the traditional fig newtons fruit newtonss i have bought in the past they look more like a thin cracker the cookies are also crunchy like a cracker but definitely not as dry they are sweet but not too sweet and very blueberry they remind me of the very top of a blueberry muffin which is a good thing i will definitely buy more of these for my family

it is incredibly tasty i would recommend that any hot spice lover give it a try i will attempt to give an objective description but well it is a spice you will really have to taste it yourself hotness mild or roughly like tabasco brand pepper sauce original red oz saltyness none it is just pepper absorption v high v finely ground unable to observe any small flecks after cooking into my standard spice test top ramen variety pack beef chicken it has a very clean smooth taste almost like adding pure hotness to food without the smoky overtone of tobasco the roughness of black pepper or the cumin of chili sauces it has a very slight cling or linger ie as with habanero peppers where the more you eat the hotter it gets one or two sips of water will wash it clean i have not tried it with mixed spiced and milder dishes but due to how easy it is to sip the hotness away it should work very well there
i like this flavor but it kind of reminds me a jello pudding bites and those things are just nasty i mostly use this one for recipes to create new flavors
i encountered this snack in a vending machine liked it and bought a case for travel i think it is very tasty stuff and reasonably healthy especially compared with other packaged snacks
the flavor of the two does not taste lie strawberries and vanilla in my opinion for being naturally flavored they do have a manufactured taste i tried one of each before giving the rest away

i have loved ultra thin pretzel sticks since mr salty used to sell them then for decades i never saw an other ultra thin pretzel sticks and did not even know if any were available anywhere then i saw them at a local department store and was ecstatic but then after going twice they discontinued them these are the ones that were at the department store i was disappointed but decided to give amazon com a shot and see if i could find them here and i did they even have a subscription plan where you can get a case every month months or months and the price for a case is reasonable especially if you go with the subscription at which time your shipping is always free just buying a case costs way too much with shipping i was not too thrilled with the idea of having to have a subscription just for free shipping but you can cancel at any time and i found that having a case on hand is nice and so we are getting them every months that gives us time to eat what we want share with our grown kids and grandkids and still give us time in between orders to not get sick of them it is great i highly recommend these especially if you love ultra thin pretzel sticks like i do

i was very disappointed i love good cider having grown up and gone to the mill each year i like most grocery store cider as well this stuff was really bad tasted to me like raw chemicals went through or people who spit it out directly not my machine they liked the tea and coffee and even ran hot water between to see if that was it
not nearly as good tasting as the other kcup ciders i have had my girlfriend hated it too they are going to find the garbage can

i usually purchase the green mountain naturals apple cider i found this product was much cheaper and i would try it from now on i will spend the extra for a taste i enjoy this went down the sink

these instant potato flakes taste great and do not contain sulfites like many commercial brands i do wish they included some simple instructions on the bag we used the instructions from bob s red mill potato flakes now discontinued for servings heat of water to boiling add butter or margarine and of salt remove from heat and add cold milk or soymilk add approximately of potato flakes more or less depending on how stiff you like them stir gently and fluff with a fork do not whip

i am utterly baffled by the positive reviews for this product now i have been using stevia for the past year to sweeten my coffee i have no issue with the stevia i used to drink a lot of soda and then a few years back a lot of diet soda since then i have been able to give up soda altogether but my dad who is diabetic is absolutely obsessed with diet coke i have been trying to get him to lessen his diet coke intake which is a day but he just waves me off so i did some research read the reviews and bought packs of the cola and lemon flavor each i tried both to see how they tasted and was totally confused by this tasteless carbonated water there was no taste it literally just tasted like carbonated water with a vague hint of some flavor i cannot imagine anyone wanting to drink this stuff let alone rave about it did i get a bad batch my dad will never be able to transition from diet coke to this stuff because this stuff is truly awful so disappointing
i drink this tea to relax and for stomach and digestive problems it works every time very calming and a good all around tea time

i was diagnosed with celiac in may there were few things i minded giving up but one was granola in my breakfast yogurt i found gf udi s granola at a grocery store and it was a bag which is a lot when i eat it every morning so i was thrilled to find it at amazon and at such a great price worth ever penny all flavors are great vanilla is my favorite thanks udi s for making gf easy

nice smoky taste which i like i am having a hard time eating enough protein so i thought this might help it is soft as commented on in other reviews not the traditional pull with your teeth kind of jerky i will be making a few concoctions with it chopped in a bean salad and crumbled on a baked potato thanks amazon for the gold box special so that i could try it

one of my favorite brands of pasta looks cooks tastes texture all like that of wheat pasta wish it was a wee bit cheaper but not too bad in the world of gluten free food prices highly recommended you will not be disappointed

i was brewing about pots a day of starbucks columbian or other good columbian coffees until recently at a relative that only had folgers instant i reluctantly tried it and was amazed at the great taste i could not believe how good it was and now i drink it everyday even more than brewed coffee i highly recommend trying this
this is my favorite flavor of crystal lite but i could not find it anywhere thankfully i could get a huge batch of it on amazon so it will last me quite a while thank you

this is probably the best tea i have had and this brand is always a winner so far i am still perfecting my taste with this particular tea but while i am experimenting looking for my perfect taste i have found it to be great weak or strong depending on my mood i like strong tea sometimes but not bitter which can be a problem for tea whether to much or to little is used my advice would be perfect before you rate because you may just be making it wrong since i usually let my tea set longer than what is recommended to get my taste and my taste is different than anyone in my family they usually claim it is too strong with how much i use but for me it is perfect this is a pack of six so make sure you will like this kind before purchasing
these light crunchy crackers are free of eggs dairy casein wheat gluten soy corn nuts peanuts sesame and coconut an allergen free dream and yummy

i have given samples to my friends and they agree i use one tablespoon per cup of coffee i use a oz french press coffee maker and let the coffee brew for minutes adjust the mix to your taste and you will not be disappointed i am looking forward to trying the the other boyd s coffee blends

like previous crystal light products this one is easy to use and mix and tastes great will plan on getting it again
