great taste and easy to carry with you for whenever you may want flavored water the taste is not overpowering or too bland i prefer this to just plain water
these cranberries are plump and taste great they have a nice aroma and just the right amount of sugar great

i am not a rice connoisseur and the roland thai jasmine rice is the first type of jasmine rice i have ever tasted to me this rice looks like basmati rice long and thin grains it cooks pretty well turns fluffy and fast in the microwave i add cups of water for every cup of rice and the cooked rice looks like cooked basmati rice the rice tastes good too although i have to say i prefer the taste of real basmati rice

these are my favorite dark chocolate i do not like overly sweet chocolates and love the combination of salt and dark chocolate these are very tasty and just the right size if you want to have a small daily dose of dark chocolate but do not want to load up on calories

we used to raise montmorency cherries and these dried cherries are the real deal as dried fruit they are perfect moist chewy and wonderfully flavorful they make a wonderfully energizing snack at the office though i generally do not like added sugar on dried fruits it is really necessary to counteract the cherries naturally tart taste reconstituted i am guessing they would be perfect for tart cherry pies certainly the flavor is everything i remember in a really good tart cherry pie which is almost impossible to find these days

in the great british trifecta of british powdered drinks to be mixed with milk and sugar horlicks the most malty milo is medium chocolately and malty and ovaltine seems to be the most chocolately all are basically comfort drinks when plain milk just will not do all are powders to which you add milk and sugar to get a sweet malty drink the latter two with chocolate flavor as well i love all drinks but if you are drinking this for nostalgia s sake make sure you get the milo from where ever your nostalgia springs from because milo is made in different countries and they all taste a little different for me i love milo for it is good mix of chocolate and malt not too much of either and a great comfort drink for cold nights

i made pumpkin bread for the first time a few weeks ago with some fresh pumpkin my husband needs to eat gluten free so we tried this baking mix instead of wheat flour it was delicious we all thought it was so wonderful that we bought more pumpkins just so we can make more the only thing that i do not like is that it has a small amount of corn starch in the baking powder and my son is on a corn free diet
this meat is very fresh and taste very good its already cooked you just warm it up in the frying pan its sliced thin its lot better than the one at the restaurants
i have had a hard time figuring out the right amount to use but this product tastes great it was shipped quickly packaged well

this adds a great taste to your popcorn its not easy to get the same measurement each time and removing it from the container provided is a bit of a task the price of this product is high and even higher depending on your location shipping costs are very high and are on the rise this product does not yield as much popped corn as some other products but it still is the best for taste gives a great flavor from the initial popping and not adding any toppings

if those dense heavy nutrition bars are too rich for you to tolerate or if you cannot handle them after a hard workout this one is worth trying it is very tasty and light the wafers give it a nice texture and crunch and it will remind you of those creme wafer cookies from childhood but much tastier and with better nutrition i will say that if you are looking for a super bar this may not be ideal because it does have a little more fat in it than other bars i like and a bit less protein and carbs but it is worth buying because it tastes really good it is light and easy to digest for me this is a great meal replacement bar snack or great after a light to moderate workout

i chose this product as i am not crazy about chocolate flavoured products this goes well with coffee and good if you are in a hurry it keeps me full till lunch time i worry about the fat content however i probably would need an input from a dietician regarding that

i really like all the power bars flavors great for when you want a snack but do not want all the bad stuff that comes with other protein bars i also like the crunch when i am craving chocolate it really hits the spot and dulls my cravings
i like this product because it basically does what i anticipated as long as you have a full glass of water with it it will keep you feeling full for a few hours

i have tried lots of different protein bars but the main problem is always the same they taste like protein bars this is my favorite because it tastes like eating a normal chocolate waffer candy bar chocolate is my favorite followed by peanut butter great for a snack i take one with me when i go out with friends so i have a tasty healthy treat
these energy bars taste great and come in a variety of flavors they are low in carbs which is what i need
seriously calories these are so good and even better if you add a little bit to them if you know what i mean

i have been trying all kinds of diet drinks because i am getting tired of just water all the time so many diet drinks have a strong after taste or no flavor at all i have always liked crystal light drinks but have been hoping for some new flavors these new moctails flavors are great they have a very different flavor from their other mixes the mojito flavor is refreshing and has a wonderful taste i definitely recommend you try all the moctails flavors you will not be dissapointed
this did not tickle my taste buds i really wanted to like it but will go back to the crystal light lemonade

i was pleasantly surprised at the new crystal light drink mixes the mojito flavor tastes a lot like the real thing there is a strong lime taste and sort of an after taste of a kick of mint this was my second favorite of the three varieties available but it was pretty tasty and a nice change of pace

i have not crystal light since it was still made with saccharin but i have been wanting to lose some weight and stop drinking so many sugary drinks but it is hard being most diet sodas end up giving me a headache anyway i went out on a limb and i tried it it was delicious you could hardly even taste the artificial sweetener and the flavor was yummy i do not drink alcohol so i have never had a real mojito but this had just the right amount of mint to add a little something to the lime i have tried a recipe from paula deen for a honeydew limeade with mint and it is one of the best drinks i have ever had but it is also loaded with sugar and with all the fruit it ends up costs bucks a pitcher so i usually only make it once or twice a summer but this has the same flavors of mint lime and a sweetness if only they added some honeydew but then it will not be a mojito i guess i will definitely be getting it again and it did not even give me a headache like diet soda does stars

i enjoy many other flavors of crystal light but i got bored of them all for a long time recently i bought a container of the mojito flavor and i am hooked great taste like a children s version of a mojito i drink a lot more water liquid each day because of these little packets great alternative to diet soft drinks and water
ideal is the right name for this low calorie yes sweetener absolutely no funky aftertaste acts just like sugar and tastes like it too
ok this salt is a must have if you really like to cook i think it has a good flavor and the price is really good even if you do not use it everyday it is good to add to your spices

the coffee is excellent easy to order and always arrives in a short period of time love the convienence and am about to enjoy a fresh cup this morning we used to have coffee made in a drip coffee pot but by the time we would have a second cup the coffee lost much of it is taste and at times tasted burnt never happens with keurig coffee
i take these for snacks sometimes just for lunch very filling can carry in your pocket with no mess love the flavor

these are great tasting bars i could eat them all day but the problem is that they are not filling at all you eat one and it does not feel like you ate anything at all which is why i have to give it stars instead of one

i purchased these bars as a meal replacement after a job during lunch the texture is a bit hard moat if not all protein bars are hard but these special k protein bars tastes great with grams of protein per bar it is a much better alternative then other snacks out there i only have other protein bars that i use as meal replacements after a workout or job and these special k bars tastes the best to me i will be buying more

i saw that star rating and thought there is no way the folks at buffalo bills could produce a beef stick rated one out of five i bought them because of that one star and i was right its a star snack just like everything else they sell it is much better than any common slim jim or jack links beef stick
i got a bag of this free at pax and was really surprised how good it was i mean gamers generally do not eat well but i like this better than most trail mix
this was great i was not expecting jam to taste this good i will never switch back the only reason i do not use it every day is because i do not want to run out of it

this stuff is delicious the flavor tastes like a combination of grape juice and cranberry juice it has just the right amounts of sweetness and tartness the size of each packet makes it perfect for adding to a bottle of spring water or a bottle of filtered water from home the little stix are very convenient and easy to open best of all it has no sugar no carbs and no calories a great way to jazz up your water without messing up your diet

there is a very nice watermelon flavor to these candies if i had any complaint and i really do not it would be that i would prefer the candies individually wrapped otherwise i am pleased with my selection
i eat this many times a week it is flavorful and great texture i would eat it even if i were not gluten free
great tasting and the added benefit is the fiber my son loves granola granola bars etc and with gf products it is really hard to find sources of fiber this is wonderful and it has fiber

i rarely find this product in the grocery store in my rural town so i decided to make the online purchase kraft honey hickory smoke barbecue sauce is a mild sweet sauce nothing fancy but i really like it
it is so hard to find gluten free foods that taste good this one is really delicious and it is easy to make

narnia i first had turkish delight while i was in turkey there shops produce turkish delight and hundreds of other exotic treats fresh every town of more than a few thousand people seems to have at least one of these shops the sweetness of turkish delight varies by shop in its native homeland and this confection is a fine example so long as one does not eat all that sugar sifting around in the box i think there is so much so it will act as a natural preservative if you cannot fit a quick trip turkey to get the genuine article hand made fresh then this is the best imported substitute i have tried i would not trust getting something like this from a regular retailer because of potential shelf life issues and i would not trust confections obtained from a discount clothing outlet but on line through amazon i trust tangentially if you like turkish delight you owe it to yourself to visit the country of origin because there is many other delicious turkish confections you probably have not experienced
would not recommend this product to anyone because it had chemical taste which my guests complained about when i served on a buffet type dinner i was so embarrassed
obviously taste is subjective i wanted to add my opinion and stars to the tally to this item because i believe it is worth it
wanted organic walnuts and now i have them convenient that they are in separate bags so i do not have to open at one time good tasting bits and halves

this is an excellent soy free alternative to peanut butter i even bake with it i make peanut butter cookies that people would swear are real peanut butter with this product it is definitely not a no stir product though it does arrive separated the oil tends to rise to the top and so it does need to be stirred from time to time this is still a fabulous product my children adore it

i agree with previous review these do not resemble scallops in any way but they are very good i do not understand why they are so hard to find recipe suggestion cook ramen noodles throw in a handful of chopped skallops when the noodles are almost cooked just long enough to heat them up drain most of the water then add the spice packet not very classy but good and quick
brewing this coffee took me back to my trip to kona and visiting the coffee plantations drinking a cup of this brew is the next best thing to being there
great strong tasting gum but does not last long but is still worth it especially if your not allowed to have regular sf gum the cinnamon taste is very great

although it is a bit alarming to have these given a star review by a cheesewhiz afficianado a condiment competing for most vile non food item on the supermarket shelf i am going to these actually are really fabulous they have a mealy texture and great oaty oily taste that is better than any other oat cake i have tried and better than any other cracker too my babies also love them and as non wheat products are suitable for the young and for the allergic

i love these crackers and keep them on hand all the time they are great for soups cheese and cracker snacks to spread peanut butter on just plain or they are like chips cannot eat just one i have them on subscribe save and they always arrive safely and on time a bit of trivia our parrots love them as snacks too

this pasta was very good i was a bit skeptical at first about the pre cooked pasta in a container that did not need to be refrigerated but i ate it and had no ill side effects the instructions to heat up the pasta and sauce were simple and because it is not a frozen meal it only took about in the microwave the pasta was cooked well the sauce while simple marinara was really good just enough seasoning to make it taste good without taking away from the great tomato taste the marinara was also chunky and not pureed or watery or runny overall a very good product that i would eat again
i think these peppercorns are bland tasteless it lacks the pepper spiciness will never buy this brand again it was a fail choice to say the least

my japanese grandma drinks a homemade mix of apple cider vinegar and bananas for health and this drink is black pungent and quite frightening hongcho vinegreat is a great alternative and actually tastes really good do not let the vinegar scare you off it is really quite sweet and you just get a little hit of the tang going down i guess it really depends on how much you dilute it i believe the package says for a strong taste or or for a lighter taste i have tried both the pomegranate and blueberry flavors and they were both good you can also mix the concentrate with milk yogurt or even make a salad dressing out of it the bottle recommends drinking after a work out after a bath or before bed the purported benefits of drinking vinegar including overall well being improvement in digestion speeding up metabolism and skin benefits i have only been drinking this for a short time so i cannot really say if i have noticed any difference in health as far as the amazon price i got a smokin deal at my local h mart and picked up a bottle for only the regular price is bottle so the amazon price is not too bad especially if you do not have a korean grocery store nearby
tea has a great flavor besides a lot of health benefits it is mild tasting not strong at all here are a lot of bags in box so lasts a while
used these cones for a back to school ice cream social everyone thought they were great i would buy them again

i bought this for halloween treats ordered it on the and it came on the great service i like this candy bar better than the butterfinger bar which seems to fall apart when taking the bar out of the wrapper the chocolate seems to be a better grade in the clark bar

great coconut oil purchased this to use when making my own popcorn it is great my whole family loves the taste after buying this i read that virgin coconut oil is the most healthy for popcorn was thrilled to get it see that it is virgin coconut oil love it hope it comes in a larger container for next time

i have ordered this times now my son in afghanistan requested some of this to be sent to him he loves it it is a little salty but if you eat with low salt or no salt tortilla chips it tastes great you will love it
when you follow the cooking directions it is excellent if you do not cook it into the pasta the flavor is ruined

if you compare to buying the packs at walmart its a great price of the packs from walmart are this is the flavor is the best i have ever had i like spearmint but then a friend gave me a piece of this and its way better

i had never tried green tea powder before but decided to get some after reading some reviews on smoothies and healthy drinks since i make about to smoothies a week i thought this would be a great addition to my different recipes i was a little surprised at how small the can was when i received it i do not know why since it is only oz which is a fairly small size it is a bit pricey for the size but worth the money if you really enjoy green tea or use it as a health enhancer
i am not sure what else to say but it is a very tasty syrup it comes in a pretty standard bottle but it was packet very well and arrived in fine shape

this is fine it is just not all that perhaps if i had special equipment that would make it without getting little floaties in my cup i would have given it more stars i used a fine mesh strainer and poured the boiling water through twice and perhaps if i did not get an unimaginable headache a half hour or so after drinking it i might have gone for three stars unsure whether this caused the headache i have to try it one more time but the end result tasted like tea nothing special and at per bag uh i would rather go for celestial seasonings if i want some caffeine free tea beverage drink so if you have an espresso machine and want to branch out into tea this might be for you otherwise go for some loose leaf and steep the hell out of it

eden foods puts out the best tasting pumpkin seeds these are shelled she will removed these spicy ones do not have much more flavor than the regular ones but enough to make them worth getting instead of the regulars they are not hot at all oh and the best thing about these they are message free
i like anything by this company and wish more flavors available from amazon the apple cinnamon is very versatile and makes especially good iced tea also
can be eaten on its own not salty at all with each single serving porch
very tasty bacon smoky sauce for eggs hamburgers non bacony items that could use some bacon goodness hubby is thrilled not a spicy hot sauce cool that it is veggie friendly

dead heat is the finest quality gucci hot sauce i have ever tried and i am an experienced hot sauce aficionado it is hot enough to be powerul use one drop at a time yet not so hot as to be dangerous to the touch or unusuable for cooking people who make hot wings at home and who are looking for a superior hot sauce to add a measured heat to your wings this is your sauce very very good
i like this mixture very much it could be less expensive but for taste and quality it is worth the price
marley s mellow mood is fantastic not only does it taste great but it really works best thing since sliced bread i highly recommend you try some
soft flavorful and fun i feel a little goofy eating these inch long fruit rolls but they do taste great

we were getting these for free at work we stopped getting them so i went to smart and final to buy my own my local smart and final did not have them so i ordered a box from amazon cannot wait to get them they are a great snack

i do not generally care too much for the healthy alternatives especially when it comes to coffee however after trying truvia at a hotel i am now hooked i usually get it at the grocery store but it is good to see that it is available on amazon and now that i have prime i might just be getting it online instead this sweetener tastes really good and in addition to coffee i have had it with desserts and it tastes great i think it even tastes better than sugar and definitely tastes better than splenda i cannot comment as to the health aspects related to artificial sweeteners but i am sure that there is plenty of information available on the internet related to that as a casual coffee drinker i highly recommend truvia however you may want to try one of the smaller box sizes before purchasing a larger quantity just be sure that you like it
i first tasted this coffe at a casino and was delighted with the wonderful taste it has good flavor and is very affordable i highly recommend it

perhaps i did not read the packaging well this is a lot of candy the toffee melts in your mouth and the chocolate is well done i ended up taking two of the over stuff packages to work where they disappeared in two days wow this heath is really delicious not one bar was broken
great taste and easy to make in very little time great when adding raisins and whatever your likes and variations may be

love dreamfields pasta cannot get the lasagna noodles where i live so i was so happy to find them at amazon delivery was quick the only thing is the noodles got broken in shipment which was a dissappointment

overall the product is fantastic and the coffee is great i am giving a review of stars only because amazon s advertising is misleading it does not come in the advertised box as someone else indicated it is an unmarked box with smaller bags on the inside it is not a plastic k kup the product that you receive is what is pictured with a filter type bottom it does fit in your keurig and brews just fine i love the aroma and the taste of this coffee reminded my husband and i of espresso we had in siily italy a few years ago

the first thing i would like to say is that the bottom of the k cup is a mesh not plastic but it still goes in my keurig machine just like a regular plastic bottom k cup i do not understand what the fuss is all about it does look a little different from what you may be used to seeing but works just the same now as to the taste of the coffee i think that it is a full body flavor if i want a strong taste i brew regular size amd if i wish to have a milder flavor i will brew the largest cup size i have the best of both worlds i immediately went on subscribe and save i order boxes at a time love the flavor of this coffee now to my complaint i notice today that the price of each box has increased approximately a box and that is within about three weeks time now i really love the convenience of my keurig however eventually the price of the k cups will reach a price that will because me to say no more that time is approaching quickly this brand started out to be more reasonable than most but with this price jump in the last three weeks i am afraid they the company will soon be way overpriced as are the other brands again i will say i do love the flavor of this coffee did i mention my husband likes it as well and he normally does not like decaf coffee

we have tried alot of the josef products they are all absolutely delicious glad to see amazon is offering them as they can be hard to find their cookies fit the bill for those with allergies to multiple ingredients but you would never know they were allergy friendly from the taste they are worth the price i can serve them to guests kids and adults alike and they never know the difference

at a couple bucks a bag indulge yourself heavy with the caramel and the flavor a bit light on the nuts but they are in there the cranberries are a very nice touch if you like something chewy with your caramel corn comparable to poppycock but a bit more flavor and lighter on the nuts a very good change of pace
this has one of the best taste out there on the market i wish it would go on subscribe and save
i usually use twinings english breakfast loose tea this was a poor substitute for that this tea has a strong earthy taste almost like dirt rather than tea

i usually choose english breakfast tea because it has a rich flavor this tea was practically tasteless i could go out in my back yard and randomly pick weeds and it would taste better than this stuff i recommend taylors of harrogate if you are looking for english style tea
i bought this for my wife and she loves it so i will give it a this is not just tea there is powdered milk involved too i was surprised so if that is not your thing
i have never been much of a fan hazelnut but i do enjoy drinking the international hazelnut non dairy creamier mixed into my morning cup of coffee
great flavor and a good start to my morning fiber one honey clusters ounce boxes pack of

finally a high fiber cereal that tastes great i like mixing the honey cluster with either the carmel or the raison cluster for an even higher fiber load and the lowest price i have found these cereals in on amazon com we all love saving money while being healthy right try it for days and i am sure you will love it like i do thanks and have a healthy day
although they are a bit expensive every now and then these candies are worth considering i wish they sold them in the states because they are so unique in both taste and texture

the pomegranate flavor in this tea makes it a winner it has that little bit of extra something that you just need sometimes when you drink a lot of tea something different a different flavor if you like to eat pomegranates you will like this if you are not a fan of the fruit you probably will not be a fan of this tea it has that little bit of zing that the fruit has and it is just perfect to drink while watching the sunrise
i thought that this was a very tasty treat very comparable to non gluten free ones i have had in the past before finding out i was gluten intolerant

fantasicakes sent my cake fast and it was also sent moist for me it is hard to go wrong with chocolate but this cake really is fantastic the icing comes on the side so you can warm it up and drizzle it on at your leisure i really liked that because i do not normally like a lot of icing love it

these are excellent do not taste sugar free at all they taste just like the regular version and they are sweetened with splenda with no chemical sweeteners they are a little pricey but make a good treat
great taste candy gets a gooey texture after sitting on counter wrapper sticks to candy other than that the candy is perfect

i always avoided salt and then i learned about the difference between table salt and sea salt this tastes great on meat a little on eggs you name it i am using it i love the bag and the cost is very fair cheaper than buying at a store

for an all natural diet drink this is amazing it has a better taste then most other rootbeers that are found in stores and is better for you i originally did not realize this was diet when i bought it but i do not mind at all it is actually much better in my opinion then the non diet version but its up to you note this is really only a good deal if you get free shipping through amazon prime because when these are on sale in stores they cost about the same give or take

i grew up in portugal eating the real thing fresh grilled sardines and these are very close to that they are the best that i have found in this country highly recommend plus it is great that they are in olive oil
i love zevia soda it has a weird aftertaste for some but i am in love with this soda that is good for you it does have a very citrusy taste
i ordered this syrup on a whim and i made the right choice it is very tasty

i have been eating this for years but it is hard to find in the regular grocery stores so i purchased it over the web it is great for a fast tasty meal we add bite sized chicken breast to it and it is plenty for people
this coffee has a smoother and more mellow taste than less expensive brands such as folgers and maxwell house and this is a terrific price compared to grocery store prices

this is a fantastic chocolate bar you cannot even tell it is dairy free this is not a milk chocolate flavor it tastes more like a marriage of milk and dark chocolate i am actually not usually a fan of dark chocolate but this is not overwhelmingly dark at all it is perfect
this particular flavor of folger s gourmet coffee did not turn out to be my favorite in their gourmet line but it was pretty good nonetheless all of their flavors are good

exactly what thai iced tea should be i love how each tea bag is individually wrapped allowing me to take the tea anywhere for me to brew keep in mind packaging can be misleading though showing the tea with milk this tea does not have milk in it and you will need to add it yourself aside from that the product itself is excellent though
very tasty great color recipe on back may be a little too spicy for a thai food virgin start with amount
stocked up for work when it was on sale per package good for emergencies but would not buy it otherwise

first time id ever purchased whole nutmeg and i am glad that i did it is so much better than already ground nutmeg lasts longer and it quiet simple to use with a good microplane grater
just a little pricy but worth having made from corn much better than the rice if you haven t tried this i would strongly suggest you give it a try and by buying it at a time it also saves you money

tinkyada brown rice penne pasta with rice bran ounce bags pack of tinkyada makes pasta that actually tastes like pasta i have tried many different brands and nobody comes close to tinkyada if you are allegeric to wheat you can have great tasting pasta again
this is the best gluten free pasta i have eaten best of all my kids love it

this made us sick perhaps we got a bad batch we will not purchase this again and would not recommend it would like to add that amazon customer service was awesome in our correspondence with this product

i am really a huge advocate of cooking from scratch with all fresh ingredients but i really love these seasoning packets especially the one for pork this has not only nice flavors but a bit of thickening i use it whenever i make split pea soup one packet of this per bag of peas and only use half the amount of water they say to use on the bag of peas beautiful thick split pea soup every time or a pot of beans with ham shanks and it always comes out beautifully flavored i do not add salt when i use this but other herbs can be used of course with fantastic results this comes in several other flavors now but this is the one that i use the most just store the packets in airtight containers such as lock lock and they keep practically forever
this product is fantastic i have had creme brulee many times in france and this is just the same i would recommend it to anyone and my guests have just loved it

i am allergic to peanuts but i can eat all other nut butters i like the taste of this product and the soy bits give it a texture like crunchy peanut butter i recommended it for those who are allergic to peanuts
the lemon flavor was evident in this product the price was right and just big enough to satisfy our needs would buy again
we keep a box of these in our supply bin in the back of our vehicle for snacks on the go yummy

i was first turned onto this product from a review from cook s illustrated whose american test kitchen rated them the best tasting they are absolutely the best tasting they cost more but it is worth it for the end result and they are organic to boot

i first found this product in the checkout lines at austrian groceries when i returned back to the us i ordered this from amazon to share with co workers they are espresso filled chocolates and are quite good i had to warn co workers to put the entire thing in their mouth because the espresso is liquid and will drip out if you bite my colleagues snapped them up quickly and we were energized for the rest of the day i had to hide them from my year old because she liked them too and would climb anywhere to find them she already has enough energy
pilao is my favorite coffe i have tried several brands from around the globe but so far this is the best tasting not bitter nice and smooth
i usually drink green tea and have used this tea during the summer for iced tea and love the taste very refreshing and prefer this over the store bran green tea
this is a very tasty flavored coffee the flavor is not overpowering and provides an extra little kick of awesomeness

this coffee has a rich flavor and nice body without any bitterness no matter what kind of machine you use i enjoy it at all ties of day but especially in the afternoon or after a good meal exceptional depth i love my illy coffee

the south beach diet bar dark chocolate offer a tasty but relatively healthy treat it has a rich though not overly sweet taste and is fiber rich while low on calories do not expect it to taste like candy this is a granola bar after all but it does offer a rare treat for those trying to lose weight while the heavier fiber intake may make it a little bit of an acquired taste the chocolate makes it a lot easier to acquire if the rest of losing weight could only be this easy

i bought this because of the antioxidants will keep it for the taste tastes like arabica without being overwhelming its the best of both worlds when you can have a product that is good for you and tastes great too

my wife has me order this item for her we look like we are a small convinece store in our garage this is the only product she has found to have no sweetner in it so it has flavor but calories and no fake sweetner either if you get bored drinking water try hint this flavor is her favorite

i just got my order today and had to try it out while i will disagree with others that have gotten mush outta the can my initial can was above that not what i would call chunks by any stretch but not mush as for taste pretty much none if it were not for the additives it would not have any taste at all i have never had blue crab but if this is the comparison i will not try it either keep in mind that i can get dungeness year round as well as red rock crab i will likely add it to the cats food maybe she can get some flavor out of it
this product was nicely packaged which made it easy to throw in my purse or briefcase the flavor was rich and satisfying i will buy this again

simply put this stock has more flavour than most of the other options it will add depth to your soups and sauces if the flavour is too strong you can thin it down with a little water as a bonus it is consistently well priced on amazon and you do not have lug it from the grocery store

this is the best tasting hot sauce ever yes hot sauce with a flavor my first bottle of this sauce came from a very very good friend when i found out what grocery store it came from i bought all they had now they tell me they cannot get it anymore so where do i go amazon but shipping for bottles of this fine hot sauce is more than the sauce its self
i was very disappointed when target stopped selling these i bought this pack of bags and they were just like from the store good buy
i love granola and sometime add rasins or nuts but this stuff was good just as is in a bowl with milk or right from the bag
not too much to say this worked perfectly in our little fondue fountain and tasted great lots of good feedback from our friends

the badia cilantro ounce pack of has very little taste and what flavor there is does not resemble cilantro it is reminiscent of a stale oregano this was a very disappointing purchase and i will not be buying any badia products again

one of my guilty pleasures i have had baklava from many places and of many types i am less enthused about those made with rose or orange flavored sugar water and love that made with honey these are a spiced honey and walnut combination for those who prefer pistachios however these may not impress

this is a wonderful tasting turkey broth that is so convenient it is very shelf stable so it is handy to keep around the packaging takes up little room in a small kitchen it will be great in stuffing and gravy and will save me the time of always having to make stock before having turkey which i always do as soon as it arrived i put a cup of water into the microwave to boil and then added the contents of the little packet to the water the taste was more than i expected from a convenience product with the addition of some fresh herbs turkey drippings and flour you will be having everyone at the table thinking you are a gourmet chef i will be adding a few packs to the stock i make from the turkey carcass this year it will only help intensify that great turkey flavor i will order this again in the future but for right now the amount i have on hand should last quite a while

i bought this on whim one day while shopping the unusual flavor interested me when i popped it the wonderful smell of lime filled the kitchen the taste is great not over powering but refreshing tasty this would go great on a summer day or night with margaritas or beer great new flavor would never have thought of adding lime to popcorn but it works
great price for a quick and healthy side was not sure if i liked whole wheat couscous but it tastes great
the kids love these they are very tasty and healthier than most toaster pastries
this granola has a great taste and texture it is one of my favorite desserts all the bakery on main granolas have wonderful flavor
very tasty product good for you and tastes good great combo i love it over the top of vanilla yogurt yummmy

i ordered this cereal for my son who has some minor food allergies he likes it but i am hooked in my opinion this cereal is the perfect blend sweetened but not too sweet nutty but not overwhelmingly so good for you and just plain delicious i eat it with milk or as a snack without milk

this product is really good my baby loves it every time he can eat it by itself as breakfast lunch or dinner i also sometimes mix it with my homemade food when i need to improve its texture or flavor too spicy too lumpy e t c great healthy option no matter how you want to offer it to your baby or toddler
the tempura was a gift for a host they reported great taste there really is not much else to say about it i would order again based on taste and service

it seems like a lot but they are great especially if you have kids i know consumer waste is not a good thing with individual packaging etc but i really like these individually packaged snacks i usually buy a normal box at the store but this has been so nice we always keep a bag handy for trips snack time it is so convenient

these are great for packing lunches or snacks on the go without all of the bad stuff you get in the other commercially available products great price with the free shipping over too will definitely buy again

very clean and light calories i have only used it in coffee but it would probably be good over ice cream too my friend joked you could put it in the bath but i think that actually might be a good idea have not tried it yet but since it is made with splends not sugar you probably could get a nice peppermint bath haha weird as a coffee flavor it is very nice by the way the bottles are plastic not glass in case you were wondering

i love pineapples and these are wonderful they taste great are easily portable and need no refridgeration which is good during the summer i also like the apple and asian pears not so cray about the strawberry bananas and the potato crisps
this honey is very spreadable more like jelly than honey and very tasty the jar it comes in may be small but it is more than worth the price
these are incredibly good i cannot seem to keep a package of these around very long my family and friends seem to get to them if i do not
i have never been disappointed with a cafe excellence product this has a nutty vanilla flavor with no oily aftertaste like so many flavored coffees have

let your puppy naw on these for a month each they will last for months alot less expensive than buying them one at a time at your local pet store save save save only complaint i have is it would be nice if they had a beef flavor added ever the less my lab chews on these rawhide bones alot

this product is good for any dish i like to just cut it out and eat like snack but remember to go with nice wine or else it will be taste funny in your mouth it also good for cooking with lettuce boil or pan fried the lettuce first then add on this product and make a oyster sauce topping it will be delicious

i have used this product many rimes and it is the best tasting product for cole slaw i am now having a hard time finding it again but i asked walmart if they are going to sell it again and told me to check after february i have used it for parties and my guest think that is really great and i never have any left overs thanks for a great tasting slaw mix

i have been a nugo bar fan for years this special flavor is my new favorite it is a great blend between banana and chocolate great texture and taste and i love that this has such a high amount of protein compared to the other bars

growing up with this tasty treat i was really excited when i found it on amazon great little calorie overload with your afternoon tea or late night milk cookie snack i have no clue how many calores one of wafers will provide and i do not care i love it i treat myself to it from time to time without guilt life is to short to bother with calories wafers are packed with flavor crispy and tasty rum is fake just for flavor no alcohol in it enjoy it and then work out next day a bit harder i do
calorie count is good the orange smoothie is the best these bars used to be sold by costco they are much moister than other bars

this ended up being exactly what i was looking for i purchased a slew of nostalgic candy for my birthday party when i came across fun dip the only ones i could find anywhere were the individually packaged flavor packs amazon actually had the big packs that i grew up with with the two sugar sticks and three different flavored sugar packs if that is what you are looking for this is your product on a side note the candies were a big hit
not much you can say about coconut syrup other than it tastes good item arrived in a timely manner and have no complaints at all to make

i was expecting this chocolate to not taste good because it is healthy and is made with stevia i am on the maintenance phase of the hcg diet so cannot have any sugar at all i love this chocolate and am getting ready to place another order for it i had to request the nutrition information because none came with it here it is for anyone that wants it serving size bar calories calories from fat total fat saturated fat trans fat cholesterol sodium total carbohydrate dietary fiber sugars protein i eat about half a bar a day after lunch and it really hits the spot good for anyone on a sugar free or low carb diet

i got this product because i was on the hcg diet and wanted a special treat for valentine s day i was really hoping it would be good but it was not this chocolate can be used in cooking i suppose if you add some additional sweetener to it it did not relieve my craving for chocolate it is very bitter tasting when i tasted a tiny bite it was just a little bitter the bar is divided up into blocks when i put a block in my mouth it was awful and i ended up spitting it out it made me think of taking a spoonful of bitter cocoa and trying to eat it also you have to order such a large amount that it is a huge waste if you do not like it they should sell individual bars so people can know if they like it before buying such a large quantity

the taste is good and not too hot my only problem is the sodium in tsp is or of the daily allowance a sodium free product would be much better imho this product is really salty on the palate if you mix it with pomi chopped tomatoes ounce tetra pack pack of and garlic you get a good arrabiata sauce this is about half as hot as sriracha hot chili sauce huy fong oz

after a bariatric surgery i cannot take pills whole i must crush them and mix them with the sugar free apple sauce as you can imagine it is so bitter that you just want to die however if you add this fantastic product you will not taste the bitterness of the medications and it is sugar free it does not taste sugar free it tastes just wonderful i tried mixing my own xylitol sugar alcohol with cinnamon it does not come out that well but this product it is just great there is no aftertaste whatsoever i highly recommend it
the smoked tuna is our favorite but the sweet n sour is good too it is healthy and so easy to fix a quick snack or use for a meal delicious
i got a cuisinart single cup brewing system for christmas and it came with different k cups newmans own is my favorite of the by far i would buy this coffee again nice and bold and rich

i ordered this cereal from amazon s subscribe and save the buckwheat cereal arrived within four days arriving fresh super taste with all natural organic ingredients i will continue with the subscribe and save to be certain i have a monthly supply coming
i do not know if it gives me any more energy but it has a surprisingly natural flavor with very little if any after taste for a no calorie beverage you can really taste the blueberry

i love the taste of this hemp protein powder i love to mush up bananas with a fork add some dried figs with raisins and pour this hemp protein all over it with the nutiva hemp seeds it tastes great and satisfies me on every level i also sensed there was much more fiber in the powder compared to other brands i could not believe when i saw that there was grams per serving considering that of americans are lacking in fiber this protein powder can be a great service to millions
great nutty flavor and delightful texture but what puts it over the top is the great price with the amazon subscribe and save program buy it
this gum is wonderful a little expensive and cost prohibative for people that chew alot of gum no after taste i hope they bring the price down and come up with more flavors

i use this on a lot of foods it has a hint of hotness in large amounts but nothing overpowering my favorite use right now is to top off chicken breasts prior to grilling amazing how great they taste and my friends have had nothing but good things to say about it
this is my favorite snack i love its mild spicy taste it tastes great specially when there is no salsa available

i had my doubts about these chips until i got my first case i always loved and considered ranch sour cream onion pringle potato chips as the best until i open my first bag of these let me tell you no chip is better than these are i got excellent taste buds to prove it therefore if these chips are extremely good to me then i know they will be tasty to other people try a bag and you will see trust me

i did not know what to expect since i have never used a pre cooked cornmeal before but i made delicious polenta with it the polenta was creamy and smooth and delicious with a very mild nutty corn flavor and the next day it had hardened and i slices it and fried it in a little butter and it was delicious my first go at arepas was not so successful but i think that i am to blame and not the product my only complaint is that it is hard to find recipes that use it

if any of you read kim harrison you will know that al always orders a latte with raspberry syrup and extra cinnamon i tried this drink at starbucks and it was wonderful i have an espresso machine at home and thought i could save a lot of time and money making this drink on my own this syrup was perfect it tastes wonderful both in my coffee and also on ice cream
the stores around here do not carry this product my husband is diabetic and swiss miss no sugar is perfect for us we use it with coffee to make our own cafe mochas

this makes some great baked goods i am no baking expert but i can follow a recipe pretty well so far i have used it in chocolate chip cookies and waffles i think people are right and saying that you should scale down the amount of vanilla needed i have been using exactly what was on the recipe and i get just a slight alcohol aftertaste if you smell the vanilla right out of the bottle it is clear it is the vanilla you are tasting it is not unpleasant and i do not think anybody would really notice
my daughter tells me these are the best tasting message hearts i ordered these after valentine s day just because she likes them so much

open the lid on this lovely salt and you are struck with the unmistakable aroma of truffles the taste is even better a little goes a long way i add a pinch to eggs to turn ordinary into decadent like another review i also love this salt in popcorn i add a pinch to my oil usually clarified butter before popping and supplement with plain sea salt ground fine in the mortar and pestle a nice change of pace this salt is speckled with black truffle flakes that look something like ground black pepper the truffle flavor is infused throughout the salt i received on has a best before date of

i have tried a few brands of truffle salt i like it on popcorn i thought that this product would be great since it was truffle instead of the i had been purchasing although the aroma of this product is good the taste is just bad not awful bad the bitter flavor is at the front not an aftertaste and there is not a strong truffle flavor i am very disappointed
i remembered this from when i was a kid i hoped it was as good as i remembered it was this is great if you like honey and cinnamon you cannot miss

this is literally the best cereal in my entire life that i have ever eaten it is a perfect supplement to a whole foods vegan diet at of protein per cup packed with fiber minerals and vitamins you cannot go wrong with this cereal this texture and taste are not for everyone but for those who like hearty multi grain sugar free types of food this is the cereal for you

dear amazon com please keep this on subscribe and save forever this is a great cereal for health not the best tasting in the world but this is a powerhouse of nutrition at a great price with subscribe and save thanks amazon sincerly loyal customer forever p s will be purchasing more

i really love black licorice but i could no longer eat it because of the items used in the manufacture of licorice that usually shows up in the stores this is very authentic and gluten free it does come in very large chunks which i cut into smaller pieces because i was chowing down way too much of this great candy at one time it is a tasty licorice
tried this flavor first time in france this summer and loved the refreshing taste of it the blue and red ones are also very nice but my fav was the silver one too bad it is hard to find elsewhere

this jerky is the soft chewy style though it is listed as sweet n spicy it is quite a bit more sweet than spicy i doubt even the most sensitive to spice would consider this spicy jerky it is tasty it does not have any nitrites message high fructose corn syrup or anything else that is terrible for you it is also affordable the only reason it did not get five stars is that it is not an outstanding and amazing one of a kind flavor worthy of five stars

our family is fairly new to gluten free we have eaten the original golden malted and find that the gluten free version is similar we like it and are ordering our second batch of cannisters it is a quick easy alternative to making homemade

received this on time in fact early i was looking for an energy booster during the day at work these chocolates were great tasting and did give me the boost i was looking for i will purchase them again
purchased this elsewhere for more money will not do that again mainly use it for gluten free cookies etc love it susie c

i had these crackers in a snack box on a recent delta flight and enjoyed them so much i searched the internet to see where i could purchase them locally unfortunately i could not find a store in my area that sold them the taste is so good you can eat them just as a snack or serve with dips or spreads i ordered the roasted garlic with rosemay and also the onion flavored version which i have not tried yet although some reviewers said their wisecrackers showed up in bits and pieces mine were in perfect shape

there was a huge internet blow up over these candy corn oreos i love candy corn so i had to try them i have only two targets in my area and both were sold out luckily amazon has them available they have a slight taste of candy corn but not overwhelming on the sweet side interesting i really like the vanilla cookie taste so i enjoyed them my husband thought they were a bit too sweet for his tastes more for me

my first meal replacement was slim fast unfortunatly it did not work for me before i decided to try this product i did some research this is a good protein shake it has calories and of protein low sugar compare to other drinks i drink it once day after a hour workout for five days a week the chocolate tastes great no need to add the extras like ice juices or fruits for better taste instantly stopped my hunger for a couple of hours gives me a good amount of energy not gassy the packets are great for traveling update so far chocolate it the best flavor vanilla tastes like lite sweet milk have not tried strawberry yet
this is a great meal replacement i even throw in to the blender fluids that are apple juice and water banana and a strawberry yummy and filling i do not run out of steam on the tennis courts anymore

i have always loved ceylon black tea but this was the first time i tried green again this is my very favorite it is very mild and does not have the grassy taste of other green teas i highly recommend it ceylon and amazon do it again

i enjoy indian food but unfortunately the closest indian restaurant is miles away from my house i have tried other commercial indian food products and have not been very pleased the kitchens of india butter chicken curry however is tasty just spicy enough for me well maybe a little on the mild side and easy to make i buy the costco rotisserie chicken debone it put it in pound zip lock bags and freeze them each envelope of the butter curry needs pound of chicken so i just pop the chicken out of the freezer defrost it add the curry paste and butter and in about minutes i have a delicious dinner i will definitely be ordering this product again
both my daughter and i found this very tasty and it s so easy to make tastes authentic highly recommended

this was a very easy curry paste to use and it came out very close to what you get at restaurants all i added was butter chicken and water i made servings with one packet of paste but i think if i had more chicken i could have made servings

these cookies are tasty at times they are a normal part of my daily diet i have eaten a bag for breakfast on multiple occasions also try trader joe s vegan trail mix cookies for an alternative i cannot decide which ones i like better tj s are chewier both rank as my favorite cookies
delicious only it is not enough for one serving rice are very tasty but gravy is not that great tast and also too much for the rice if they can pack more rice and less gravy that will be very fine

i have already reordered this item twice i like the taste of it it has the right amount of spice and can be used to make veg briyani if your not very fond of chicken i tried both one of the best products from koi recommended
exceptional coffee all around rich full with subtle hints of dark chocolate my coffee snob neighbor just ordered pounds herself after having just one cup
this is the best tasting and best price on a stevia product that i have found

i enjoy the flavor and benefits of fresh wheat grass but it is difficult to keep on hand this powder seems to offer the same punch as well as tasting good i am very pleased with the product and now rely solely on it

i have tried a few other wheat grass powders and had a hard time drinking them this was very mild i can drink it just mixed with water my year old and year old liked it and wanted more i love all of the amazing grass products they all taste great and are a great company to order from
this tastes great although i do add a little more cinnamon it does not fill you up like homeade oatmeal does but it is still a nice product

savory choice is the best stock i have found and i love everything about it first off it is flavor is incomparable to any other pre made stock product and it really tastes like what chicken stock is supposed to taste like i shared it with my grandmother and it won even her stamp of approval secondly i love that it is concentrated so that you make up just the amount you need which is especially handy when you are deglazing a pan to make a sauce for example you do not end up with a whole quart container going bad in your fridge finally if there is anything i learned from ny apt living i love how small the footprint is of the box itself it is also great to pack for backpacking trips to keep in your desk at work etc they make chicken beef and turkey and around the bay area it is available at whole foods berkeley bowl andronico s etc

i love coffee and this product was a nice mid afternoon pick me up it was refreshingly cold on a hot day and gave me that burst of caffeine energy that keeps me going i enjoyed the taste very much i like my hot morning coffee with lots of milk and a bit of sugar and this was similar to how i make it people who like their coffee black or with milk cream and no sugar will probably not like this product overall i was very pleased with it though i doubt i would buy it often at approximately two bucks a can

i drink a couple of cups of strong black coffee every day but rarely a fancy drink from a cafe this product is convenient you can just put it in the refrigerator or open the can and pour it over ice or both the taste is smooth and well balanced it has plenty of caffeine and the right amount of milk and sugar i have had a very similar product from starbucks and i really do not sense much of a difference between the two i would probably buy whatever is a better value at the time again this product and the product from starbucks seem to taste the same to me and are of the same high quality

this little can packs a good punch lots of flavor and a caffeine boost apparently all for just calories according to the can the flavor is very rich but not so rich that you cannot finish it i drank it right from the can as i probably normally would and did notice a bit of a tin after taste from the can i poured the rest into a glass over some ice and it was excellent so if this is going to be your on the road solution you might think again but if you can enjoy it in a glass you will not be disappointed good stuff

i have had the illy issimo coffee before and liked it so i was excited to try this iced coffee drink this cappuccino has a nice smooth taste with just enough sugar to make it sweet but not overwhelming it gave me a nice jolt of energy to get me through the afternoon but not leave me jittery i will buy this again
this is a nice little coffee drink not too sweet only calories and as good as starbucks lo fat drinks would have preferred a glass container but the little cans fit really well in my handbag

this illy issimo italian espresso style coffee drink with lowfat milk and cocoa is quite delicious the cocoa taste is subtle and it is not too sweet the smooth taste beats out other similar prepackaged drinks i have tried each oz can is only calories fat and of protein so it feels like a decent choice nutritionally it contains of caffeine if you are counting illy roasts good coffee and even masked by the sugar and milk you can tell this arabica coffee is the good stuff it is very smooth no bitter burnt taste like some coffee roasters are prone to these drinks are made in denmark and distributed by coca cola in the us which piqued my interest i would recommend these to people who like to have some cold coffee drinks on hand for busy mornings or a quick pick me up

this is the first cold coffee drink without crushed ice like a frappuccino at starbucks i have ever had i do enjoy coffee but during the summer i often turn to soft drinks instead i usually do not want a hot drink when it is degrees outside i was not sure what to expect from this but was surprised that it was quite delicious and refreshing being a cappuccino it has low fat milk which is nice since most places just use whole milk and a hint of cocoa not too much where you cannot taste the coffee but there is a hint that makes it perfect because of the low fat milk and cocoa this beverage has calories of fat sat fat of carbs and of sugar from label that is not too bad considering what some coffee beverages have the coffee is very strong and has a great taste it is not bitter and drinks very smoothly when i got this item i placed it in the fridge and it was in there fore a few days so it was nice and cold and it was very refreshing and smooth the coffee was the primary taste in the drink and the milk and cocoa were secondary so you got a nice taste of what tasted like high quality coffee with a smooth finish from the milk and cocoa i am very pleased with this drink and found it quite refreshing and a nice change from a standard cup of coffee especially during these hot days and with only calories it is a great start to the day highly recommend

no complaints whatsoever this is a tasty coffee drink the coffee is strong and good and the sweetener is perfect just sweet enough without being that kind of sickly sweet that mars something like starbucks pre made iced coffee drinks just about perfect refreshing and a nice boost for the afternoon

if you are already a fan of illy coffee in general whole bean ground espresso most likely you will enjoy this can of cappucino coffee the flavor of this drink is heavy on coffee with light milk lowfat added the bitterness of the coffee is only lightly offset by the milk so hopefully if you decide on this drink it will be for a coffee flavor and not a more milky coffee flavor there is also a hint of sweetness though i did notice that the sweetness seems to be closer to the bottom of the can the can indicates that it should not be shaken so maybe this is expected there are calories per can and gave me a decent caffeine jolt the can indicates this is a product of denmark and is distributed by the coca cola company the weird part here is that illy is an italian brand guess it costs too much to import from italy no idea there i only received one can as part of the vine program but have purchased single serve cans of this on my own and will without doubt purchase further cans of it
this is one of my absolute favorites would recommend to anyone i have even gotten coworkers hooked on it because it is so good

i tried this product on a whim hoping that it would be good to my surprise it was very good i was pleased that the ingredients did not include trans fat or high fructose corn syrup for a convenience item i give it high marks it tastes great and is extremely easy to prepare

after reading the reviews i decided to order a bag and try it i had had numerous styles of kona coffee over the years and love the smell and flavor when it arrived i ground some up and brewed up a pot the smell was there but the flavor was lacking it was missing that kona pop that i have experienced in the past with other coffee s over the next few weeks i tried different brewing combinations no matter what i tried it was quite bland and just did not have any flavor i was quite disappointed by the coffee

we got them to add to special k red berry cereal because sometime the end of the bag as fewer than the start but now we eat them by the hand full and add them to everything my daughter grabs the bag over other snack food which makes me smile

i am not sure how or why this soup mix is getting such good reviews it has no flavor whatsoever when they dehydrated the ingredients they pulled all the flavor out i have tried everything to make a decent dish with this stuff but always turns out bland and tasteless the recommend mix is also way off cups water mix you will end up with a lintel sludge that is nothing like soup i think i could probably calk my bathroom with it or make a nice adobe hut however if you are into very bland food this will probably be good if you like flavor stay away

one of the only apple drink mixes i found that tastes good i used to buy the walmart brand apple drink but that tasted too fake for my taste this one contains some sugar so it has some calories but taste wise it is like light apple juice with a hint of artificial flavoring

these are wheat free gluten free non dairy granola bars they taste pretty good they are not listed as organic but it seems like they should make them that way since they are free of so many other things some of the ingredients are listed as organic but not all they taste good there are of sugar per each bar just fyi for anyone wondering about the ingredients for allergies or food sensitivities here they are in order gluten free oats organic agave rice blend brown rice flour white rice flour tapioca starch sweet rice flour xanthan gum coconut sugar raisins monounsaturated safflower oil organic eggs walnuts coconut chia seeds natural vanilla flavor sices baking soda sea salt xanthan gum grainless aluminum free baking powder sodium bicarbonate sodium acid pyrophosphate potato starch
these bars are a tasty snack the taste is like a dry carrot cake it is a little chewy and has a nice texture with nuts and raisins it is surprisingly high in calories for each bar
pamela s oat raisin walnut spice bars are moist and tasty although the ingredients are top notch they gave me heartburn

the hotlix scorpion sucker is a pretty tasty pretty wild and a pretty fun treat for any occasion i used it for a presentation in by biology class and it was received very well by the teacher and my fellow students
eat it by the handful mix with baking or other food or mix with bee pollen for ultimate nutrition
not much to say i grew up on this stuff and it is very good

bought this in spite of the high price and unreasonble s h just to match what i make at home i mix it with fresh ground hemp seed i buy the almonds in the she will at soak the nuts and grind them in my vitamix beats peanut butter to hell and back

i like it it is got the same after taste as the granulated if you are wondering i find it pleasant used it in coffee today and it was the perfect sweetness and actually once it was in coffee to me it was the same flavor as sugar with no aftertaste i do not like splenda very much and cannot stand sweet n low been using stevia for a few months and got this to stir into yogurt excited did not realize it had to be refrigerated but that was just my own ignorance was hesitant but now i highly recommend the sweetleaf stevia clear

i now have to lower soduim intake and this does the trick it tastes great and you do not miss the salt i usually eat with reduced fat or sodium cheese and enjoy every bite even the family is liking it the variety does proove difficult to find though wish amazon carried it regularly
i do not eat them myself i bought them for my husband because he is greek and loves greek food he loves them very much so they last him for meals thank you very much

we have had this spice blend since picking it up at a whole foods in portland after tasting a sample company was coming over and we needed something easy that could be prepped ahead enter the moroccan spice blend and it received rave reviews we used boneless skinless chicken breasts and marinated them for about a day and a half when it came time to cook we just dumped them into a dish and baked as directed for an hour serving it with couscous moroccan carrot salad and coconut cupcakes we spent the rest of the evening thoroughly stuffed absolutely delicious sweet and savory the blend had just the right amount of kick without setting our mouths on fire fabulous
this dip is absolutely delicious it is so easy to make the price is also exceptional

this really does taste a lot not exactly like regular bubble gum it is thick chunky and kid s can make huge pink bubbles with it and it lasts and lasts as a treat you do not have to worry about for a child or as a diet item for an adult this is great

i tried these out last weekend just as the temps have started to dip and i was not disappointed i expected a very fake and chemical tasting brew but was pleasantly surprised that i got neither i was very happy to ready that there are no artificial ingredients in this one too this is a great alternative for when you want something different from coffee and tea if i had to point out anything bad about them maybe that the flavor is almost too sweet if you brew it on your smallest cup setting mine is for the keurig special edition it is a tad tooo strong but in the medium size offerning its just right i hate having to buy packs though

we love hot apple cider and this was no exception my year old drank cups the very first day i got this it has a wonderful fresh apple taste with just the right amount of spice we will be ordering this on a regular basis
i have been looking everywhere for apple cider k cups decided to check out amazon and low and behold here they are they taste great but as someone else mentioned they are a bit pricey
this apple cider is very flavorable and really hits the spot i am very happy with this purchase and plan on buying this product again
this product is a nice alternative to pasta or potatoes its very tasty and extremely easy to heat the fact that is already precooked makes it even more enjoyable for me

has a better taste them some of the other energy shots out there and works get for energy when i am feeling drained

pasta knorr sauce parma rosa creamy tomato pardon me while i rave about how incredible this pasta mix is but i am just totally in love with this sauce i love to eat pasta but i am usually confined to the higher fat alfredo sauces and cheese sauces because acidic tomato sauces irritate my acid reflux that means no spaghetti and meatballs which has been frustrating for me but that is life eh then while i was browsing the sauce aisle for knorr alfredo packets i found this parma rosa sauce i have no idea what vodka sauce is that the other reviewers reference but whatever this is it is good if i had to describe it i would call it a creamy tomato alfredo but even though it is creamy it is also very light and pleasing to taste not cloying the tomato taste is exquisite and the acid content is low enough to prevent stomach pains the taste itself is absolutely wonderful i can actually talk myself out of impulse eating by promising myself parma rosa later it is that good the knorr sauces are fairly easy to make the instructions are serious when they say to stir constantly though and i think it helps to preheat the milk before adding the powdered mix and they store indefinitely in these dried packets another reason to buy packets besides the smaller carbon footprint in shipping versus jars oh and buying them on amazon means i get them for half the price of the local market for the parma rosa i also add about a third of a pound of seasoned browned ground beef as easy meatballs the portions are such that i can easily get two full meals out of one sauce packet and the sauce stores perfectly in the fridge this coming from a person who generally hates leftovers ana mardoll

this is a great product that is very easy to make it never clumps which is a great plus when it comes to dry sauce mixes i personally favor the knorr white sauces e g the alfredo or garlic herb which is the only reason why i am not giving this stars overall it is very enjoyable nice to have around when you do not want to make sauce from scratch and i would definitely purchase again

i took this stuff on a two week camping trip i put it in chilli made tacos and soups this is the best tasting sour cream powder i have ever come across buy this stuff now one bag lasted campers for about meals used as a condiment

mushrooms can add a lot of flavor to a dish canned mushrooms are bland and boring and fresh mushrooms have a limited shelf life dried mushrooms pack a lot of flavor and have a long shelf life i believe they are good for up to years a one ounce package of dried is the equivalent of a half pound of fresh they need to be soaked in warm water for about an hour to hydrate before using the water used for hydrating can be used in your dish for added flavor it can also be reduced to concentrate the flavor once hydrated the mushrooms can be used in any application that you would use fresh or canned the chanterelles are a mild less earthy tasting fungus they go very well with eggs chicken and fish they are also great in a stir fry the fungusamongus is a high quality brand that i highly recommend

drew s makes some fantastic dressings their italian dressing for example is amazing especially when dipped with bread i was pretty confident this would be a great dressing and i was not disappointed i made a salad with crispy wontons red onion toasted almond slivers mandarin oranges and a couple of tomatoes and then put this dressing on top wow it was a great salad i recommend this product highly i purchased this dressing at my local co op for about two dollars ingredients canola oil expeller pressed orange s juice concentrated soy sauce organic water soybean s wheat salt sea rice wine vinegar sesame oil toasted water cane sugar juice evaporated garlic ginger lemon s juice mustard dijon water mustard seed corn vinegar distilled salt sea wine white turmeric spice s cilantro pepper s black citric acid xanthan gum serving size tbsp servings per container calories total fat g saturated fat g trans fat g cholesterol mg sodium mg potassium mg total carbohydrate dietary fiber sugars g protein g if interested in drew s dressing and you want to explore alternative options try iherb com if interested in iherb you can use my code for a discount

in the great british trifecta of british powdered drinks to be mixed with milk and sugar horlicks the most malty milo is medium chocolately and malty and ovaltine seems to be the most chocolately all are basically comfort drinks when plain milk just will not do all are powders to which you add milk and sugar to get a sweet malty drink the latter two with chocolate flavor as well i love all drinks but if you are drinking this for nostalgia s sake make sure you get the ovaltine from where ever your nostalgia springs from because ovaltine is made in different countries and they all taste a little different for me ovaltine is the most chocolately of all and a great comfort drink for cold nights i like it more than simply hot chocolate because it is not as sweet and has a slight malty flavor to it best of all you can control the taste because you can adjust the amounts of sugar and ovaltine you add

we happened to be at whole foods and a lovely woman was offering free samples of violas hot jalepeno jelly omg it is fantastic it is got a definite kick to it but it is not too terribly hot at all perfection it is just sweet enough to balance out the hot it is light and delicious and best of all it is not full of all the artificial preservatives and high fructose corn syrup and additives of which most jellies are contaminated i love this product

i have tried to capture the taste of really fine coffee i have experienced in some excellent restaurants without much success including grinding my own beans buying expensive ones at specialty shops etc this product while not quite doing justice to my memories of great coffee comes closest it is somewhat expensive at about lb supermarket coffees are of course much cheaper and you can get larger packages at discount places for much much less i even tried mixing this coffee with folgers and it was pretty good too naturally this coffee is much richer so one needs to experiment a bit to figure out how much to use in your coffee maker i drink coffee straight up no sweetener no milk products but i like it pretty strong but not burnt or over roasted this coffee is not over roasted or bitter unless you use too much of it i found it superior to the other melitta products i have tried as well as to other much vaunted brands such as starbucks seattle s best and gevalia but taste is on the tongue of the beholder

update january i am now a pretty regular drinker of this stuff in fact i just ordered some more and i note the price has gone down which makes it very afforable take in the free shipping and it is an absolutely delicious steal i am really enjoying this coffee i usually drink folgers at home and have done so for nearly years this was a pleasant surprise the aroma as it was brewing was scintillating the taste with my regular creamer and sugar was a treat for my taste buds i finished two cups and was tempted to drink more because it was such a smooth tasting coffee i used heaped tea spoon fulls for make cups as marked on my coffee maker and it worked out just about right for me though some hard line coffee drinkers make like it stronger than that the package itself was a little hard to open i found the best way was to cut the top off with scissors and use the metal bands on the package to securely close it as airtight as possible this a really nice coffee but the only way to be sure you will like it is to try it

i have long been a fan of german based melitta products and found their coffee to be far superior to most of the mainstream popular coffees and even some so called exclusive or select blends blanc et noir is one selection from their cafe collection which i would put in the medium to dark roast catagory a full bodied flavor without acidity but not too strong that is when made in french press i do not use old style leave it in the pot all day machines a lot of people have switched to the pod type or single cup brewing systems lately and in fact coffee consumption seems down in general in favor of herb teas and non caffeinated drinks so it was nice to go back to an old style ground coffee taste if you like european style ground coffees you may also like to try douwe egberts intense real coffee dark roast ground coffee ounce packages pack of which is dutch or the bold flavored jacobs kr ouml nung coffee ounce vacuum packs pack of another point worth mentioning is cost these value packs here work out pretty cheap compared to pod systems bags or cups and are even not that bad compared to everyday grocery store prices when compared to gourmet stores like gevalia they are a steal and great quality
