i have always been a little curious about barley tea as i see it often mentioned in manga and japanese stories i finally got a chance to try it the other day with the sokenbicha brand this tea is not sweetened which is part of the reason i purchased it i am on a diet so i prefer to sweeten my beverages with stuff like splenda or equal i did not really need it with this drink there is a slight bitter tea taste but it is definitely not overwhelming and i did not really think that it deterred from the drink to be honest i did not add any sweetener to it at all it did not need it and i think it would have killed the taste there is a great nutty ish type of flavor that i am going to assume is the barley i adore it and while i do not think i would be able to drink it constantly i really want to drink this again to the point where i would be willing to drive to the organic grocery store that is about a half hour out of my way i do have to warn you if you are a fan of the more traditional teas black tea iced tea etc then this will take some getting used to it is tasty but i can see where it would not be to all tastes still very much worth trying and i am definitely going to be looking for barley tea in general but stuff like this is good for me to take to work where i cannot brew up big batches of tea

we have been paying big bucks for little cans of rooibos tea at the health food store and brewing ice tea with it that we drink by the gallon i was surprised that the davidson s rooibos was richer and tastier and brewed up a nice clear amber brown color better quality and less expensive
cranberry grape xs has a wonderful taste and helps give me energy for my daily workouts with out the crash effect later in the day xs unlike other energy drinks balances out the day
these almonds deliver the crunch of freshness that i love in nuts some nuts you can tell are old because of their softness but these almonds are incredible and tasty great for a quick pick me up

these are one my favorite kind of sun chips they have a zesty taste that is not too sharp or bland with just the right kick and a nice crisp texture while these are not a health food their sodium and fat content is much better than other snack foods these chips work really well with a dip and vegetables for a pre dinner snack shop for price the price printed on the oz bag that i buy at my local supermarket is and i pay less on sale so the price on amazon is higher than the manufacturer s suggested retail price

this is very tasty good deal to save a few bucks here on amazon as well i find this dish very similar to the chicken tikka masala both are great obviously this curry dish has more curry flavor than the chicken tikka masala the chicken in this dish is wonderful as well

generally speaking i really like mini wheats so this cereal was appealing to me already i enjoyed the flavor very much since it did not taste artificial i also liked the fact that it contains brown rice syrup in it instead of corn syrup it gives it a different flavor that enhances the cinnamon and combines very well with the wheat my active teen daughter is a big breakfast eater and if she eats cereal she is usually hungry within a couple of hours this kind held her for hours it is hard to measure pieces serving size so we just served about a cup which is a little more than what the average cereal calls for overall the cereal tasted good and was good for the tummy i am looking forward to buying some more

these are moist soft and chewy with a really nice texture the cinnamon flavor is really good nice and strong i love cinnamon and really natural tasting not artificial like a lot of cinnamon flavors they are a little on the small side like or bites but also pretty low cal cals so they make a nice snack or light breakfast i will definitely be buying these again

we love making special coffees and this just added a great touch to them also we have put it on top of our soy ice cream and found it to have a nice taste on that as well oh we have also added it to our soda making vanilla coke vanilla dr pepper and vanilla orange soda very very nice
i am pretty new to the coffee scene but i really like this roast it is quite flavorful and rich it was the first coffee i bought i tried a few more and i came back to this

i have a weak spot for grape soda among other not so good for you treats admittedly i do not pay that much attention to what goes into them but i do try to moderate what i consume from time to time this stuff is great tastes almost as deliciously bad for you as the real thing but since it is not as syrupy as welch s grape soda it actually is more refreshing after downing the whole can if you are concerned with all the bad stuff in the other stuff but cannot keep away give this one a try
great carbonated beverage my son gets it at school and loves it i cannot find in local stores so i bought it here kids love it
purchased this water at first due to the fact i needed the water bottle to fit into a drink holder case it was a win win situation because it tasted great too

fantastic espresso beans i usually drink illy but thought i would give this a shot and i was not disappointed this has a slightly smokier flavor than the illy roasts produces a nice crema and is ultra smooth in short give this a try highly recommended for my fellow coffee heads out there
i have had it with brisket turkey and chicken fingers it is great on everything just the right amount of kick it is hard to describe sweet but spicey my kids love it their ages are nine to nineteen

arrived room temperature but i knew that would happen given the other reviews i figured they were probably ok still and ate them they taste good and i did not get sick so i think that it is fine i would purchase again once i run out

i bought this because i thought it was the same as white sweet potato flour i was disappointed but then after i baked cookies w it they were actually good gluten free egg free dairy free will taste great though if you added eggs i thought i would share my recipe cup sweet potato flour cup canola oil or safflower cup honey cup water or any other non dairy milk substitute a dash of salt tb baking powder optional chocolate chip cookies shredded coconut and or almond pieces or any other nuts mix everything and roll into small balls flatten on cookie sheet covered with baking sheet bake for minutes or til firm they burn easily so watch

the ambrosoli honees energy plus vitamin caramels were absolutely delicious you definitely get a caramel taste without the stickiness i cannot speak to the vitamin aspect but it does give you a little energy shake up i kept a pack in my purse and during long tiring speeches i sneaked one and it kept me awake the wrappers are noisy but worth it
we drink a lot of iced tea in the summer and this is a nice change to put in the rotation so there is a little variety
this is a very tasty ready to eat indian meal the curry is especially delicious i will likely buy again

i have been drinking folgers colombian coffee since i first moved to the us over years ago i tried some of the other mass produced coffees first but could not find one that i liked i was thrilled to find this one it tastes perfect to me i had stopped buying it when the price in my local supermarket kept creeping up so i was really happy to find it on amazon subscribe and save cheaper than my local supermarket that is an added bonus the only reason that i gave it four stars is that there are better coffees out there in my opinion just not for the same price
nice aromas wonderful exotic taste definately for people who like to sample exotic cuisines reminds me of being in southeast asia love it

i purchased this for one brother on the recommendation of my oldest brother and i could not locate the brand anywhere in my local area so just hoping by chance amazon would have this item i scroll through and bingo the projected delivery date was not going to arrive in time for thanksgiving so i was told but it arrived within two business days my family was very delighted to say the least

i drink crystal light like it was water this is a good flavor when you want to break out of the ordinary berry orange grape etc it is not too tart like lemonade can be nor too bitter as pomegrante can be i do not drink this flavor every day but it is a nice change from my regular flavors

this particular flavor is almost impossible to find and in my opinion it is one of the best i was very happy to find it on amazon what cannot you find on amazon this flavor is tart and refreshing just right for arizona summers where i happen to live it is not even halfway through june and the temps are triple digits thank goodness for this wonderful drink which also keeps me hydrated just mix with water and you are good to go

for whatever reason my local grocer does not carry cinnamon toast crunch i was happy to find it here on amazon the bags of cereal in this box are nice and large this has lasted about as long as regular boxes of cereal and we still have some left i was skeptical about buying cereal this way but it turned out to be a pretty good deal after all
very hot but smooth great consistancy for use with most korean cusine just a dab will do you do not want too much this items is tasty but extremely hot great side with most korean dishes

crystal light mocktails appletini tastes great it is like drinking a jones soda green apple but without all the carbonation or calories my only issue is that they use aspartame with all the dangers that come with it it would be nice if they use stevia instead other than that if you are looking for a great apple tasting diet beverage this is pretty good

this is a tad better to me than the mojito flavor it is final mix is a translucent green it is not too sweet but does not have that totally artificial tasting twang to it either i would definitely buy on my own

i would seen an add for these in a magazine recently but my local grocery store has not had them in stock so i was really glad to get the chance to try the appletini flavor out it is delicious while it certainly does not taste like the real thing it is got a nice light flavor that is different from all the other powdered drink mixes out there also a few reviewers mentioned that it tastes a bit like a jolly rancher in its sourness but i do not think that it is sour at all i try not to drink more than one glass of crystal light a day because i worry about the aspartame in it which this one also has overall a really tasty drink i am eager to try to mojito one next
i love the sauce with steak i have not tried using it with anything suggested on the bottle yet with a nice filet though delicious

pretty good sampling of their standard flavors i believe the only flavors missing are the ham ones gravy ham and ham cheese which i would love to try the bacon flavor is good but the bacon is a little odd cheddar cheese is the best and butter is good too plus each pack per box is only calories good for a warm snack when you are feeling nibbly my only real complaint is that i would rather they ditched the original flavor and replaced it with something more interesting

these are really good and healthy use the subscribe save option because you can always have them skip a shipment or cancel whenever watch the price though as it fluctuates greatly i paid for mine including shipping with subscribe save
very tasty snack i have re ordered this item twice already too bad the price increased since my last order though

this is a very good mix at a reasonable price i snack on trail mix at work and put of these out in the snack area with the standard pretzels and candy my fellow employees must have liked since it was gone within a day
ordered this as a healthy snack and everyone seems to like it around my household the packaging was not the best so one bag ripped open during shipment other than that it is all good

these mints are tasty with a nice kick i cannot chew gum due to jaw pain and really enjoy a mint after eating to freshen up my breath after realizing that many mints contain aspartame which i am trying to avoid these days i searched and found these to my delight i have not seen them in stores so i will be ordering other flavors in the future online

pros this cereal is great tasting fills you up new box color not like in the picture yellow is a good color protien i am eating it while i type this review cons small ounce boxes how long will that last you do not have any you have to spend money on this when its gone you become very sad your always wanting more but have to wait for the next order stars out of
found these at meijer s could not wait to try them i think these are better than the regular chocolate ones a much better chocolate flavor love them will be buying these instead of the other ones
this is the cake part you need to add your own amaretto to it and it really beats making your own
this is as good as you can get in a commercial product if you like a rich caponata you will like this product

i wanted something simply convenient to mix up with the spring water hot tap caffe d vita fits the bill i like the pumpkin spice flavor as well as the oz size it is great for a little pick me up on a chilly day

falling asleep in class staying up late for that end of the year project coffee machine broken or too expensive jolt energy gum gives you energy quickly with a great taste and at a great price you cannot always drink coffee but you can always have a piece of gum i would recommend this product to anyone and everyone i gave out packs of this to a lot of my friends at the end of last semester before finals

i ordered the pack maybe i just got lucky but i had an excellent variety i have different kinds doubles of the majority with one flavor i got there were probably decafs they were thrown into the box but none were damaged overall i am happy and i will probably order again

i bought big hunks when i came across them in retail stores which was not very often when i did find them they were usually kind of stale from sitting there for a while i came across this offer on amazon and was impressed with the price so placed an order the box arrived quickly and i was very happy to discover how fresh the candy turned out to be if you like fresh nougat you will probably be very happy with this item

this a a very tasty product and it makes all beat product taste good i have been a fan of kraft barbecue sauce for years but i just decide to try this brand bulls s eye i am glad i did and i will be switching to this brand from now on

i love arizona iced tea and this one is quite tasty especially for a diet version a great combination of lemony tea please note that this review is specific to the product not the price or the merchant
this company protected these cookies very well with great packaging but the taste is not there i would never purchase again

tried this per package directions adding smoked sausage and cut up chicken tenders wow was it ever good i liked it so much that i immediately came back for another case in the event that this product might be out in the future if you are a fan of jambalya you will love this spicy but not overpowering made a huge amount three of us had dinner with grandson going back for seconds and there was still plenty for the next day for lunch what is so great about this is that you can add anything you want to it and it would be great or fix it as is and still be happy try it

my husband bought this after growing to love this dish after living back east we currently live in the western us and i have never had this dish prior to him making it for me so i cannot offer any comparison however i do thoroughly enjoy this dish when my husband called this cincinnati chili i got stuck on the chili part so my taste buds were confused when i first tried this dish because it does not particularly taste like the chili i am used to after adjusting to the sweetness i really enjoy this dish more than my husband it is not your typical chili with beans and spicy ness it has a smoother consistency and the cinnamon cloves and allspice give it a different taste entirely it is a very easy meal to make we have it way on top of noodles with grated cheese and chopped onions on top i should also mention to others not familiar with this dish is that it is not very substantial on its own it is also delicious on top of turkey dogs

i wanted to try cherrytree cola for no particular reason other than i would heard fentimans makes some pretty good drinks so i ordered a few from amazon and they shipped in like three days i absolutely love this soda i do not drink much pop because the carbonation is overbearing for me but this was different it was much smoother than regular colas and had a great taste the only downside is that it is expensive i will not be purchasing more right away but if i could i would

i have loved these since i was a kid my mom has been giving them to me for christmas ever since i discovered them perfect amount of orange flavor blended in with delicious dark chocolate i had my boyfriend try these recently as well he loves them too he has a mild milk allergy so he sometimes cannot eat certain brands but these do not bother him

having a peanut allergic son this stuff makes a great substitute texture wise it is exactly like peanut butter but with a slight cinnamon after taste quite pleasant i found it in walmart for under a jar so i would suggest shopping around some i bought the creamy version but a crunchy version was also available also much more cost friendly then the peanut free almond butter that was to be found for like jar

this is by far the best deal going for oh henry bars that i have found anywhere either online or in retail stores an entire pack for under is truly a great bargain and i found the quality and freshness of the bars to be quite good very satisfied with the purchase and i will be re ordering when this box has been devoured

these sugar free sour gummi worms are wonderful the taste is just like that of the regular sour gummi worms the only problem with them is that they did not come with a suggested serving size as you may or may not know if you eat too much of these or most sugar free products there may be unintended consequences limit to at a time or you may find yourself limited to the bathroom other than that they are great

i have had instant and canned teas in the past and was less than impressed with those products so i was hoping for something better with the mio sweet tea at first i got the mixture wrong i put tsp into ounces of water there was too much of a citrus like after taste and of course the flavor in general was too strong once i got the mixture right use tsp for every my opinion changed the flavor is great and i love it the servings of this product were gone in no time as i made ounce servings frequently i imagine the liquid would easily stain clothing so be careful as you squirt it out but otherwise i have no reservations in recommending this

the sweet tea flavor is very tasty and refreshing without any added sugar or calories it is very conveniently packaged for use away from home as well i just pop it in my purse and i am good to go i get to control how much flavor is added according to my taste and mood because it is a liquid there is no concern with additive powders that do not dissolve properly i am a fan

my wife and i absolutely love these snacks they are somewhat healthy and they are very tasty after we purchased these we found them cheaper at wal mart since then though wal mart went with a cheaper clone from another company it comes in a plastic container has the exact same ingredients and the price is a lot less than the name brand item
these noodles are very tasty and light not fried or greasy lots of vegies a great lunch to go that will not fatten me up love them

so often in the movies when something upsetting happens the first thing offered is a cup of tea there is just something soothing about it i am no connoisseur but i decided to branch out and try something a little exotic i am glad i did as this tea is really nice i like mine with a little honey and milk so good

i bought this after my local coffee house went out of business and it helped me so much with the transition to a coffee free world the mocha mix has a lot of sugar and ingredients i would rather not have on a daily basis but oh it tastes wonderful so for an occasional treat it is awesome i add a small amount to a healthier protein shake and it makes for a great desert
i personally use it to make iced tea it tastes great with a little sweetner tha acai is not overpowering as in other teas i have tried

a nice little break from the traditional chocolate mint andes candy the cherry jubilee is not too sweet it is just right package wise i always look at the weight of the candy and not the packaging cannot go wrong with andes it is an office favorite with our software developers

fruit flavored mentos are a delicious candy the flavor is teriffic although there are several different colors they all taste a bit the same to me which is a general fruit flavor i also really enjoy the texture as well these mints are chewy on the inside but on the outside they have a bit of soft crunchy she will
i purchased these to add drops of lemon juice to my water they are great i gave it stars because i do not really have anything else to compare it to

i think the negative reviews are a little harsh this company is not alone in labeling their almonds raw even though they are most likely pasteurized is it right i agree no but when it comes to almond butter no matter what your choices are going to be either organic or not so at least you know they are being grown healthier than the alternative all almonds in the united states are pasteurized you can go to health food co oop store and most likely find imported raw almonds my store has some from italy but if you go to whole foods they are also going to try and sell you raw almonds that are not truly raw everyone seems to be in on the mislabeling anyway google it and get educated if your interested if you are looking for a great tasting organic almond butter at decent price you will not be disappointed with this one as i scanned the negative reviews i do not think i remember them commenting that the taste was not great for what is it is worth i tried vitamixing my imported truly raw almonds to make my own almond butter but still does not taste as good as this
these beans have absolutely no taste to them be prepared to add butter salt while cooking them and completely ruining the health factor in the process if you plan to enjoy them

this extract is strange i put a little into my recipe and it sort of had an almost peanut buttery hint of flavor but not quite so i thought it needed a bit more i put in the tiniest bit more and the flavor changed drastically and tasted not like peanut butter but like alcohol not good at all
looking for no points but this has a funny taste on weight watchers but prefer so will take the pt value

i live in texas while visiting our daughter in sd recently she purchased these at her local grocery store she served as salad topping but then we ate a couple of packages by the handfuls i went back the next morning on our way back home and purchased all they had in the maple and cinnamon flavors i emailed the company and asked where i could buy more locally texas they advised that this is a new product and only available to date in the midwest basically but that i could order through amazon i am thrilled these are fantastic a little on the expensive side but just learn to pace yourself and not eat too many maple is our favorite cinnamon is good too have not tried banana flavor enjoy
i was introduced to a peach flavored iced latte at work and decided i wanted to try and made them at home this syrup worked great highly recommended
i love the flavor of this tea even though it is decaffeinated it is one of the few decaf teas that still have a good robust taste this and the irish breakfast decaf are among my favorites

these are good each roll is only calories with of sugars they are similar in consistency to a rice cake but slightly firmer due to the rice syrup i think they taste sweeter than the of sugars they contain but not so sweet that you would consider them candy or junk they come packaged rolls to a box because they are not individually wrapped they can stick to one another in the package although not to the extent that they are destroyed also because there is no wrapper although they are a decent snack for kids they tend to leave little hands sticky this order was for a dozen boxes these are certainly good enough to order more than once but i imagine it will take some time to get through the initial order a box option might be better

i love peanut butter but occasionally have allergic reactions after eating it so i avoid it when possible i first purchased sunbutter after seeing it on qvc and boy was it wonderful i purchased it several times through qvc until they quit carrying it fortunately i was able to purchase it again through amazon the pleasant smooth nutty flavor will keep me coming back for more

this nustevia product is the best i have ever tried there is no bitter taste it is very sweet and only takes a few drops on a previous review i spoke about another product and how tasty it was however this one beats it by a long shot i highly recommend it i am glad i tried this one
no aftertaste is not overpowering does not mask the flavor of the food we use this on our steel cut oats and protein drinks no bitter aftertaste like the powders

i made the first loaf of this on a quick setting on my bread machine and it did not rise very high i thought it was the bread mix and was not very happy with it but i decided to give it another try on the regular cycle i added a tablespoon of molasses because we like it in rye bread the loaf turned out beautiful rose very high and tasted delicious very pleased with the results

this product tastes just like any other cinnamon bun i was skeptic at first but the taste is very good everybody at home liked them at net carbs it is a treat you can afford in your coffee break in your low carb lifestyle
my wife and i love this coffee the taste is awesome the hint of mocha makes the coffee sooo smooth

i love sahale snacks and this one hits the mark it is got a little kick that is very satisfying one thing that separates sahale from other snack products is the variety of textures and flavors you get in every bite i highly recommend sing buri blend

this is really just some good clean tasting hearty tomato sauce the fact that it is organic is important to me and it is also bpa free so if you are concerned do not be top notch product in my opinion and one that i use at least twice a week in pasta and on pizzas the s s price in particular blows away normal grocer prices for this same can size enjoy

the other reviewers are correct i thought i would buy this in spite of the reviews because it was the only product available without traveling into a bigger town where there are asian markets this is a huge waste of money totally tasteless could not even fix it by adding spices and basil stay away

this is the best cold tea i have ever had it really works and has a great flavor it gets rid of your cough and makes your throat feel better i have strep right now and this stuff works better than dayquil and does not have any side effects
the candy was fresh and tasted really good it definitely was not hanging around some warehouse somewhere i would order from this company again with no hesitation

this is a fantastic product tastes better than mcdonalds or starbucks and less expensive at about per serving it comes in a great canister with a scoop to measure the frappe mix i love it and recommend it to anyone who has a love of frappes
i can only drink decaf caffiene makes me nuts most decaf teas are flat taste wise this one has a rich distinct flavor i highly recommend it
this tea is among the best i have ever had i am a tea addict and the delightful licorice flavor running through this tea makes it delicious

this nori is a true bargain sheets of nori at local grocery stores ran for as much as per sheet sheets at less than is hard to beat really glad i got this as i am now making sushi several times a week
this nori tastes great at an affordable price this was the best price i have ever seen for a pack this size

i have never used a coffee syrup but love starbucks and though why not see how close i can get to that wonderful taste i used this torani hazelnut syrup just a small amount in most of my different flavors coffee it is sweet so you do not need any added sugar good price shipping was high but would buy again might try a different flavor

i must confess that i bought this product only because i wanted to see the pretty flower blossom inside the water to my surprise it smells and tastes really good too and the flower is very pretty totally worth it
hard to find item delicious and easy to prepare kids love it arrived very fast

i have been using this flour for the past months or so for making bread and pizza dough and for basically all my baking including cakes it has a great flavor that my family notices my bread comes out perfect each time
this coffee tastes great i have tried lavazza and other non organic brands but the taste of this coffee is very good and the price is reasonable i will purchase it again
love these crackers and love i love peanut butter and this is a way to eat it without so many calories these crackers have great flavor just have to remember not to eat whole bag
sweet and tasty my whole family love it my secondary favorite chocolate brand lindt is always on the top of my list cheaper than lindt

works great in my iced tea brewing machine that i use in my concession trailer tastes great customers cannot believe that we use lipton tea not some cheap off brand like almost every concession stand uses we only serve our customers the best

this is a great product if you like a touch of hot on your pasta we first purchased it about years ago when we were in myrtle beach it is hard to find where we live my husband will not eat his pasta withot this i also put a few shakes of it in my sauce when i am cooking it in this quantity it only flavors the sauce and does not make it hot to taste the biggest problem is that it is not often available i wish amazon would stock it on a regulary basis

i really like the flavor but i do not have much choice anyways not many pizza spices brands out there to buy i used to buy mccourmick but they discontinued their pizza spices i really loved their hot version but i do like this pizza spice anyways i just sprinkle on top of my pizza slice as i am eating it

i fell in love with this product i find artificial sweeteners sadly lacking in flavor or as stimulating to my taste buds as a flat soda this product has saved me i use it in everything i would use regular sugar for my favorite way to use it is to make lemon sorbet talk about satisfying my sweet tooth and staying within my dietary guidelines this is the one for me now i want to find a brown sugar variation of this raley s supermarket used to carry smart sugar and then quit stocking it i bought every last one on the shelf to tide me over until i could find another source thanks to amazon i can now quit hoarding my supply and use it more freely i will be placing my order for bags very soon thanks to everyone involved in the production of smart sugar

i have always like sardines and recently decided to start eating them on nearly a daily basis i bought two cases of these season sardines in water and started taking them to work to eat as a snack i really like the taste these came to a can seemed to be of the larger type they still had the skin and bones which was fine by me i love the taste of fish so i did not have much interest in the skinless and boneless bland tasting ones

i am on my third or fourth bottle am not sure how well the health benefits are working out but i really like it because it adds flavor to different drinks i usually add a little bit to my orange juice or water once a day to give it a nice flavor it probably taste good because it is mostly concentrated pomegranate juice

wonderful packaging small glass containers full of anchovy goodness that you can throw in the frige after extracting what you need clean tiny boned very edible fillets are perfect for anything from sauce to toppings due to other reviews i recommend using the first fillets you pull out from the middle for sauce slightly broken up the the others come out whole just fine with a cocktail fork i will order these again and again

had demitris in a restaurant and now it has become the go to for tailgating and gatherings easy to mix and regulate the spiciness only problem was that amazon s packing when shipping caused one bottle to leak all over the box

bob s red mills lentils are my favorite legume they have a slightly sweet taste and cook very fast minutes be careful not to over cook them because they are very tender and will fall apart still tasty though the soup i make calls for sauteed carrots celery onion add ham or sausage if you wish garlic clove oregano salt if you have not added salty ham and optional hot pepper flakes it is very hardy and filling caution lentils can be difficult for diabetics to handle
i cannot comment on price because this is not sold locally however i can comment on taste these are so simple to cook and healthy i found a really good lentil soup recipe to use these in
i was a little disappointed it does not taste like the eel i remembered this is very muschi i do not think i order it again karin

i am a pretty big coffee drinker but had never tried kona coffee before i got to say hawaii roasters kona coffee was the best coffee i ever had the type of coffee you want to savor for the flavor rather than gulp down for the caffeine which is really hard to do because it tastes so good after your first sip you just want to keep downing it rather than savor it i purchased my first package right before the holidays and it was a total hit with my family and friends i am now totally hooked and strongly recommend hawaii roasters kona to all coffee lovers

love this coffee i have always enjoyed good coffee but this is great coffee a friend sent it to me as a gift and i am so happy he turned me onto it the coffee is strong the way i like it and has a smooth rich flavor i know what i will be buying for my friends this holiday
this was a gift to our son in law and from what i understand he really enjoyed it rich full bodied flavor

like most coffee drinkers i know kona is a special coffee bean and this brand offers great taste at my local coffee shop i often pick kona when it is offered as the flavor of the day while the coffee shop kona is better than an average coffee it did not seem to be anything special and i could guess they do not sell true kona but a blend so i decided to try a true kona and picked hawaiian roasters i am very happy with this purchase might be the best coffee i have ever had the flavor is strong and there is no after taste issue i picked the medium roast and i plan to try the dark roast next

planter s big nut bars are just that big and full of nuts honey roasted peanuts almonds and cashews i often have issues with this kind of snack since they so often try to position themselves as a healthy choice and they so often are not one aside from calling itself a granola bar this snack does not make any particular health claims yet it actually is a relatively good choice very preferable to a candy bar which is really where these types of snacks belong it contains g of fat but almost none of it g is saturated each bar contains no cholesterol a reasonable mg of sodium and calories while providing g of protein g of fiber calcium iron vitamin e and phosphorous like most of these bars there is quite a lot of sugar but again when compared to other candy bars it is not a bad choice and they easily taste as good as most candy bars i would not hesitate to have one of these as an occasional treat
these bars are pretty tasty as you might imagine they are truly for nut lovers fairly sweet with great nutty flavor it is nice that they do not just use peanuts

these are vaguely like a payday nuts stuck together with chewy sweet goodness and something vaguely like rice crispies in there they are saltier than i expected though i like that i am not seeing a lot of nuts besides the peanuts though and there is more of the cereal stuff than i was expecting i am a big nut eater so i do like these and i like the salty sweet nutty sticky mess but i think i would prefer them w o the cereal filler

i was a little hesitant in trying these triple nut bars since i am not a big fan of almonds however i have not found all that many almonds in them plenty of honey roasted peanuts and quite a large amount of broken up cashews i love these i eat them slowly to savor the flavor because they really are good these granola bars are a little larger in size than the standard long by wide by thick just salty enough to make them delicious and sticky enough so it does not break apart when biting into one yet not so sticky that you have to wash your hands after eating i will definitely buy these again

these are a tasty treat but i would not eat one everyday i like all nuts in bar honey roasted peanuts almonds and cashews i like them separately but having them together blended really nicely i was surprised i was very impressed with the size of the bar compared to other bars they are a generous size i think i will be buying them in the near future great taste and fair size update march i liked these so much i bought more they are not healthy for you but are very tasty i try to eat one every few days

i like how this bar taste is soft not like other peanut bars that you are afraid that every single bite will hurt i like the flavor of the honey roasted peanuts almonds and cashews combination this bar is delicious

i am a long time diabetic and always looking for a sweet treat without all the sugar i have always enjoyed haribo gummies so i tried their sugar free version and wow you cannot tell the difference they are still sweet and fruity and smell just the same as a matter of fact so good me kids ate almost all them not many candies i enjoy that are sugar free but these are the ticket

i am loving this coconut oil it is a difficult thing to find in stores and i have been searching for a good alternative to cooking with olive oil since it has such a low smoke point all the other sites i found it was too expensive so i tried this and have replaced it as my only cooking oil it is light and flavorful and has a lot of health benefits to go with it
we buy this product to keep us healthier it has a healing property of keeping bacteria at bay especially during the winter months

first i ordered a case of loma linda vege burger it was disappointing a whoooole case of disappointing i thought that my memories from youth of how good canned vegeburger had been must have been overblown then i tried this worthington vegetarian burger this is exactly what i remembered the big problem is i cannot stop eating it i love eating it straight out of the can the texture is great the flavor is great it crumbles nicely easy to use calories are moderate as well good imitation meats help me resist eating the real thing and this product is perfect for me

it is hard to describe this to people who have never sampled it but basically it is a powder to which you mix milk and sugar to get a sweetened malted drink it is supposed to promote sleep quite simply it is a comfort drink when plain milk just will not do you can also call it malted milk or a hot sweet malt drink in the great british trifecta of british powdered drinks to be mixed with milk and sugar horlicks the most malty milo is medium chocolately and malty and ovaltine seems to be the most chocolately it is actually named after the inventor william horlick as far as taste goes you can make it as malty or sweet as you like depending on how much of each you add to the milk but to those who love and grew up on holicks it is just a great comfort drink

this is a great tasting hot drink it is not chocolate base like milo or ovaltine when added to milk the color of the milk barely changes it gives the milk a smooth texture and a creamy taste i mix tbs with warm milk sometimes i use sugar and sometime i do not without sugar added it still has a good taste the only thing is the container is very small i was expecting something a little bigger for if i knew was so small in size i would have order the larger size here is the nutritional fact base on serving calories sodium mg total fat g potassium mg saturated g total carbs g polyunsaturated g dietary fiber g monounsaturated g sugars g trans g protein g cholesterol mg vitamin a calcium vitamin c iron

i have been using rendered duck fat from another company that is times as expensive but not any better i use it to make a chicken liver pate that convinces even the best palletes that it is duck liver pate this is enough duck fat for about pounds of raw livers depending upon your fat tollerance my secret pate recipe ounces rendered duck fat lb chicken livers large shallot peeled and coarsely chopped tablespoons tsp herbs de provence rosemary marjoram thyme work well cloves garlic peeled and crushed through a press tsp sea salt tsp freshly ground black pepper tbs cognac or dry sherry one loaf of rye or pumpernickel bread look for this at the deli counter olive oil garlic salt pate fry the first six ingredients until the livers are cook thoroughly allow mixture to cool slightly so you do not melt your food processor add cooked mixture to food processer and blend away adjust seasoning and add cognac cool in refrigerator bread heat oven to coat bread slices with olive oil and place in a single layer on a sheet pan sprinkle with garlic salt these cook quickly so check them after minutes you want a hard crouton like doneness

i decided to try raw honey about a year ago and was a bit overwhelmed with all the choices i ended up at my local health food store and found stakich raw honey it is produced about an hour from me so given the speculation that raw honey from flora in your area helps with allergies and liking to support local businesses i decided to give it a try i love it the taste is delicious and sweet i have used it to replace all of our regular honey uses and no one in my family can tell the difference the texture is definitely more grainy than processed honey but that is to be expected i mix a tablespoon of stakich raw honey and a teaspoon of stakich bee pollen into my greek yogurt each morning and start my day with a nutritious and delicious breakfast try it you will not be disappointed

i have never tried the similar candies before so maybe i have nothing to compare these with but i really enjoyed them it is not too sweet and just has a pleasant taste overall i think i will be buying these candies for myself in the future i tried newman s own other products and i am happy that this one has not dissappointed me
this licorice is addictive the taste is original and fresh what i love the best is the after taste it leaves you wanting more a winner

i am already a fan of newman s own organics line of products i think they are generally high quality reasonably priced and have a great track record as a charitable organization so i was really looking forward to trying out the pomegranate licorice when you first open the package you can immediately smell the sweet sugary fruit scent of pomegranate the next thing you notice is the rich red well pomegranate color one thing i liked right off the bat is that the licorice sticks are not super long like a twizzler they are shorter and more manageable to eat they are a also not overly sticky and do not leave a sticky residue on your fingers taste wise they are great perhaps my favorite aspect of this licorice is that they are not super sweet while they have a strong sugary smell they are not obnoxiously sweet like twizzlers the licorice has a nice chewy texture and trends towards soft the pomegranate taste is subtle at first you cannot taste it at all instead tasting the sugar and gelatin flavors as you chew the pomegranate taste grows and by the end has a nice strong flavor the pomegranate flavor is also very good i have not ate too many raw pomegranates but i do like the pom juice products this licorice compares well against the pom juice products so as a nice treat to share with the family i highly recommend

i would been reading about this product in magazines for almost a year and could not wait to try it i finally got to and it did not disappoint pomegranate is not an easy flavor to capture and somehow they were able to i have tried all the newman s own organics licorices and this was the hardest in terms of chewing but it was not overly hard i have had some that i know would put any dental work at risk and this is a good option if you like slighly harder licorice but still want something that is chewy not too sweet but good if you need a candy fix and of course it is got all natural ingredients so you can get your candy fix as i have been doing without feeling in the least bit guilty

newman s own organics licorice twists have a lot of things going for them percent organic with no artificial ingredients the pomegranate flavor was surprisingly good and while it had a different consistency from the twizzlers i am used to it was not a bad change recommended
well licorice is a stretch but this is like most of the newman products tasty and good quality whether you like the taste is of course up to you but i did
this licorice has a very good flavor the only thing i would have liked is it were a little softer

we enjoyed our package of pomegranate licorice i prefer to buy organic and this fits the bill it is not too sweet but yet still is candy the entire family enjoyed it and it was a nice special treat if you are looking for a nice treat that is not too sweet and sugary this works i would prefer that they did not use corn syrup but it is candy

i actually have tried four flavors to date of the di vinci syrups i like them all i use them in baking you can find some recipes on the internet for using these syrups in things like muffins etc be aware that these syrups are made with splenda we love splenda use it everyday so we are ok with it some folks have a problem with it though currently in my pantry i have strawberry i suggest using this over some low fat frozen yogurt or ice cream vanilla peanut butter and pancake syrup all four taste great the consistency of the pancake syrup is thinner than you might want however i bought it because my local store did not have syrup made with splenda at the time now they do though the price listed here is good i have paid per bottle at an online retailer

first i would like to say that i purchased this product from the store not from this seller also that there was not a problem with the expiration date of the coffee i am not a picky coffee drinker i like all kinds but i prefer stronger brews i like flavored coffee as well but only when it tastes like what it is suppose to i do not think anyone wants to drink chemical flavored coffee when i bought this product i thought it was going to be great i am a consumer of folgers and have tried different flavors of theirs however this was the first k cup brand i bought from them and was very disappointed the coffee is definitely flavored and does taste like caramel but after each sip there is an after taste of some sort of chemical the after taste is so strong and disgusting that you can neither enjoy the flavor of the coffee nor the caramel for the first time was unable to finish my cup of coffee to drink the entire cup would have been the equivalent of torturing myself i would not recommend anyone buy this product
i stopped in the cayman islands and fell in love with this rum cake it makes a great gift too
tasty moist not too sweet just perfect it its true rumcake the taste of rum is minimul however it is there just enough

i am french and moved to usa in i miss many of the good foods i have in france the ricola herbal tea is one of them i am glad to discover recently that amazon sells it it might be the only place in usa that sells it it is calming soothing and taste good it is good when you are thirsty right before going to bed when you are sick and when you have a throat ache

i do not generally care too much for the healthy alternatives especially when it comes to coffee however after trying truvia at a hotel i am now hooked i usually get it at the grocery store but it is good to see that it is available on amazon and now that i have prime i might just be getting it online instead this sweetener tastes really good and in addition to coffee i have had it with desserts and it tastes great i think it even tastes better than sugar and definitely tastes better than splenda i cannot comment as to the health aspects related to artificial sweeteners but i am sure that there is plenty of information available on the internet related to that as a casual coffee drinker i highly recommend truvia however definitely try out a sample before purchasing such a large box

simply put this tea is delicious the mango taste is smooth and not overwhelming and all the ingredients are blended well so nothing is overpowering i also like the fact that numi did not pump tons of sugar into the tea to make it overly sweet thereby cutting down on calories carbs and sugar as the label indicates this is barely sweetened but it tastes just right there are also little gems of wisdom underneath the bottle caps i cannot wait to try every flavor in this line of puerh teas in the glass bottle i did not order the tea through amazon rather i got it directly through the numi tea website but wanted to give a review here for others

i started drinking the blueberry hibiscus tea because i read that hibiscus helps to reduce blood pressure i have never been a hot tea drinker until about a month ago it did take me a few cups to get used to the taste now i really enjoy the taste i even miss it when i skip my nightly cup i find it also relaxes me before bed it is sweet enough that there is no need to add honey or other sweetener the blueberry is an added bonus i am willing to pay the steep price because i am trying to find something beside prescription medication to help control my out of control blood pressure the price on amazon is a bit higher than at whole foods where i shop

in the great trifecta of british powdered drinks to be mixed with milk and sugar horlicks the most malty milo is medium chocolately and malty and ovaltine seems to be the most chocolately all are basically comfort drinks when plain milk just will not do all are powders to which you add milk and sugar to get a sweet malty drink the latter two with chocolate flavor as well i love all drinks but if you are drinking this for nostalgia s sake make sure you get the milo from where ever your nostalgia springs from because milo is made in different countries and they all taste a little different for me i love milo for it is good mix of chocolate and malt not too much of either and a great comfort drink for cold nights

if you like the ceylon tea variety you will certainly enjoy and appreciate this tea in the years we have been drinking ahmad teas not even once have we been disappointed the superb quality of ahmad teas has remained consistent throughout the years have always used loose tea but this time wanted to try their teabags because of the convenience portability and to see if the bagged tea would brew as clear as the loose tea and i am happy to report that it actually does i am so glad to find ahmad teas available here because only a few stores carry it in my area and they are quite a few miles away the current prime deal for the pack of is superb much cheaper than i can find locally i am taking advantage of the subscribe and save offer the six tea boxes arrived nicely packed see the photos i uploaded each box has a packing date and a best before date this is a great tasting tea which i am happy to recommend

that is what i thought when i took the first bite i found these on an amazon manager s special for slightly less than box and the ingredients were healthy and intriguing with the seed combination and two of my favorites rosemary and garlic since there were no reviews i did not really know what to expect but i had to give these a try first of all they are very fresh crunchy the sell by date is months away they are cute little round crackers really tortilla chips as a tortilla chip these are the best i have ever had they are very sturdy you could use them to scoop anything including the thickest guacamole and i do not think they would break or crumble the delicious taste i got from the first one with all of the nuances of every flavor unfortunately diminishes where the rosemary and garlic is not really discernible but you still get that wonderful corn organic seeds flavor with just the right amount of salt way lower than most with i do not know if that is considered a low sodium product but many snacks and processed foods like most jerky and a lot of crackers are way too salty for me fyi nutrition info serving size about crackers servings box calories total fat saturated fat no trans fat cholesterol total carbs fiber sugars protein sodium by the way they are gluten free which is really important for a lot of people most of the crackers in the box i opened were intact with a few broken ones mostly at the bottom of the bag even though they are perfect on their own they would be really good with a black bean dip guacamole or hummus bottom line if you are looking for a tasty and healthy snack cracker chip these are for you

dr mcdougall s organic maple brown sugar light oatmeal is a fanatstic healthy way to start your day made from organic oats naturally sweetened this hot cereal is miles ahead of the national brands found in your neighborhood grocery store this oatmeal a delicious whole grain fiber rich way to make breakfast more nutritious in fact dr mcdougall s instant oatmeal is a great light snack anytime of the day given the great deal dr mcdougall s is on amazon com national bargain store brands of instant oatmeal simply cannot compete even in a tight economy very well worth a try highly recommended
we have purchased at least boxes of david pumpkin seeds and have not had a bad box in the lot will continue buying this great treat

we were disappointed when we could no longer obtain violet crumbles in the you s then we discovered the crunchie almost identical but better these bars arrived on time and is perfect condition none of the bars broken and no bloom nice light chocolate covered sea foam in perfect condition
looking to end caffein in my life tried several caffein free brands and this one was a big disappointment both my wife i will not finish the

i am not a huge tea drinker coffee every day but i do enjoy black tea earl grey chai tea and this tea is a nice addition i bought it because i would heard good things about it including dr oz recommending it at that point it was a question of which of the many oolongs on amazon do i buy i bought three they are all very similar in flavor require a touch of sweetener for my tastes but are very good they are all a bit subdued in flavor with this one being in the middle i have had no problems with the bags breaking or tea leaves or dust being everywhere

i have only used one other stevia product which was very good this is just as good and does not leave any bitter aftertaste in my opinion i only use it in my morning coffee two packets for a cup i would definitely buy this product if i wanted to stick with something organic however i personally still prefer splenda whether it is good for me or not

my favorite sweeteners are stevia and agave this organic stevia has a bit of taste of both the main ingredient is agave inulin and then the second one is stevia this makes it really sweet with no aftertaste in fact you can say that it almost has a hint of honey must be the agave inulin it dissolves quickly too a packet equals tsp of sugar i like tsp in my cup of coffe so i use only half a packet at a time it is very good though considering that it is organic and natural the price is slightly above what i would pay but i think it is ok if you are used to buying other products with stevia truvia costs about cents less than this organic stevia at about the same number of packets but truvia is not organic so it depends on what you are looking for
my spouse and i are both using this product and enjoy the slight taste of chocolate it gives the morning coffee
great product tastes great love being able to buy in bulk at a good price rivals generic prices well worth it

i took this stuff on a two week camping trip and had no problems with mess or attracting ants tastes great note that this does not seem to reconstitute into a thick viscus honey like substance my results were much more watery use in place of sugar
this is simply one of the best low calories food out there great taste low calories low sugar high fiber if you want to eat pasta and do not want to rack up the calories one answer fibergourmet

i love this cereal it is sweet without being cloyingly sweet you can eat a bowl and not feel like you have overdone your sugar ration for the rest of the day we love golden grahams with the plain soy milk unlike other cereals this tastes just the same with regular milk or with soy milk

huge fan of this crystal light flavor i usually find crystal light drink mixes to be rather concentrated so i mix one packet with oz of water and it comes out just right not too sweet the color of the mixed drink is also easy on the eyes it is a pale green color so nothing like the bright red blue purple orange colors that some of the other drink mix flavors will give you
keenan s pistachios are great i love having the no salt option the nuts are fresh with a very good flavor finding a clunker inedible nut in the bag is very rare
was pleasantly surprised they are very good and i do not miss the salt at all would always have to rinse off the salt but no longer
i like the packaging individually wrapped and the taste of the coffee cannot find a thing wrong with it

i received a free sample in with an order i would placed on line and thought why not try it only calories and no artificial sweeteners flavors or preservatives oh my i am hooked the grape flavor is not weak like kool aid it is just right not too tart not too sweet this product also has electrolytes in it so it will help keep my hydrated when i work out

well what kind of review can i write for snack bites i was quite surprised by their taste which is very good i wish they were available in bigger packages otherwise the packaging itself costs more than the bites that is the reason for stars i mean the cellophane costs as much as the meat
grew up with them as a kid in california then disappeared for years found them while in the midwest for business and then on amazon i am very happy to have a breakfast favorite back
i was a little bit uneasy at ordering a plant online but bonsaiboy sent this beautiful cherry tree promptly and it arrived in beautiful condition i will definitely recommend him again
very nice blackberry tea without caffeine the lack of caffeine allows a cup in the evening without interfering with sleep good taste up to the usual lipton quality

i am already a fan buyer of lipton s herbal tea having tried the island mango peach the mandarin orange and blueberry pomegranate i like the fact that the ingredients are natural hibiscus flowers rosehips blackberry blueberry raspberry it is definitely herbal tea there are no actual tea leaves in the ingredients which is why it is caffeine free i also like that lipton uses the least amount of material needed to make the tea bags and they are not wrapped individually the teas that do so annoy me as wrapped bags are a time waster and a resources waster there is no need to wrap each one i especially like the taste of the tea it has a very nice flavor note i use bags at a time to make a full pitcher of iced tea
i bought this on the recommendation of ruth watson the hotel inspector and i use it in everything frozen vegetables soup meats etc
the flakes are like eating twigs and straw i contacted company and they said would send coupons to replace my product but i never got any thing in the mail ever

for a time we could not get low carb pasta in our local store so i ordered this it tastes great

these healthy flakes taste very good even though they are low in sugar and high in fiber and nutritional value they do lose their crispiness in a bowl of milk but i either eat fast or snack on the flakes right out of the box these make a great healthy substitute for other wheat flake cereals on the market
this has become our first choice for coffee we have a bed and breakfast and the guest always comment on how good the coffee is great taste with a fantastic price
all of these fruit snacks are large and tasty muscat was a little gross but all in all a great product

these are just too tasty seriously they need to come in a big box like fiddlefaddle i could munch on these all day long i do not get to as my wife and kids keep cleaning out my supplies before i can get to them damn you job
a tasty snack but a little too sweet do not leave them in a warm car they get horribly sticky not for someone with braces either

just the right mix of chocolate caramel and crunchy popcorn very tasty plus the box is separated into calorie packages so you do not sit down and eat the whole box at once
for the price you cannot beet it it is not to sweet but enough to have some flavor and it really does taste like root beere

this is a great calorie snack with great taste and texture amazon delivered a fresh product with an expiration date a year out to the guy who said there are only cookies in a bag that is crazy it is more like cookies per bag maybe more i did not count them but i was not disappointed by it at all
i really liked this a change up from strictly white tea very expensive though so will only order every once in awhile as a treat

izze is probably the best carbonated beverage that money can buy even better than jones soda all of izze s flavors are all natural and taste fantastic i especially love sparkling blackberry it is worth paying more for the quality especially since they have fewer calories than soda and better ingredients very tasty and highly recommended

my son that i bought it for did not like it but i sure did used it in coffee and cocoa unique flavor best to blend a batch before using as it takes some effort to get to dissolve completely without clumping but even the clumps are great tasting
great tasting found the right combo for taste better than eating all that sugar you will not be disappointed with this syrup

eat think smile cinnamon almond granola clusters is a tasty snack that i enjoyed quite a bit it is not exactly health food but i do not think there would be an issue in enjoying this treat in moderation eat think smile cinnamon almond granola clusters are made up of large granola clusters too big to be eaten easily as a breakfast cereal but just the right size for snacking the most obvious ingredients are oats almond bits cocoa and cinnamon neither the cocoa or cinnamon taste is overpowering at all and i found that the combination of these two tastes was much better than i would have expected now as i mentioned above i would not consider this product health food despite the claims on the package about the antioxidant power of the cocoa and cinnamon after all a small serving contains grams of fat and grams of sugar and among the ingredients listed are brown sugar palm oil and evaporated sugar cane juice but as a substitute for more highly processed sweets this will do ok overall i am a fan of eat think smile cinnamon almond granola clusters and would likely buy it in the future

gluten free pasta can be less than acceptable this brand of pasta tastes just like regular pasta even my husband who is not gluten free loves the taste i have tried all the styles of their brown rice pasta excellent

these are delicious and though they have a lot of sugar they also have a lot of vitamin c if you have trouble getting the kids to eat oranges strawberries or anything with vitamin c these can help these sell for a good price too especially with the food discount going on

i wanted something to fill the new flask i just bought so i scoured the whiskey aisle and this product caught my eye boy am i glad it did after one bottle shared with friends over the weekend i am ready for more my new favorite i do admit with others that it is a bit sweet but hey what did you expect from maple syrup try it you will not be disappointed

the tanka bars i purchased were moist solid tasty without too much salt or sweetener and a small amount alleviated hunger for several hours at a time as i diabetic type ii i often have hunger pangs throughout the day pieces from one bar provided my body with enough energy to make it dinner time without the need for a sugar lift this helped me maintain a steady blood glucose level all day a little bit goes a long way so it should not be gobbled like an energy bar the taste will tempt you to do so it is pricey but certainly worth it i keep several in my go bag

not sure about how these are priced as i bought them originally at the dollar tree for but it was a package of only oz not the oz available here on amazon the cookies were such a surprise especially coming from the store they were so good i wanted to eat the whole box they are super tasty with coffee like biscotti but more melt in your mouth not too sweet not too bland just right loved them

i ordered jyoti natural foods looking for something healthy and quick while providing a lot of protein this tastes really good i was shockingly surprised and relieved my money was well spent i have had indian food at very authentic places have a lot of indian friends and i would say this is very close to going out to eat highly recommend

it is not a complete replacement for sugar but it tastes great and substitutes for sugar more often than not

i was introduced to kilambe coffee by a friend and immediately i tasted quality it is now part of my special collection along with my vietnamese coffee used only on weekends special occasions or having guests over if you enjoy a dark bold taste with the slightest scent chocolate and a fruity feel from mother nature at high altitude kilambe is for you

bought this for my wife we would recently bought a celestial seasons variety pack and had been stunned by the over a dollar a cup price tag this was a much better buy and is now my wife s favorite k cup tea regardless of price i just wish amazon would offer it as a subscription so we can shave off that fifteen percent

i am pleased with this salad dressing the olive oil flavor comes through nicely i have used this salad dressing on regular garden type salads and it tastes like home made dressing i have also used in pasta salad and it adds a zesty taste using this olive oil based dressing is a good marinade for meats chicken or even veggies especially if grilling there is a good balance between the herbs and olive oil to make this salad dressing taste good in different types of food if you like vinegrette you will find many uses for this product i highly recommend it
though it made my water taste better it did not make me zippy i did feel as though i was getting nutrients and enjoyed the flavor it did not take much to give it taste either

i add this to my cold brew lipton ice tea that i prepare took a bit of experimenting to get the right amount of juice concentrate but once perfected it is like drinking the perfect blend of sweetened ice tea the taste is great and no calories cannot beat that only demerits is that the price is rather high could use a few dollars off on the bulk purchases

this liquid vitamin is pretty tasty i thought it made my water taste like watered down crystal light my kids also liked that it made their water turn pink and gave it a faint sweet taste it is not overwhelming in sweetness or vitamin in taste i could not detect the vitamins at all the only downside is that it requires refrigeration after opening

this drink tastes as good or better than similar drinks that we have had that are made of powder the directions do not tell you how much to squeeze into your water so i would imagine it depends on how big of a glass or bottle you have and how strong you want it to taste you can always add more the only concern i have about it is there is caffeine in it and i really do not want to have any extra caffeine after my coffee in the morning you might want to beware of that if you are buying this for children
tried the fruit punch in a glass of water a little goes a long way and tastes great turn bottled water or tap water into a great tasting beverage refreshing no cal and healthy

i am always looking for a good energy drink that will give me a boost but not a big let down i like the glaceau energy water this is a good alternative this makes ounce servings at a bottle it is only cents a glass vs or so for the vitamin water by glaceau or others found in the supermarkets and convenience stores the flavor is like a light fruit punch you can control how much you want to add to your water for taste it has a combination of vitamins b and vitamin c zinc magnesium and chromium it has about the same amount of caffeine as a can of soda so not too much no jittery feeling after drinking it it is good to get healthy vitamins while i am drinking water and not just sugar and caffeine from sodas

i do not drink energy drinks on a regular basis but i do enjoy them while outside exercising energy drinks usually have sugars and caffeine in order to claim to be energy drinks and this stuff also has taurine in it one can also taste the sucralose it also contains vitamin c and electrolytes the taste is a citrusy punch delight and the fact that this comes out of a squeeze bottle that is measured to yield servings means it is easier to allow for more or less liquid according to taste i prefer my drinks on the weak side because i drink more of it and strong red drinks tend to leave a red moustache on my upper lip the red dye in this mixture can stain countertops so be careful when pouring this liquid easily comes out of the bottle and returned to the frig afterwards for the occassional drinker who would need a month to finish off the contents this is not a bad tasting mixture i have not felt a zing after drinking this though

this is not nearly as concentrated as the mio water flavors that you also squirt into your glass or bottle of water but you get a lot more of it oz and one fluid oz squirt has daily requirement for vitamin c and no calories the fruit punch tastes good however i like my water to be very weakly flavored so i probably put in about a squirt giving me of my daily requirement for vitamin c it is mainly advertised as being a source of vitamin c but there are more things beside vitamin c in it vitamin c vitamin vitamin vitamin vitamin zinc chromium the plastic bottle is a good shape for your hand to grab it easily and squeeze this might be a good way to get some needed vitamin c without having to eat a lot of citrus or swallowing vitamin c pills and if you like your water flavored but are particular like me about how much flavor is in it then this is a good way to control it

i love this drink squeeze a bit into water lemonade or club soda this tastes great i found it to have a fruit taste a little sweet and the best part you do not have to use a lot i found it out to be better then the mio fits in my bag no more pricey drinks at stores no more a few drops and i have a refreshing drink everyone in my family really enjoyed it as well

i really love this stuff and i will be buying more for sure one bottle lasts a really long time too it is better than any of the diet fruit punches i have tried so far i really cannot recommend this enough stars

having worked in a movie theater in high school and through college popcorn is a very nice treat that was years ago and it is still a very nice treat the seasoning salt makes this treat even more enjoyable by adding the right flavor to the popcorn to bring back memories of going to a movie in a less stressful time
everyone likes this it is very salty so you only need to use a tiny bit i add about half a teaspoon to the popcorn before popping and it is very tasty this carton should last for a long time

we tried all different saimins noodles the dashi soup is most delicious did not know koreans made saimins too they are better then japanese saimins noodles cannot wait till i receive them

i saw these as i was checking out of a beer store honestly and thought i would give them a try they are all organic and taste great they are also all shaped somewhat differently roundish which gives them a unique homemade look the color is a bit off white as well with some dark chunks small but not specks in them which adds to the unique appearance these are not made with artificial sweeteners yet the calorie carb content is very low the mint flavor is interesting because i found it got more intense as kept on sucking not less so as others do great product and much cheaper here than where i bought mine cool

i received this item as part of a gift during the christmas holidays i enjoyed it so much i got on the internet and searched until i found it although it may not be everyone is cup of tea it will become a regular part of the holidays at my house

i enjoy this tea plain with honey or with a splash of milk the ingredients are simple and natural no soy lecithin no so called natural flavorings very difficult to find herbal tea in the market place that does not have junk added to cheap it out my children enjoy this tea warm with honey during the winter iced during the summer with a hint of sugar and a wedge of lemon ingredients hibiscus cinnamon ginger peppermint orange peel rose hips rose petals

my two basenjis had a few guests over last week end and came the time to share a few bully sticks the atmosphere was electric everybody was sitting nicely some of them were holding their paw in the air as if to say me first me first the noses were twitching the tongues were meticulously run over them turning every piece of olfactive information into tasty dribble anxious eyes opened socket expanding wide the wait was unbearable after a few seconds of this gleeful spectacle i handed the treats out everybody grabbed theirs there were a few side glances a couple were dropped but immediately retrieved nerves you see and after one or two growls the chewing began it sounded like a mini munching factory the stench was heavenly and when every little fiber had been devoured we all cheered for valuebull tree times

i am currently in afghanistan and we received this mix in a care package the smell filled our entire building we almost had to lock our door to keep people out the entire loaf was gone in about minutes absolutely delicious we added the oz of water and then added another ounce because the dough looked a little dry again this was one of the best breads we have made here yet and will be ordering some very soon

they were very tasty bought them for my son he is interested in anything japanese they last a while in your mouth but not too chewy almost like gum you can swallow they have a great flavor not to sweet or tart i highly recommend them the price was good as well for pack i believe
